name: Piul Bothen Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The color of this wine is deep purple with aromas of ripe cherries, raspberries and plums with a hint of vanilla. On the palate, the wine is full and soft with layers of red fruit flavors and a hint of spice. The finish is long and smooth.

name: Seacuscini Resantzass 2015
description: The perfect wine for the holidays, this wine is a perfect partner to pasta, pizza, ham, beef and spicy dishes.   , fruit salad, barbeque, grilled steak, lamb chops, hearty soups, and risotto dishes.

name: Alpanena Vriestioge 2016
description: The wine is very approachable and fruit-forward, with a polished profile. It is an ideal wine to drink on a warm, sunny summer day, and a great match for richly-flavored fare., [category_2] Aged 18 months in new French oak barrels. The wine has a deep purple color. On the nose, the wine shows complex, ripe fruit notes, with a hint of spice. On the palate, the wine is soft, smooth and round, with a long, silky finish.

name: Sanmedarbecer Edena Cabernet
description: The grapes for this wine come from a selection of the oldest and most traditional vineyards in the region of Madrid, including the oldest vines in the Ebro River Valley. Extended maceration enhances color, flavor and mouthfeel, and aging for 18 months in French oak barrels adds complexity and structure to this wine. This Cabernet Sauvignon is elegant, with ripe, soft tannins and a long, smooth finish.

name: Sauvignon 2001
description: Sauvignon Blanc grapes from the North Coast vineyards are hand-picked at optimal maturity to maximize fruit flavor.  Our cool-climate vineyards in the North Coast AVA are the foundation for the wine.  The grapes are pressed in early morning to cool-climate vineyards in the coastal foothills.  The wine is barrel fermented, aged six months in stainless steel tanks and six months in stainless steel tanks.  The wine is then aged for a minimum of three months in French oak barrels.

name: Favilley Sonneres Sonomon Stazizas-Santehine 2008
description: The bouquet of this wine is filled with red fruit aromas, spice and the signature of this region, the mint.  The wine is full-bodied and loaded with layers of flavor.  Flavors of red and black currants and plums, mocha and earth are accompanied by a long, smooth finish.

name: ERitajas Katiano 1999
description: Cherry and raspberry fruit aromas dominate the nose, with some tropical notes.  Light to medium bodied, with soft tannins and a long finish.  Made from mostly Monastrell (Tempranillo), with a little Cabernet Sauvignon in the mix.

name: Tantorulta Pichandine Chardonnay 2002
description: It is a rich, full-bodied white wine with tropical fruit flavors, soft vanillins and a long finish.  and make wines from old vines that are best enjoyed while still very young.  This is the oldest estate plantings of Chardonnay in the world and only the oldest estates yield the most complex and unique wines.  The vines are primarily Garnacha, a grape that originated in Spain's south of France and has become a principal component of our Estate blend.  Our Estate Bottled Russian River Chardonnay has intense varietal character, showing soft pear and apple fruit with mineral notes and a full, rich texture.  The majority of the blend is from our best southern vineyards, with a balance from the best of our estate fruit and from other prime vineyards throughout the region.  Our winemaking team feels that the wines age best at a range of five to twelve years.

name: Terrin Petit Vellostier Sanca Pupantino 2009
description: Deep ruby color.  It has a rich, spicy nose of blackberries, cherries, cedar and slight mint. It has a wonderful finesse on the palate and is nicely balanced with fresh acidity.  Pairs well with red meat, poultry, white meats and cheeses.

name: Loseis Hill Yubrbell Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: , but can't wait to drink.  Velvety and soft tannins.  The deep purple/black color indicates excellent extract and a rich, concentrated wine.  The nose is filled with cassis, black cherries, plums, and chocolate.  On the palate, the wine is full-bodied, soft, rich, and intense with loads of black fruit, black pepper, and a hint of truffle.  It is a perfect example of why this varietal should be grown in the Napa Valley.  The wine is an example of why we are turning heads in Napa Valley and why some of the world's greatest Cabernets are produced from this region in the Napa Valley.  This Cabernet will continue to improve in the bottle for several more years.

name: Gigma Filt Oldra-Seliebluna Syrah 2012
origin: from Walla Walla Valley, Columbia Valley, Washington
description: The 2012 Syrah is a full-bodied wine with a deep purple color. Aromas of cassis, dark cherry, smoked meat, smoked meat, blueberry pie, dried herbs, violets and white pepper. On the palate, flavors of blackberries, black cherries, black pepper, smoked meat, cured meats and a touch of pepper. The wine is broad and opulent with round tannins and a long finish.

name: Grapurosso Cabernet Sauvigoz 2015
description: Pairs well with grilled steak, roasted lamb, and aged cheeses. We have the privilege to drink the wine of any given vintage without the use of any oak barrels. We choose only the best grapes from our vineyards in the most prestigious areas, then destalk them, gently pressed them and serve them cold in stainless steel tanks. The wine is then matured for 14 months in French oak barrels and 18 months in stainless steel tanks before bottling.

name: La Felbyades Batrelo Genecorie Semilo Blanco 2013
description: It is a delicious accompaniment to seafood appetizers, salads, fish, and simple pastas. Franciscan Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2011

name: Junzos Proos Toso Suttenleve 2014

name: Lyano Bavia Selecanola 1999
description: and winemaking techniques were used with whole cluster pressing, destemming, low yield fermentation, extended maceration, limited pumping over, limited racking, and ageing in French oak barrels. The wine is a concentrated dark purple with a full bodied, rich flavour palate. The tannins are soft and elegant, with a sweet fruit sensation on the palate and a long finish. The wine has a dark purple core with light garnet hues. It is full bodied, elegant and complex with a pronounced structure of very fine tannins. It has a complex bouquet with a great finesse. The aftertaste is very long and persistent.

name: Ctos du Chella Le Gradet) Reservo Sppo 2003
description: LeGradet is a blend of the two varietals with an emphasis on Cabernet Sauvignon, which produces wines with structure and depth, and Cabernet Franc, which imparts additional finesse.

name: Contalica di Nomivora Vieilla Senilo Nicelto 2008
description: The wine has a lively, deep ruby red color. It has an intense, complex nose with fruity aromas of wild berries and plums. On the palate, it is full-bodied, warm, soft and tasty with an elegant finish.

name: Dolaa Sanno Sigcapha Labiarg Caseleca Dareno 2011
description: A bright ruby color. Intense nose of berry fruit and dried fruit, with notes of spices. Rich and harmonious on the palate, with a sweet, soft tannic structure and a long finish.

name: Rancha Car Brut Bontitino 2003
description: This sparkling wine, made from 100% hand-picked Carneros Pinot Noir, has a golden color with a tinge of green. It is lively and crisp, with an elegant nose of apple and pear. It is smooth and harmonious in the mouth, with a hint of toasted bread and a long finish. This sparkling wine pairs well with grilled chicken, fresh fruit, and any dish that marries well with fresh cream sauces. It also pairs well with any wine with a chocolate base.

name: Paguero Temrra 2013
description: This wine is an intense and bright cherry color. On the nose, it is spicy, with an elegance and balance that is very pleasing. The palate is long and persistent, with ripe tannins that make it rounded and polished.

name: Rebeid Oldbello 2010
description: This wine is made from the traditional grapes of the Garnacha grape, a variety that can grow in complexity and depth in the sandy soils of the palatte. The Garnacha grape, one of the most widely planted in the world, is at its best on the terraced hills of the Sierra de Gredos.

name: Domaine Fosse Serlefierre Cuveep Brut Grand-Bonojalle Saret Rose 2015
origin: from Côtes de Francs, Rhône, France
description: Blend: 100% Chardonnay, this is the first release of this wine, produced exclusively from Pinot Noir grown in the Côtes de Francs sub-region of the Rhône Valley. Deep ruby color, with a rich, creamy texture and long finish. Very promising for this outstanding vintage.

name: Capperots Beaujaly Arbent 2011
description: A great companion to grilled meats, such as T-Bone with braised meat, game and seasoned cheeses. A perfect accompaniment to roasted meats, hearty pasta dishes, duck confit or even, classic recipes like cold roast chicken with rosemary and garlic mashed potatoes.

name: Moagoef Rom Rose Galrama Estate Castelle MelbarNio 2008
description: The wine shows a vibrant salmon color. On the nose, a floral nose of ripe red fruits with a hint of minerality. The palate is fresh and balanced with a long finish.  Calina Reserva Chardonnay 2002 [response] [category_1] Pink and Rosé

name: Gefinato-Saldo Querto 2018
description: Pale yellow color. On the nose, the wine shows aromas of flowers and fruit with a hint of sage. The palate is full and soft, with great balance, and an elegant finish. Pair with starters, pastas, fish and shellfish, and white meats.

name: Anturion Pinot Blanc 2016
description: Intense aromas of pineapple and peach with hints of rosemary. Full-bodied and well balanced with a long finish. A classic, lightly oaky wine, with a fresh, soft finish. The wine has pronounced flavors of ripe pineapple and peach, with a touch of melon and a touch of citrus. It has a fresh, well-balanced acidity and a long finish.

name: Amoneto Chable-Caberret Sauvignon 2012
description: Pale yellow with straw reflections, it has an intense fruity bouquet with evident notes of grapefruit, citrus fruit and jasmine. It is dry, well-balanced and velvety, with a great persistence and a fresh finish.

name: Seprin Cellars Wine Lan Casettarp Sainta Doou Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 vintage is a wine of structure, purity and focus. We blended the fruit from our estate vineyard in Coombsville and the fruit from our Rutherford estate in Rutherford to create the final cuvée.

name: Dancofa Cabernet Mougnoine Cuvee Bacher' Rouge Rose (Villfles 2014
origin: from Côtes du Roussillon, Roussillon, South of France, France
description: This is a gorgeous wine, with a beautiful carmine-pink robe. The nose is immediately seductive, with notes of redcurrants, cherries, and exotic fruits. This wine is full-bodied, smooth and well balanced on the palate, with a long finish.

name: Weechs Sarvar Hill Pinot Noir 2014
description: The nose is floral and spice with a core of dark cherry, blackberry, and dark plum fruit. The wine has a soft entry with a silky texture. This wine showcases a long finish with a hint of earthy, spice and earthy notes. This Pinot Noir will continue to improve through 2026.

name: Clos de lizyg's Resad Barbachies 2008
description: Ruby red with garnet highlights, this wine offers intense aromas of red fruit and spice. On the palate, the wine is balanced and full-bodied, with notes of licorice and plums, and an elegant and smooth finish.

name: Andh Selection Pinot Blanc 2013
description: This wine is light and refreshing with a delightful finish. It has a wonderful bouquet of tropical fruit, lemon peel, and a hint of green apple. On the palate, the wine is crisp, but has a creamy richness and flavors of ripe stone fruit and spice. It is the perfect wine for an aperitifs, pairing well with a variety of foods.

name: J. E Morat Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Deep, dark purple in color, this Cabernet Sauvignon has an intense, rich nose of cherries and black currants, with a hint of spices. On the palate, it has a well-balanced acidity and rounded tannins, with a long, smooth finish.

name: Palsbrey Ruzsioni Mendoi Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The grapes were sourced from the western side of the vineyard, at the extreme north end of the Napa Valley. The soil is volcanic and alluvial. This Cabernet is from two blocks of Cabernet Sauvignon planted in 1973. These ancient vines are now showing their potential. The wine is a full-bodied Cabernet with a classic profile of cassis, black cherries, and berries. It is rich and smooth with a long finish.

name: Leye Syrah Barorenti 1982
description: Deep garnet in color.  Blackberry and cassis dominate the nose with a hint of anise.  Flavors of plum and black cherry dominate the palate.  Rich and mouthfilling with soft tannins.  A long silky finish with toasty oak and fruit.

name: Sangankumbe Ma Ebaina 2000
origin: from Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: and is the winery's first label, produced exclusively from the Barossa Valley Pinot Gris varietal.  The wine is a brilliant garnet in color. The aroma is of a classically dry Pinot Gris with savoury overtones. On the palate, the wine is medium-bodied with a pleasant, long finish. The fresh, soft fruit flavors of the wine are balanced with subtle oak characters.  The wine has pleasant berry fruit flavors and has a lovely soft tannin structure. It is a wine with all the complexities to make it a good wine that can be enjoyed with a wide range of foods.

name: Banfarc Toban Shira Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: Nebbiolo Toscana - the first in the Piedmont region to be produced in the region,Nebbiolo is often described as the ideal wine for everyday drinking. The intense fruit of this wine is complemented by the unique balance that winemaker, Michael Beaulac, achieves with old-vine fruit from the oldest, most naturally-colored vines in the Barolo district. After five vintages, the 1997 vintage shows the ultimate character that the appellation has to give a wine of this quality and the ability to age gracefully.

name: Hernra Thade Ruuds Lafheres Ol Pinet Noir 1999
description: Pairs well with grilled meats, roasts, and even chocolates. In fact, this wine is so good it has become the stand-alone white wine of choice for many richly flavored foods.

name: Alberuls Opre Wheek Pinot Noir 2008
description: The Opre Wheek is the estate's flagship wine. It is sourced from four estate vineyards, including the family's oldest estate. It's made from free-run juice, and shows the perfect balance of fresh fruit and a vibrant, savory character, with a long finish. This is a ripe, lush wine, with plenty of wild berry fruit and spice on the nose. This is a pure expression of the grape, and the excellent structure of the wine allows it to be enjoyed young and fresh, but has the potential to develop nicely for 2-3 years.

name: Ca'O Riosja White Portto Cairezona 2003
description: The 2003 White Portto di Caire is a blend of 80% Tempranillo, 20% Merlot, and 10% Syrah. This wine has a pale/straw color, an expressive nose of spice box, pepper, cedar, and apricots, and a rich, full-bodied palate of peach and melon fruit. This wine has a delicious, long finish, and a few more years in the cellar should add even more complexity and balance. The wine was bottled in July, and should drink well for 2-3 years.

name: Gtlelly Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
origin: from Margaret River, Western Australia, Australia
description: A great accompaniment to red meat dishes or a classic cut of steak, this wine is ideal with richly flavored foods such as braised lamb shanks.  Enjoy with grilled meats, pasta, risotto or cheese.

name: Sewical Taros Sauvignon Blanc 2004
description: The nose is clean and complex with the perfect combination of varietal character and freshness.  The wine is well balanced, with a long and persistent finish.  The grapes from the Casablanca Valley, a region of Chile, provide the intensity and elegance for the wine.

name: Laye Dy loussei 2017
description: The aromas of honeysuckle and fresh-cut grass are supported by a seductive note of lemongrass. The palate is balanced and delicate with a delicately textured and mineral edge. A refreshing and savoury note of lemongrass and a hint of quinine lead to a delicately textured and elegant wine. The finish is long and vibrant, with a deliciously dry and refreshing finish. This wine is a classic Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Viey Rose 2018
origin: from Cotes de Provence, Provence, South of France, France
description: This wine is perfect to drink with seafood, meats, pizza, barbecue, fish, Provençal, Asian and Mediterranean cuisine.   , loads of fresh, deep fruit, flowers, and a bit of mysterious earth and spice. On the palate the wine is savory, fresh, and tart with notes of wild berry, herbs, spice and minerals. Good structure, refreshing and long on the finish.

name: Castelle Cabernet Sabignon 2018
description: Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 11% Petit Verdot, 7% Merlot, 2% Malbec  The deep purple-colored, perfumey 2001 Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley (15%) is a beauty. A sumptuous perfume of cassis, blackberry, black cherry, and black cherry is followed by a rich, full-bodied, chewy, concentrated, velvety wine with loads of black cherry fruit and sweet tannin, and a lengthy finish. It should drink well upon release, but should keep for 3-5 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Chojes Santalcha Cabernet Sauvignon Montaine Blanc 2009
description: Chateau Poujeaux has a very attractive nose with rich aromas of quince, pear and a hint of minerality. It is dry and the finish is long and balanced.

name: SOppuusture Chardonnay 2016
description: This wine is a blend of fruit from several different vineyards. The wine has a light, straw color with golden highlights. The nose is filled with tropical fruit, pear and honeydew melon with a hint of pineapple. The wine fills the mouth with a medley of fruit and creaminess that is balanced by the bright acidity and good structure. The finish is long and fruity with tropical fruit and pear flavors.

name: Clicheli Chardonnay 1999
description: This wine has a light straw color. Aromas of citrus, spice and tropical fruit are combined with vanilla and a hint of toasty oak. On the palate the wine is nicely balanced with a lovely, long finish.  This wine pairs well with anything light. A delicious aperitif or pair with seafood, salads, poultry or pasta with cream sauces.

name: Carcori Mabbeccia Reserda 1099
description: Mabbeccia, made in the traditional Brunello style, is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Sangiovese, and Cabernet Franc.  It is a wine with great finesse, excellent structure, and great depth of flavor.  It is deep ruby red in color with a bouquet of spice and fruit. On the palate, it is rich and persistent with flavors of ripe fruit and chocolate. It is recommended with roasted and grilled red meat, game, and aged cheeses.

name: Nieif Deyo Pouli Dol Parassicot Grenacher Reserva Maczelle Blanc Riuge 1997
description: , the wine shows intense varietal character, with aromas of apple, honey, spice and a hint of minerality. It is well balanced, with a long, soft finish. A great wine to pair with a range of foods, from seafood and mild cheeses to pasta, poultry and even spicy Asian dishes.

name: Folbents Markson Coasttaree Sonome Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The 2014 marks the first release of this single vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon. It is a lush and seductive wine that is filled with blackberries, cherries, cassis, and sandalwood. It is lush and inviting with soft tannins and a long finish. The palate is expressive and savory with an exotic edge. This vintage is drinking well now, but will continue to improve with time in the cellar.

name: Dubaine Chablis-Munsailnseux Dolpilganes Chuviail 2016
description: Chateau Margaux-Lavau Domaine de la Vougeraie Chablis 2014 [response] [category_1] White Wine Cellar Selection

name: Verty Dubagne Cavee Puefrigns Cellars Estate Blanc 1995

description: , this is a truly unique cuvée from Vermentino's home region in the south of France. It's a wine that is deeply fruity and soft, with a luscious mouthfeel and an elegant, long finish.  It is a blend of 50% Vermentino, 20% Sauvignon Blanc and 20% Viognier, the wine was bottled unfined and unfiltered.

name: Salan Winemagne Merinas Phooson Pinot Noir 2015
description: It is a lovely, deep ruby red color with light glints of garnet. The nose is intense and fruity, with a hint of toast. The mouth is soft, with a great balance between tannins and acidity. It is long, with a great finesse and a lovely, silky finish.

name: Kidg Aesone Chardonnay 2015
description: The Chardonnay grapes from this area have a fresh and fruity nose, with aromas of pears and peaches. The wine is nicely balanced, with a pleasant acidity and a soft finish. It pairs well with seafood and white meat dishes.

name: TAVino Marbano Caberget Pinot Noir 2016
description: This wine is a perfect partner for richly flavored meats and hearty pasta dishes., intense dark fruit, spice, cassis and smoky oak flavors, with a round and opulent texture on the palate.  We are proud to present the wines of Tuscany, Italy and France.  We are proud to present the wines of Tuscany to the north and south of France.  We are proud to present the wines of Tuscany, the region of France where the grapes are grown and vinified by the people of Tuscany.  The wines of Tuscany are renowned for their finesse, elegance, balance, and good varietal character.

name: Argranzo Sedrazi Vina Granrico Toscana Terlin Blancos des Chardonnay 2013
description: Pale straw color with greenish highlights. Intense and complex with aromas of pineapple, citrus and nuts. Very persistent and fresh, with great balance and minerality. Vina Granrico is a blend of two of the most traditional white grape varieties, Chardonnay and Viognier.

name: El Cobello Estate Pinot Noir 2013
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2013 Pinot Noir shows a deep ruby color. The nose is filled with black cherry, cedar, and spice. Flavors of cherry, spice, and cola are followed by a long, rich finish. This is a rich and elegant Pinot Noir that will continue to evolve for 10+ years. Pairs well with salmon, duck, and game.

name: Bermresd Stapciet Coasteran Estate Montot Pinot Noir 2003
description: The 2003 vintage was an outstanding year with a long growing season. We fermented the fruit naturally with natural yeast, hand punched down three to six times daily and aged for 18 months in French oak barrels. The wine shows a rich garnet color with a nose of violets, black cherries, and spice. This Pinot Noir shows great finesse on the palate with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Karnati Mont Werliuma Seluck Winery Winery Chardonnay 2015
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: Pale gold in the glass with aromas of lemon peel, honeydew and a hint of ginger. The palate is nicely balanced with flavors of white peach and fresh cut melon. The finish is clean and crisp.

name: Flentaming Omil Sauvee Anseriitarer Bararino 2008
description: A great pairing with red meat, game, and aged cheeses. Deep garnet in color with ruby highlights, this wine shows inviting aromas of wild berries and sweet spices. Full bodied with velvety tannins, this wine has a great structure, with layers of dark berry fruit and a long, persistent finish. A wine to savor while young, but also excellent as an everyday wine to enjoy with food.

name: Shaha Cannont Chardonnay 2017
description: The grapes are hand harvested at night to fully ripen and gently pressed to a stainless steel tank. The juice is then transferred to French oak barrels for fermentation. After malolactic fermentation, the wine is racked into barrels for secondary fermentation to finish its malolactic fermentation. A soft, silky wine with a rich, creamy texture.

name: Gricquidgcum Vista Zinfandel 2015
description: The wine is medium garnet in color, with aromas of ripe strawberry and cherry. On the palate, it is bright and fruity, with some spicy notes and a smooth finish.,Domaine de la Vougeraie Vougeot Le Clos du Prieure Monopole Rouge 2016 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Pinot Noir [category_2] Other Red Blends [origin]  from Vougeot, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France

name: Toratello Castella 2000
description: A wine of character with a pleasing combination of richness and freshness. The perfumes are fresh and fruity with scents of woodland berries. The taste is dry, warm and harmonious with a slightly almond-like finish.  Pairs well with pastas, pizzas, risottos as well as the classic Italian dishes and cheeses.

name: Fondey Sparson Cabernet Sauvignon/Syrah 2007
description: The 2007 Sparson is a blend of Cabernet Sauvignon ( 81%) and Syrah (14%) with a touch of Merlot (2%) and Petit Verdot (2%) from the Estate Vineyard (2,100 ft elevation) in the cool Paso Robles appellation. It exhibits aromas of black cherry, plum and cassis. The wine is full bodied, with flavors of cassis, dark chocolate and vanilla. It is nicely balanced with a long finish of spice and toasty oak.

name: Calunasodi Minzega Fontingla Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Blend: 85% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot, vivacious purple in color, rich aromas of blackberry, licorice and smoky oak. Soft, round and velvety on the palate, with polished tannins, it has a long, persistent finish. This wine is delicious to drink now, but it will continue to improve for 3-5 years. It can be enjoyed with red meats, game, pasta, risotto, pizza, pizza or any kind of cheese. This wine is great with everyday meals. Enjoy!

name: Columa Chabfis Tewtharpini 2017
description: Blend: 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Sangiovese, 10% Cabernet Franc St. Innocent Freedom Hill Chardonnay 2012 [response] [category_1] White Wine

name: Artonney Rieslina Zinfandel 2007
description: This 2007 Riesling is a rich and flavorful wine.  Flavors of ripe black cherry, dark plums, raspberry and pomegranate dominate the nose and palate. The bright and fruity character continues through the palate, supported by just a touch of sweetness. The finish is long and lush with balanced acidity and soft tannins. This is a delicious, easy-to-drink wine perfect to serve with a wide range of foods, from classic Mediterranean fare to spicy Asian dishes.  Enjoy this wine with a variety of cheeses from Spain to Asian, and even with sushi.

name: Geytinasmera Gebargu Serriofale Sanomase 2003
description: A beauty. This is the wine that shows the personality of the variety, a rich, layered, fruity wine with the deep flavors of black cherries, plums, and spices. Full-bodied, with excellent structure and good tannin for a wide range of wines, it is a tasty, rich, chewy wine. This should evolve nicely and keep for 3-4 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Kentouteral Treoder Verlot 2017
description: The Kentouteral style is one of elegance, power and complexity. This wine has notes of spice and a complex minerality which leads into a long, rich finish. This wine has a great ageing potential. Chateau Troplong Mondot (Futures Pre-Sale) 2018 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Red Wine [category_2] Bordeaux Red Blends [origin]  from St. Emilion, Bordeaux, France

name: Scrit Estate's Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: The 2003 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is the first wine I made in my native New York, and the first wine I made in the Napa Valley. This is a rich, full-bodied wine with deep color, aromas of black cherries and spice, and a lush, smooth palate. Flavors of black cherries, plums, and dark chocolate are complemented by a touch of sweet oak and smooth tannins. The finish is long and fruity. I was surprised by how well this Cabernet ages. The 2003 vintage is drinking well right now, but I feel it will continue to improve with a few more years in the bottle.

name: Groigoos Estate Rose 2012
description: The color of the 2012 Groigoos Rosé is a light, brilliant salmon. Fresh aromas of watermelon, rose petals, and hibiscus flowers, followed by a palate of strawberries, lychee nuts and a hint of mineral. The finish is long and refreshing. Made from organic grapes, the wine has a light, crisp, refreshing mouthfeel.

name: Nenpona Entraghle 2013
description: The deep garnet color of theEntre-Deux-Tinto 2013 is an inviting introduction to the complex, luscious, mouth-filling aromas of blackberries, plums, and black cherries. In the mouth, the wine shows remarkable structure and depth, as well as a lively, fresh, and fruity palate with a long, pleasant finish.

name: Martink Estate Velpredite Zinfandel Rose 2010
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2011 VelPredite Zinfandel Rosé has a lovely floral nose of rose petal, crushed fennel, white peach, and dried herbs. On the palate, the wine is bright and vibrant with notes of strawberry, white pepper, and a hint of orange zest. The finish is long and pleasant, with the flavors of rosemary and fresh ginger.

name: Wilroriato Marrellom Estate Blanc 2009
description: Pale yellow color with golden hues. Intense, very aromatic, with tropical fruits and a slight hint of jasmine. Full-bodied, with a round, soft mouthfeel, it has a persistent finish. The 2009 vintage is a very good wine that is ready to drink now, but should evolve nicely in bottle. It is a soft, tasty wine, full of character, with loads of fresh fruit, the perfect wine to serve with seafood, fish, and rice dishes. It is also a great wine to drink with vegetables and fruits salad, as well as light cheeses.

name: Shantoas Capelloli Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: This wine pairs well with a variety of lighter dishes such as pizza, pasta or risotto, and can also go well with grilled meats and poultry. A Cabernet Sauvignon-based wine that is best enjoyed with grilled steak, barbeque ribs, roast beef, duck and game.

name: Boryy Tchso Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
origin: from McLaren Vale, South Australia, Australia
description: The 2007 Tchso is a classic McLaren Vale Cabernet Sauvignon that is very fragrant with blueberry, cassis, cherry, violets and a hint of mint. This is a full bodied wine with the pure flavors of blackberry, cassis, plum, and a hint of mint and sweet French oak. The tannins are firm, yet velvety. This is a wine that can be enjoyed now but will continue to evolve for at least 3-5 years.

name: Gollua Vinazis Pinot Gris 2018
description: The wine is characterized by an elegant straw-yellow color. It has an intense and fruity nose with the floral notes of jasmine and the fruity aromas of peach. The structure is balanced, full and generous. The finish is long and pleasantly mineral.

name: Sojal Roipal Chardonnay 2014
origin: from Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: The 2014 Ro Princis Chardonnay is rich and focused with aromas of lemon peel, green apple and pears. The palate is full and soft with a bright mouthfeel and flavors of Granny Smith apples and citrus. Sojal's signature mineral notes of wet stone and slate highlight the wine. This Chardonnay is one of the most balanced and elegant vintages of the Santa Lucia Highlands.

name: Licotas Trauste Brut Reserva 2004
description: Ideal as an aperitif or to accompany shellfish, fish, rice and white meats. The 2004 Treixas de la Plana Crianza is a blend of 65% Xarel-lo, 30% Macabeo, 10% Parellada and 5% Parellada. This is a creamy, velvety wine with a deep golden color. It has a lovely bouquet of toast, smoke, toast and spice. On the palate the wine is full-bodied and harmonious, with notes of toast and fruit. This is a complex, balanced, intense wine with a long, elegant finish. This is a wine of great finesse.

name: Stonello des Cabernon Sauvignon 2001
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon shows the strength and elegance of a Napa Valley Cabernet, with abundant fruit and good structure. Black cherry, currant and spice lead the charge on the nose, while the soft tannins round out the flavors of ripe cherries, cassis, and a subtle earthiness.

name: Annentori Mirano Biroro di Barolo 2014
description: Ruby red with garnet reflections. Nose of red fruit, spices, leather, licorice, and vanilla. Warm, soft, and persistent on the palate, with velvety tannins.

name: Bodegas Tycia Oritasset Minso 2016
origin: from Mino District, Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: Deep garnet in color, this wine is expressive with aromas of fresh black cherry, raspberry, and plum. On the palate, it is lush with layers of ripe red fruit with hints of spice. Soft, velvety tannins balance the full fruit for a lush, silky finish.

name: El Vineyards Chardonnay 1997
description: The 1997 Chardonnay has a bright, light straw color. The nose shows citrus and tropical fruit with a hint of vanilla and toasty oak. The mouthfeel is full and rich with lemon and green apple flavors, and a touch of spice. The finish is long and full with soft, round tannins. Our 1997 Chardonnay is a wonderful accompaniment to grilled halibut topped with fruit salsa. -Dan Cederquist, Winemaker

name: Rustioni Granson Cabernet Sauvignon 1095
description: Intense, ruby-red color. Vivid, rich, and elegant aromas. A full bodied, generous wine, packed with intense aromas of blackberry, blueberry, and cassis, with a hint of vanilla. Well-balanced with a lingering finish. A great wine to be paired with grilled meats and cheeses.

name: Benichopi Merlot 1997
description: Merlot is an excellent partner for the traditional pasta of the Langhe, the traditional accompaniment to the wine of the region, as well as the local cuisine of the Veneto, as well as the typical Mediterranean dishes.  It is excellent with any meal and with soups.

name: Nogtone Bendiane Vinaso 2017
description: Intense ruby color. The nose is fruity and floral with notes of red fruit and spices. The wine has a fresh, balanced flavor and good structure.  , one of the best values in the market place. Intense and elegant, with an abundance of pleasant fruit, it has a great potential, and it's time to take on a glass of this wine with friends. We recommend drinking it with care. It is an out-of-body wine, and the ideal companion for a wide range of dishes.

name: Logged Mogniol Merlot 1999
description: logged Merlot is a rich and full-bodied wine, displaying sweet, ripe dark berry fruit, spice, and toasty oak. This wine has firm tannins, making it a perfect match with richly-flavored dishes. This wine is a delight to drink now, but will continue to develop complexity in the years to come.

name: Angate Dey Winery Rede Wines Hose Lustit 2003
description: The 2003 vintage of the Hose Lustit Vineyard is a blend of the lighter red varieties in the table of the California appellation. It is a wine with delicious aromas of fresh strawberries, cherries, and plums, along with a hint of nutmeg and an earthy component. Flavors of red fruits and pomegranate are complemented by a touch of mocha and vanilla. This medium-bodied wine is rich and viscous, with a round, creamy texture and a smooth, supple finish.

name: Thee Montadi Mabbitia (1.0L)
description: Deep, ruby red in color with purple highlights, it shows a nose of black cherry, dried herbs and sweet spices. On the palate, it is full-bodied and velvety, with layers of dried cherries, raspberries and cassis.

name: Polles Brotta Rotiondesses Petande 2015
description: Blend: 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot The Pollard family has been making wine since 1998 in the Langhe and, with its traditional winemaking techniques, producing a wine that is well balanced, round and harmonious with soft tannins. The result is a wine of great charm and finesse. The wine has a beautiful dark purple color, and a concentrated nose of ripe fruit and a pleasant hint of spice. The fruit is predominant, with a touch of sweet plums, sweet cherries, and a hint of toasty oak. In the mouth, the wine is smooth and harmonious, with a long finish and great balance.

name: Bieras Duda Cresco Pona Labby Morlacce Blancadiono Labonno 2009
description: Blend: 40% Albillo, 20% Garnacha Blanca, 20% Syrah, 10% Muscat,

name: Marchine Tobarito Pasca 2009
description: The 2009 Pasca is a dark purple color. It has a nose of fresh cherries, ripe blackberries, black pepper and spice. On the palate the wine is full and rich, with notes of cherries, plums, and cedar. It has a silky and round mouthfeel, with a spicy, lingering finish.

name: Tusta's Marsigpalico 2012
description: Ruby red color. Intense and complex on the nose, with notes of black fruits, balsamic notes and spice. Balanced and harmonious on the palate, with good structure and excellent balance between fruit, tannin and oak. The finish is long and pleasant.

name: Roaden Matio Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: It is a big, bold Cabernet with a classic profile. Ripe and juicy, with lots of plum and berry fruit, it shows a complex range of flavors, with spice and herbal notes. A touch of toasty oak adds dimension and depth. The soft, ripe tannins make it easy to drink and easy to enjoy. A great match with red meat dishes, pasta with red sauce, risotto and pizza.

name: Smankels Niyer Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The Shiraz component of the blend is rich and concentrated, with a deep purple/black color. The Merlot component of the wine is soft and fleshy, with hints of pepper and spice. The Cabernet component is distinctively Australian, with a black core and a purple rim. The wine has a nose of dark berry fruit, a sweetish fruitcake character, and a full-bodied, supple palate. A sweetish fruitcake character, balanced with an elegant tannin structure, delivers a long, savoury finish with a hint of toasty oak.

name: Auwandory Riserve Chardonnay 2005
origin: from Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: Aroma: The bouquet shows rich characters of stone-fruits, with subtle nuttiness. Nuances of cashew, and a hint of toasty French oak.

name: Ravey Estatule Clibing Redige Cambernot Sauvignon Blanc 2015
description: The 2015 vintage is our most unique and complex blend to date. Aromas of yellow peach, melon, and a hint of citrus with a slight hint of green tea. The palate is long and full with flavors of peach and melon. The finish is very long and balanced, with a refreshing acidity and mineral note.

name: Friqut Riigne Blanc 2018
description: A great companion for appetizers, first courses and seafood.  Cuvee Blanc, a very versatile wine that goes well with many different kinds of food, even with simple and simple dishes such as starters, hors d'oeuvres, seafood, fish, poultry, and Asian-style white meat dishes. It is excellent with Asian and indigenous Chinese dishes as well as the classic turkey, chicken and pork dishes.

name: Eligny Ot Valley Chiant Montewrali Rades Caullgia Zinfandel 2015
origin: from Cienega Valley, Central Coast, California
description: Pairs well with red meat, richly flavored pastas or vegetarian dishes. It is also a great pairing with cheese, especially creamy or buttery quality.

name: Burghan Vines Pinot Grigio 2018
description: Pairs well with seafood appetizers, pasta, poultry, white meats and cheeses. Delicato Merlot-based omelet, veal escalope stuffed with truffles, roasted duck, pheasant and wild boar patat.

name: Minch Rice andonce Rosso Vinotaser 2018
description: The 2018 vintage is a mouth-watering blend of a richly perfumed, fruit-forward wine with a creamy body. Flavors of Meyer lemons, pears and stone fruit, with a delightfully crisp and clean finish. Pair this vibrant wine with a wide range of fare.

name: Bodegas Hariento Series Chardonnay 2016
description: It is a perfect example of the best that the region can give Chardonnay to this varietal. The nose is filled with white flowers and citrus, and on the palate the wine is fresh, with a long, mineral finish.

name: Wanta Syrah Enade Reserva Sighe M 2007
description: The wine is a purple-black with a dark core. On the nose, there are ripe fruit and smoky notes, with a touch of spice. The palate is full and rich with dark berries and some spice, followed by a long finish.

name: Debas Coteau Antate 2015
description: Blend: 50% Monastrell, 20% Syrah, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon The wine has a deep purple robe with a violet edge. On the nose, it shows attractive aromas of ripe cherries and plums, with a touch of spice and vanilla. On the palate, the wine is rich, with fresh fruit flavors of cherries and berries, complemented by herbal notes. Its soft tannins, full body, and long finish make it a great match with red meat, pasta, pizza, and lamb.

name: Band Pamieltt Sauvignon Blanc
description: Aromas of fresh cut grass, juniper and green fig. Intense and full-bodied on the palate, with hints of mint, green melon and a distinct, mineral note. The finish is long and persistent.

name: Cosque Bllord Rodeoge 2013
description: This wine is full of finesse and balance.  With a rich dark color, it has an elegant nose with spicy notes and lots of fruit. It has a very well balanced palate with a long finish. The wine is a blend of Carinyena, Garnacha, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah.

name: Beaseli Avoaton Monaitily Rupi Valley Coast Syrah 2014
description: This is the wine of the family! From the highest parts of the valley the wine comes the fruit for this soft, easy-to-drink wine. A rich, dark purple color, this Syrah is loaded with jammy blackberry fruit. Rich and full-bodied, this wine is balanced with soft tannins, making it a perfect wine to drink on a warm spring day.

name: Terner Binks Zinfandel 2014
description: Pairs well with grilled meats, pizza and pastas.   Pair with BBQ beef short ribs or pizza with meat toppings.  Try with BBQ chicken, asparagus or a hearty pasta sauce. , fruit salad with meat toppings and cheese sauce, pizza and pasta with meat toppings.

name: Bellard Valley Winery Ricge Moontaminer 2014
origin: from Moontano, Roussillon, South of France, France
description: Deep garnet-red color. On the nose, the wine reveals aromas of blackcurrant, blackberry and redcurrant. On the palate, the wine is rich and smooth with silky tannins.

name: La Mallarico Pagel Merlot 2016
description: Enjoy on its own or pair with roasted meats and pastas with meat sauces. , the wine is made from organic grapes from vineyards farmed by the Domaine. The grapes are hand harvested, sorted, destemmed, destemmed and gently pressed. It is aged in French and American oak barrels for 18 months. The wine is then aged for 6 months. It has a lovely, deep purple color. The aromas are of fresh, ripe plums, cherries, and raspberries. On the palate the wine shows finesse and softness with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Tensanie Russian Micave (375ML half-bottle) 2003
description: This is a blend of Syrah (70%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (30%) aged in small French oak barrels.  The wine has a dark color with a nose of spice and black cherry.  On the palate, the Syrah component is balanced by the plum and cherry notes and the Cabernet components provide structure and depth.

name: Camailii Riadi Melly Sonta Sangico (2 Koferlet Sauvagne Voit 2013
description: Blend: 75% Sangiovese, 25% Canaiolo, 5% Colorino  Pairs well with hearty foods like roasted or braised meats, game and cheese.

name: Pumparello Estate 2013
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 24% Petite Verdot, 17% Cabernet Sauvignon The Petite Sirah, Cabernet Franc, Merlot and Petite Sirah, along with the chocolate and vanilla notes from the wine's ageing in oak barrels. On the palate the wine is rich and complex with aromas of plum, cherry, currant, and a touch of chocolate and toasty oak. This wine is full bodied, concentrated and has a smooth tannin structure.  This wine is a blend of the finest lots from the winery. The wine's label depicts a photo of mummified 16th-century Cardinal in Palermo, Italy. The photo's sense of power is reflected in the wine's name.

name: Carlero Ole Edo Pobdamley Prozered Sontakeulle Pinot Gris 2001
description: This vineyard, owned by David and Wendy O' Tirage, has produced a delicious, crisp wine. It has the texture of pear and apple tart, a rich mouth feel from barrel fermentation, and a lingering finish from the spiciness of the wine. It has a wonderful balance between fruit and acidity. It is ready to drink now, but should continue to improve for a decade.

name: Mesoure Naigk 467 Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: The grapes for this Cabernet Sauvignon come from the prestigious La Colina district of the Colonia district. Deep red color. On the nose, the wine shows a complex bouquet of vanilla, spices and oak. A smooth mouthfeel with concentrated flavors of black berries, spices and vanilla. This Cabernet Sauvignon is well balanced with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Wess Rungsal Winere Merlot 1999
description: This 1999 Merlot is a beautiful wine with deep garnet tones.  Ripe cherries, plums, and blackberries dominate the nose with a hint of mint.  The palate is full and rich with lush fruit, and a hint of toasty oak.  Pair with grilled meats, hearty pasta dishes, and mild cheeses.

name: Marihs Estate Grenace Chardonnay 2013
description: The 2013 Marihaus Estate Grenache shows aromas of citrus, tropical fruit and apple. On the palate, the wine is rich and round with a hint of butterscotch that is balanced by the crisp acidity and minerality from the cool climate. The finish is long and mineral-laden, leaving a lingering impression of tropical fruit and citrus.

name: La Noht Ettate Rhone Vineyard Pinot Noir 1999
description: The Ettate Estate Bottled Estate Bottled Estate Bottled Estate Bottled Estate Pinot Noir is a rich, full-bodied wine with an elegant bouquet of cherries, berries, and spice.  On the palate, the wine shows great structure and depth, with loads of rich fruit and spice. The tannins are soft and the wine has great balance. This wine is an example of the perfect terroir for growing Pinot Noir in the Santa Lucia Highlands.

name: Prypenila Colles Cabernet Sauvignon (haanf-bott) 2015
origin: from Howell Mountain, Napa Valley, California
description: Blend: 79% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 7% Cabernet Franc

name: Domaine Dobain Laux Losontes Masies Parevanc Soutiare 2018
origin: from Parel, Roussillon, South of France, France
description: , has a complex bouquet, rich and very expressive, with exotic fruit flavors (citrus, lychees) and hints of vanilla. Its smooth and rounded attack in the mouth gives way to an exceptional sensation of fullness in the mouth, with a long aftertaste and great balance. It is a rich wine, with great potential. It will develop in the bottle for 5 to 10 years.

name: Moldinere Voutanne Ruad Heureut 2001
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: , buty and stylish, with a delightful nose of figs, honey and caramel. The flavors are a mix of passion fruit and figs, with a spicy edge to them, and a light smokiness with just a touch of pepper. This wine has a creamy texture, full body and a lovely finish.

name: Nivion Ridgalillu Norch Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: A straw color with greenish hues. The nose is very complex, with citrus fruit, a hint of grass, and a light herbal touch. The palate is long, with a hint of sweetness, and a fresh, balanced acidity. It is a wine with a long and persistent finish.

name: Tenchorn Capouin Pinot Noir 2015
description: This deep ruby red colored Pinot Noir has a rich, earthy nose of ripe black cherries, and a hint of spice. On the palate the fruit is predominant, with an underlying earthiness and the oak well balanced. This is a classic example of a classic Pinot Noir from the area, with elegance and finesse. The tannins are firm, but the overall impression is one of understated power and length.

name: Strockone Merlot 2002
description: This Merlot is a blend of select lots from the renowned Napa Valley. The wine is a rich and complex Merlot with a deep color, excellent tannin structure and a long finish.  It has a nose of spice, cedar and cherry-like fruitiness. The flavors are of black cherry, currant and dark chocolate. The structure of the wine will allow it to stand up to many, many fine cuisine.

name: Rivitt Dromain Cabarnet Sauvignon 2008
description: The 2008 Dromain is a classic expression of this celebrated region, the hillside estate vineyard.  The nose is filled with an elegant bouquet of black cherry, cassis, plum, and

name: Zenaltonn Kanses The Vineyard Pinot Noir 2013
origin: from Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: The 2013 Kanses has a deep, rich purple color. On the nose, aromas of black cherry, rosemary and spice lead into notes of vanilla and espresso. The palate is rich and smooth with flavors of blueberry pie, black cherry, sandalwood and hints of mint and vanilla. The finish is long and silky. This wine will age well over the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Beter Palleyger Barontietle Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
origin: from Diamond Mountain District, Napa Valley, California
description: The wine is very deep garnet in color with aromas of black cherry, black pepper, cassis, and vanilla. On the palate, it is layered with jammy blackberry, black pepper, cedar, and chocolate notes. It has a rich and full body, yet exhibits finesse and elegance, with polished tannins and a long finish.

name: Trriela Charcon 2006
description: The 2006 Charcon is a soft and juicy, fruity white wine with a touch of minerality and an elegant finish. It is light, refreshing, and easy to drink. This white wine has a bright yellow color and a fruity, fresh nose. It is fruity, fresh, and easy to drink. It is a light, refreshing, and easy to drink wine.

name: Kig Fawanico Pese Blanc 2012
description: A crisp and dry white wine with intense aromas and flavors of crisp apples, fresh pears, and peaches with delicate floral notes of jasmine and gardenias. A delightful aperitif and a delicious match for a wide range of foods.

name: Domaine de les Stpmato Palles Filghand Provbiono Selec 2013
origin: from Cotes du Rhone, Rhone, France
description: , the winery strives for a terroir-driven wine that is not over-oaked and may be a good example of the appellation.

name: Bodegari Berghe Dux Reserva Sargege 2001
description: Bouquet: Notes of spice and berry fruits. Taste: full, warm, soft but dry with an exceptional finish., but with great potential. The wine is deep garnet in color with light shades of violet.  The bouquet is rich and concentrated, with refined scents of woodland berries, currants and spice.  The wine is full-bodied, with a complex structure and excellent balance.  The finish is warm and lingering, with an excellent aromatic aftertaste.  It is a great match with roasted meats, game and aged cheeses.

name: Bronkoffing 2000
description: The 2000 Bronkofing has a deep purple/ brick red colour. The nose is vibrant with berry fruit, with a hint of varietal Sauvignon Blanc. The palate is full and rich, with fine tannin structure. A classic Australian Sauvignon Blanc that will benefit from careful cellaring.

name: Inge la Chardonnay 2013
description: Bright, clear straw color. Intense, complex and clean aromas, with notes of white fruit, green apples, and mineral notes. Fresh, dry, with a great balance between acidity and sugar.  Calina Reserva Chardonnay 2000 [response] [category_1] White Wine

name: Castoned's Calemaine Carunta Petit delle Valla Caspal Julavionte 2016
description: The grapes for the Calemaine Carunta have been selected from the oldest and most traditional plots of vines in the region. They are planted with a high percentage of Tempranillo (Tempranillo) blended with a small amount of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc, which are aged separately for 12 months in French and American oak barrels. This wine is then aged for another 12 months in bottle before release.

name: Layed Estatelt Wirgenos Verney Merlot 2015
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2015 PlumpJack Merlot opens with aromas of cedar, spice, and black cherry. On the palate, it is round, soft and supple with dark fruit, and dark chocolate. This wine has a full, rich mouthfeel with a long finish.

name: Medelbsro Estate Ress 200 Ibieilla 2014
description: The wine is a blend of Garnacha, Syrah, and Carinena.  The Garnacha and Carinena grapes are fermented in small stainless steel tanks and aged for 18 months in French oak barrels. The wine is full bodied, yet balanced with soft tannins and a smooth finish.

name: Pones Fergonie Peuler Santosso Emuriau Diere Cote des Sainteres 2017
description: Deep ruby red color. On the nose, aromas of wild berry fruits, spices and fresh herbs. Full-bodied, balanced and with a long finish. This wine pairs well with grilled steak, chicken curry, and beef empanadas.

name: Domainef Estate Growlrguge 2007
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The red-violet color of this wine leads us into a ripe, red fruit bouquet with light hints of spices. The palate is rich, soft and velvety with great structure. This is a wine for the entire meal.

name: Rungol Lucett Barnar The dese 2017
description: The 2017 vintage is a wine with a deep purple colour, and a nose of fresh berries, spices and herbs. On the palate, it is full and fruity, with a rich and round structure and loads of berries, herbs and spice. It has a long finish.

name: Mottablia Mosco Reserva 2000
description: The Mottablia Mosco Reserva is a wine with a brilliant pale-straw color, an intense, rich nose of honeysuckle, ripe peach and exotic fruits, complemented by notes of almonds and a subtle floral component. The palate is well-balanced, elegant, intense and persistent, with an exceptional fresh acidity and remarkable mineral elements. The sweetly spicy finish is beautifully crafted, delighting the palate.

name: Berleaig Ravo d'Arlia Medota Valborsile do Graneste 2006
description: The color of the wine is deep and intense, almost impenetrable. On the nose, the wine shows intense aromas of ripe black fruits with notes of tobacco, cedar and toasted notes from the barrels. On the palate, the tannins are firm and the fruit is concentrated and shows an amazing balance, with excellent structure and a long, persistent finish.

name: Dapiani Gord Shiin Blano 2018
description: Blend: 45% Pinot Grigio, 45% Riesling, 5% Muscat,Wine Spots Napa Valley Chardonnay 2015 [response] [category_1] White Wine.com

name: Keuf Family Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The color of the 2015 Keuf Cabernet Sauvignon is a rich garnet red. The nose is expressive and complex, with notes of dried herbs, black cherry, raspberries, and cassis. The wine fills the palate with a smooth and velvety texture, ripe fruit, and a hint of spice. The tannins are soft and well-integrated, and the finish is long and smooth.

name: Ocot Hargstaniash Riesling 2004
description: The fruit is sourced from several vineyards throughout the region, with some fruit from the Wairau Valley, others from the Mudgee and Upper Hunter.  The wine has a lovely fruit intensity with peach and apricot aromas and a clean, refreshing palate.

name: Simswarg Winery Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
origin: from Diamond Mountain District, Napa Valley, California
description: This wine is a complex and elegant wine, offering a beautiful blend of fresh fruit from the winery’s estate vineyard as well as fruit from the other side of the estate vineyard. A great balance between fruit from the valley floor and the earthy minerality from the valley floor, this wine is rich and expressive, with a fleshy mouthfeel and a lengthy finish.

name: Silver Sp Valley Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: and will continue to improve through 2017. The wine is full-bodied and bold, with concentrated black fruit flavors and a strong backbone of tannin, the tannin giving the wine structure and a long, concentrated finish. This is a wine that will benefit greatly from cellaring and should continue to drink well for at least a decade.

name: Aldoiy Bin Thambeur TGusdranz 2014
description: This deep red wine has a garnet color with shades of light brick. On the nose, this wine shows intense aromas of black cherries, plums, sweet spices and a hint of mint. On the palate, the wine is well balanced, complex, with great structure, and a long finish.

name: J. Roh Haillus Resarle de Pinot Grigio 1999
description: This is a Pinot Grigio from the highest altitude vineyards in the D.O.C.G.H. zone.  Almondine, clayey and smoky aromas are prominent.  The crisp, clean acidity in the mouth is balanced by a pleasant fruitiness.  A great alternative white wine from the classic Pinot Grigio grape!

name: Parzoadto Sansa Ulbinot Cabernet Sauvignon 20095
description: Deep ruby color with aromas of blueberry, black cherry, smoke, licorice, and chocolate. The palate is balanced with dark berries, cherry cola, and cedar, with silky tannins and a long finish.

name: Jellamilla Ala Louset Presquet 2015
description: The 2016 Lousèsé is a blend of old vine fruit from Mas d’enier, Salnes, Garnacha, and Macabeo. The Sauvignon Blanc component is sourced from the Vinya del Priorat district. The Garnacha component is sourced from the Mas d’enier region. The Macabeo component is sourced from the Garnacha and the Sauvignon Blanc component is sourced from the steep slopes of the hillside vineyards.

name: Joedun Vineyaud Chateauneuf-du-Pape Chassaine 2001
origin: from Chassagne-Montrachet, Cote de Beaune, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: Tensley Capitel Estate Chardonnay 2002 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] White Wine [category_2] Chardonnay [origin]  from Chassagne-Montrachet, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France

name: Alpaminierde Orrion Syrah 2003
description: The 2003 Pinot Noir is a blend of 90% Syrah and 10% Tempranillo, aged in 2-3-year-old French and Hungarian oak. Opaque purple-colored, it offers a perfume of smoke, charcoal, spice box, and blueberry. This leads to a silky, elegant, pure, medium to full-bodied wine with a layered palate of black cherry, spice, and sweet tannin. This is a wine to drink over the next 2-3 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Stegelra Valley Pinot Noir 2007
description: This Pinot Noir has a wonderful bouquet of violets, berry fruit, and a hint of spice. Flavors of red cherries and berries, with a touch of minerality, are balanced with silky tannins and a mouth-filling texture. This wine has great aging potential.

name: Willemagne Nupity Estate Beumu Reds Inlianganak R'Astijo 2008
description: The bouquet is reminiscent of spice, blackberries, and violets. The palate is rich, yet delicate and delicate, with fine tannins and a lush texture. A superb vintage to be paired with richly flavored foods.

name: Hant Blocket Astarcaino Roseaf Pinot Blanc 2006
description: The Ast Crane Rose is a wine of a light salmon color with a fresh, fruity bouquet of green apples and pears. It is dry, medium bodied, dry and crisp on the palate.

name: Metitaro 2016
description: Deep cherry color. Intense aromas of ripe fruit, with hints of toasted oak. Full-bodied, warm and rounded with soft tannins, ripe fruit, and good length.

name: Vina Piet Folliserale Alrvolo del's Vill Fervach  916
description: Intense garnet-red color with a violet edge. Red fruit aromas of cherry and blackberry, with spicy, toasted notes. Harmonious and round tannins, with a long finish.

name: Gardina Malboed Chabliin Mountqyeux 2012
description: Deep, intense red color with violet hues. Deep and complex, the wine shows aromas of ripe black fruits, violets, and berries with spicy notes of black pepper and cinnamon. Its mineral dimension is reminiscent of graphite, with notes of black pepper and clove. The palate is full and velvety, with sweet tannins and a lush, rounded texture.

name: Domieul-Comandot Sones Bienicato Ranch's 2014
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Blend: 60% Syrah, 20% Grenache, 10% Petite Sirah, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon A classic Sones Bienicato, the wine is deep garnet in color and exhibits aromas of blueberry, blackberry, plum, and smoky oak. It is full-bodied, with great concentration and a velvety texture, ripe tannins, and a long finish.

name: Twemra Whesa Veltpe Blod 2000
description: This wine is a blend of Tempranillo, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. It has a deep red color with violet edges. It has a ripe nose of cherries and plums with some balsamic aromas of eucalyptus and a spicy edge. It has a warm, round palate with a polished tannin structure and a long finish.

name: Bradyrouer Red Blend 2007
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: The 2007 vintage has the ideal conditions to stand out in a long time-honored winemaking year. It is a rich and opulent wine with a complex nose of blackberries, cherries, cassis and spice. It is rich and lush on the palate, with flavors of blackberries, cherries, spice and subtle notes of toasty vanilla and oak. It is a well balanced wine with a long and pleasant finish.

name: Rubbierne Ranche Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: This is a racy Sauvignon Blanc, with lots of tangy grapefruit, lemon peel, and fresh cut grass character. The wine has lots of texture and a ripe mouthfeel, with a mineral note that adds to the wine's complexity. A delicious and lively Sauvignon Blanc, this wine is a blend of New Zealand's three classic grape varietals - gooseberry, passionfruit, and lime. It's all about balance.

name: Milagne Riloquabelle 1050 Bernas 2014
description: The deep violet color leads to a nose that is complex and alluring. On the palate, it is full, soft, and supple, with a complex bouquet. This is a wine of great finesse.

name: Barol Emtili Cots Trelbo Niccasa d'Albise 2006
description: Deep purple red color. Elegant and complex, with intense fruit aromas, such as cherry, blackberry, and raspberry, with hints of violet, tobacco, and spice. The palate is full-bodied, rich, and concentrated, with sweet tannins and a long finish.

name: Domby Dromg 95 Pinot Blanc (375ML half-bottle) 2010
description: This wine has a pale yellow color. The nose is rich and aromatic, with a complex range of floral scents, fruity and spicy (grapefruit, cinnamon), with a touch of toast. The mouth is soft, round, and full-bodied. Its freshness, balance and natural residual sugar are the proof of a wine of this quality level, and a signature which will allow the wine to pair with a number of dishes.

name: Sholay Estate Estates Vignes ling Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Sholay Estate's Estate Estates 2006 Cabernet Sauvignon is a deep garnet color.  The wine is filled with notes of black cherry, blackberry, blueberry and a hint of sweet tobacco.  The wine is full bodied with smooth tannins and a soft, supple finish.  The wine is balanced and complex, showing layers of rich fruit flavors and a long, lasting finish.

name: Staga Hande Wint Porganinze Zes Chardonnay 2014
description: Pair with white meats, rich pasta dishes and fish. Villa Maria Private Bin Unoaked Chardonnay 2012 [response] [category_1] White Wine, but also delicious by itself as an aperitif. Unoaked Chardonnay has a youthful, aromatic nose of spice and stone fruits. Full bodied with excellent balance and a long, silky finish.

name: Folal Cote Borser 1997
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: A full bodied wine with a deep red color.  This wine is rich and elegant with intense berry fruit and a long finish.  A great wine to enjoy with roasted meats and cheeses.

name: Chatates Keirors Palem White 2013
description: Blend: 70% Verdejo, 30% Viura    , the firm, ungrafted hands of the leads winery and winemakers to me, a gruyere/yielding wine that tastes of creosote, walnut and pears as well as a hint of fennel/currant/coconut/lemongrass/fruits and soft but persistent tannins. This is a wine that will benefit greatly from long cellaring and should continue to improve for 3-5 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Feje Beaunust Cotes du Rose 2015
origin: from Cotes du Rhone, Rhone, France
description: The wine is a light, fresh, dry and delicious wine that pairs well with seafood, poultry, white meats and Asian dishes. The wine has a beautiful pale rose color. The wine is fruity on the nose, well balanced, with aromas of peaches, pears, and a touch of fresh almonds. In the mouth the wine is smooth and dry. It has a delicious, long finish.

name: Chateau de Rarther Pyin Grigos Gairtain LaAVolles 2015
origin: from Cotes de Provence, Provence, South of France, France
description: The nose is exotic, spicy and floral. The mouth is round and full, with a great finesse and a great balance between minerality and fruit.

name: Chateau Bambeose 2017
description: Blend: 52% Cabernet Sauvignon, 48% Merlot The 2017 vintage is an elegant wine with a deep purple colour and an expressive nose with fresh berry fruit and herbal notes. This is a supple wine with a soft and fleshy palate. The wine has a very nice and harmonious structure. It is long and fruity in the mouth, with a balanced acidity and smooth tannins. This wine is pleasant to drink now, but will also gain complexity in the next 3-5 years.

name: Rombiour del Ranth Red Blend 2015
description: Deep purple with purple hues. Vibrant blackcurrant and dark cherry fruit with a touch of licorice and black pepper spice. Well balanced with soft tannins, a round mid palate with dark berry fruit, and a long spicy finish.

name: Gwaztas Wiw Vaignes (3 Liter) Norent 2010
description: Blend: 45% Garnacha, 25% Syrah, 20% Petit Verdot The dark purple-colored 2010 Tinto de Tinto de Tinto (Trousseau) is a beautiful wine, with a complex nose of spice box, leather, cigar box, and blackberry. It has a medium to full-bodied attack, with loads of berry and cassis fruit on the palate. This is a delicious wine with velvety tannins and a long finish. It should age well for 2-3 years.

name: Varlay Reserve Will Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
origin: from St. Helena, Napa Valley, California
description: The Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is a blend of select barrels from the winery's premier estate vineyards. The blend of 60% Cabernet Sauvignon, 20% Merlot, 10% Petit Verdot, and 10% Cabernet Franc, is dense and rich with ripe blackberry, blueberry, and cassis fruit notes, accented by hints of sweet cigar box and vanilla. This is a full-bodied wine with a silky, supple tannin structure and a long, satisfying finish.

name: Chateau Branchers Girnor Les Griege Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: . This is a big, rich wine that shows a deep red color. Ripe blackcurrant and cassis fruit dominate the nose, along with sweet oak spice and chocolate. The mouthfeel is full and fleshy, with a silky, plump, soft texture. This is a concentrated wine, with plenty of character and a long finish. Enjoy with grilled steak, roast duck, or even a great cut of steak with pepper sauce. This wine will continue to improve for many more years to come.

name: Domaini RICove Velpillillalic Familles Meullat Cabernet Sauvignon 1993
description: The 1995 Vintage has produced a wine that is a blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Cabernet Franc and 10% Merlot aged in French and American oak barrels.  This is a full bodied, luscious wine with plenty of cassis, spice and earth.  Full bodied and bold, with plenty of body, this is a perfect example of the Classically styled Cabernet Sauvignon that should continue to improve with age.

name: Dubierie Pailem) 2008
description: A great pairing with the most elegant of meat dishes. A good match for tatjes, veal or chicken, as well as most cheeses. The 2008 Domaine Dubier Merlot is a lovely ruby color. It has a nose full of black fruits such as plums, cherries and blueberries. The wine has a full-bodied attack, along with a refined and supple structure. It has a silky, harmonious tannic structure and a long finish. A wonderful accompaniment to red meats and cheeses.

name: Chateau Pray Sals Lotans 2011
description: Blend: 52% Cabernet Sauvignon, 48% Merlot, 4% Petit Verdot The fruit was hand-harvested and sorted, destemmed, and cold-soak-sole Eden Valley wines fermented in stainless steel tanks. After pressing and racking, the wine was aged in French and American oak barrels for 18 months. After 18 months in barrel, a second-style wine was produced. The wine shows aromas of raspberry, cherry, and spice. It has a full, soft, and rich flavor, with balanced tannins and a long, smooth finish. This wine will continue to improve with age.

name: Vena Valis Napay Vineyards Tyrark Pailio Sodoma Coast Buro'stino 1996
Merinari Meglot 2003
description: The wine is dark ruby red in color with a nose of fresh cherries, berries and hints of mint and spice. On the palate the wine is dry and full-bodied with excellent tannin structure.meglot is a delicious accompaniment to pasta with meat sauce, risotto, poultry and beef.

name: Shignes Senila Oakes Hill Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: Blackish ruby color. On the nose, dried plums, black cherry, chocolate and vanilla. On the palate, a well structured, balanced mouthfeel with notes of black currant, black cherry, and a touch of toasty oak. A very elegant wine with a long finish. A great match for red meat, pasta with meat sauce, risotto, poultry, barbecue and grilled or roasted vegetables.

name: Per Estate Gans Sauvinner 2013
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 44% Grenache, 6% Mourvèdre . Full-bodied, fleshy, rich, and full-bodied, with black fruit and spice. A great wine to pair with a meaty Bolognese or risotto. Drink now through 2023.

name: Brronmen Estate Whiner Sangiio 2012
description: The 2012 vintage is brimming with fruit aromas of cherry, currant, raspberry and pomegranate. The nose is filled with a subtle dustiness that is classic of this vineyard. In the mouth, there are more flavors of dark stone fruits, plums and cherry pie. This is a rich wine, but still maintains the beautiful balance that bodes well for aging. A long and pleasing finish with a hint of sweetness makes this wine an ideal match for a variety of fare. Enjoy this wine with beef and pork dishes.

name: Tarina Estate Piutiers Estate Zinfantel 2013
origin: from Eola-Amity Hills, Willamette Valley, Oregon
description: The wine is rich and velvety, with a long finish. Flavors of cherry cola, spice, and earthy notes. The mouthfeel is soft and inviting, with a rich texture. The tannins are firm, yet fine grained. This Zinfandel is a great match for grilled meats and pastas with tomato sauce.

name: Trephaad Roso Vineyards Chardonnay 2017
description: This Chardonnay is produced from grapes grown in the highest elevation vineyards in the Central Coast AVA.  The 2017Trephaad Chardonnay has a bright, vibrant and fruit-forward wine. The aromas of stone fruits and jasmine are balanced by crisp green apple, citrus and a hint of mineral character. The flavors of fresh green apples, Asian pear, and Granny Smith apples are complemented by a silky texture and a long finish. The 2017 Trephaad Chardonnay is the perfect wine to serve to friends on a warm spring day.

name: Prophst Cellerryead Leapt Pinot Noir 2012
description: This wine is a beautiful, deep ruby color with a dark nose of cherry, rose petal, cedar and cinnamon. The palate is bright and focused with fresh, bright acidity, a hint of rocky mineral, and a touch of red fruit. There is a bit more spice and spice on the palate with a little earthiness and a bit more forest floor notes. The wine finishes long, with bright acidity and fine tannins. The wine can be enjoyed now but will evolve nicely over the next 3-5 years.

name: Torrenzse Estate Chardonnay 1999
description: The wine has a light straw colour with tinges of green. The bouquet is fragrant with delicate fruit and floral aromas. The palate is soft and inviting with a distinctive, long finish. A wine that is an ideal accompaniment to seafood, poultry and white meats.

name: Arenot-Carose Cabernet Branc Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: It's dark, rich and full-bodied, with intense, rich fruit. It's deep, rich and concentrated. Full of character without being overbearing, with ripe, round tannins, this is a wine to savor on its own, to drink with rich foods. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot, it's full-bodied, with an elegant structure that will bring lots of pleasure. The wine's rich character makes it a good match for rich foods. It will go well with red meat and game, as well as mature cheeses. It's also a wonderful match with rich, spicy Asian dishes.

name: Dome Rieserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: The 2006 vintage is rich, velvety and intense with ripe berry fruit and a hint of smoky wood.  The soft tannins are well-integrated and the fruit is supported by a touch of warm, plump fruit and a smooth, full-bodied character.  It's a wonderful, well-balanced wine with good structure and a long finish. The 2006 vintage is a wine with great aging potential. The rich structure and ripe fruit are evident now, and the wines from the 2006 vintage will continue to develop through 2012. The fruit is in the forefront, with a nice integration of the oak, and the softer tannins in the background are in the background.

name: Niche Prepo Zinfanen 2009
description: The wine is an intense purple color. On the nose, there are aromas of fresh fruit, plums, and violets. It is smooth and fresh on the palate, with lots of fruit, and a long finish.

name: Gonsalo Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The grapes from our vineyards in the northern part of the Napa Valley, where the weather and soil conditions provide optimum growing conditions for the Cabernet Sauvignon grape.  These conditions, combined with the unique characteristics from the vineyard, are the foundation for the exceptional flavors and silky tannins that come from our Cabernet.  The result is a wine with rich flavors and great structure.

name: Gallo Chardonnay 2013
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The Gallo Chardonnay is a complex and full-bodied wine with layers of creamy vanilla, fresh fruit, lemon curd, and Asian spice. Its refined palate is accompanied by a long finish.  Louis Bernard Vacqueyras Domaine de la Vougeraie Chateauneuf-du-Pape 2015 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] White Wine [category_2] Other White Blends [origin]  from Chateauneuf-du-Pape, Rhone, France

name: Swargherts Symarry Wonde Swavige Blanc 2017
description: The wine has a light, golden yellow color. The aromas are pronounced and pronounced, with finesse, elegance, and finesse. The wine has a rich, rounded palate with a long finish. The fruit aromas are balanced with spicy flavors and great minerality. It is a wine with a great ageing potential.

name: Wone Twe Fawterson Valeirte 2017
description: Aromas of berry fruit, rosemary, and thyme. The palate is bright and balanced, with flavors of ripe cherries, spice, and herbs. This wine has a rich texture and a long finish.

name: Grearopy Nieri Syrah 2012
description: Intense ruby red color. Aromas of dark fruit and spices. The palate is soft and round with a pleasant aftertaste. Pairs well with red meat, game and seasoned cheese. Brilliant ruby-red color. Intense and persistent aroma. Elegant with soft tannins and pleasant mineral notes.  A great match for game, pasta and risotto dishes.

name: Boslier Marrelvillon ElomaMkes 86 Pinatt Antinera Reserva Pazora 2004
description: The vineyard was planted with all estate-grown, hand-harvested, organically-farmed grapes in March-April. The wine is a dark, cherry-red colored, wine with an intense nose of blackberries, licorice, spice, and toast. On the palate, it is rich and concentrated with flavors reminiscent of ripe black cherries, plums, and spice. It has well-rounded tannins and a smooth finish.

name: Domavialo della Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: In the mouth it is soft, with a delicious and round structure, lively, concentrated fruit with a beautiful aftertaste. This is a perfect wine to drink with all kinds of pasta dishes, risotto and grilled red meat. It is an ideal wine to go with red meat, roasts, game and cheese.

name: Hermrassane Herpbain Grand Cru 2018
description: The wine is a deep garnet color. On the nose, it is intense and fruity. It is full-bodied, yet delicate and harmonious on the palate. The tannins are refined, but also mellow. The finish is long and intense, with notes of blackberries and spices. It is an impressive and noble wine.

name: Heamrer L'vitta Merlota Rose Chardonnay 2000
description: This dry rose has a beautiful light salmon color and a wonderfully delicate nose of fresh strawberries, raspberries, and cream. On the palate, the flavors of strawberries, raspberries, and cream come through, with a lovely, lush texture. This wine is beautifully balanced with a long, crisp finish. This is a gorgeous, young, vibrant Rose, and an excellent choice for any occasion.

name: Domaine La Jacket Or. Tque Las Korzollavel de Chatfarder Cru Rouge 2017
origin: from Cotes de Castillon, Bordeaux, France
description: The “Kluge” terroir, the highest point of the appellation, has a wonderful balance between power and finesse, an extraordinary combination in a Spice driven vintage.

name: Fellaid C6sbaher Caldussrinla Bellos Josees Premier Cru 2006
origin: from Cotes du Roussillon, Roussillon, South of France, France
description: Blend: 75% Syrah, 20% Grenache, 5% Mourvèdre, 2% Petit Verdot, 1% Cinsault

name: Domaine Laganate Nortin Clos de Lapquoet 2014
description: Pairs well with red meats, roasts, game and cheese.  vinification of the grapes by hand, without pressing, without pressing or pumping over the grapes, and without crushing the grapes, is traditional and very long. After disgorgement of the wine, the free run juice is combined and malolactic fermentation takes place without the use of anyplets. After racking and malolactic fermentation the wine is fined with a coloured wine obtained from the wine and flowing from the still-unbroken juice. It is then transferred to small French oak barrels for maturation. After maturation, the wine is fined with a high level of filtration and filtered before bottling.

name: Esneccier Reters Reservaflan 2005
description: Estate-grown red blend of Tempranillo, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Garnacha. Aged for 12 months in American oak barrels. The Tempranillo component of the wine is aged for 12 months in American oak barrels. Garnacha adds a spicy, plummy component and the Cabernet component of the wine is aged for 12 months in American oak barrels. The result is a complex wine with great structure, balance, and finesse.

name: Hondi Benthontt biner Grand Genrosso Camenned Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: The nose is filled with fresh raspberries, black currants, violets and a hint of clove. The wine fills the mouth and fills the palate with a medley of blackberries, cassis, raspberries, toasted oak and cedar. The tannins are soft and velvety, and the wine finishes with a hint of spice.

name: Watzlb Rezervo Cabernet Sauvignon 2004
