description: This vintage shows dark plum, blackberry, cassis, black cherry, sweet spice, dark chocolate, cedar, tobacco, earth, sweet tobacco, vanilla, black pepper, boysenberry, cassis, blackberry, chocolate, boysenberry, boysenberry, black pepper, dark plum, blackberry, boysenberry, black cherry, boysenberry, black currant, black pepper, boysenberry, cassis, boysenberry, chocolate, mint, black tea, boysenberry, dark chocolate, black cherry, dried herbs, black pepper, tobacco, black pepper, black licorice, vanilla, coffee, nutmeg, and black pepper. This is a luscious wine with voluptuous tannins and a long lingering finish.

name: Caleli Rebagna Lanas 2013
description: Blend: 50% Tempranillo, 20% Garnacha, 20% Merlot Wine Spots Napa Valley 2015, vinted by vivacious purple in color, Rebotta 2015 has attractive fruit, and excellent balance. This wine is full bodied, velvety, and intense with a lovely perfume of spice and cherry pie with just a hint of smoke. The palate is round, creamy, and rich with ripe dark fruit, mineral, and toasty oak flavors. The tannins are soft and supple, and the wine has a long, silky, smooth finish.

name: Alcerna Temina 2014
description: The Alendi Tempranillo is sourced from vineyards located high above the Andes Mountains. This warm climate, along with the high altitude, helps the grapes acquire a high level of maturity which leads to a wine with great structure and complexity. The Aliguas Reserva wines are the result of the combined influences of the Atlantic and Mediterranean elements combined with the influence of the Atlantic and the Atlantic influence in the south of France. The ‘Felsina’ vineyards are located at the foot of Mount Veeder, on the Valley of the Ebro River, where summer fog and morning sunshine are cooler than the rest of the valley. They are located at an elevation of 500m and located at the very end of the Road to the Ebro River.

name: Boruma Spa Syra Ricziole 2000
description: Bouquet: Intense, mature fruit with hints of violets and cherries.  Flavors: Full-bodied, with excellent structure, balanced tannins and excellent persistence., low yields and a long ripening period resulted in a richly flavoured wine with a rich garnet color.  The sweet, ripe fruit flavors of the Sangiovese component combined with the elegant structure of the Cabernet and Merlot components, together with a subtle touch of toasty oak, intermingle on the palate.  The soft tannins make this wine a perfect match with red meat, game, and seasoned cheese.

name: Cupelliswent Santa Blanquiico Chardonnay 2000
description: Bright yellow-gold color. Intense and elegant, with tropical fruit and butterscotch aromas, and a hint of toasty oak. Ripe and creamy on the palate, with plenty of body, and a long finish.

name: Ados Fonseck Russiina 2004
description: Deep ruby-red in color, this wine offers inviting aromas of blackberry, raspberry, cassis, smoke, vanilla and sweet spices. On the palate, ripe fruit flavors mingle with toasty oak and spice, and the wine's round, polished tannins lead into a long, silky finish.

name: Chateau de Clos de Nouvine Lessaix Mack Robereux Cerrarli 2015
description: Blend: 50% Syrah, 30% Mourvèdre, 20% Grenache Melton Estate Cabernet Sauvignon/Carmenere, 20% Carignane/Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc/Carmenere, 10% Petit Verdot/Malbec

name: Greff Colomaine Chardonnay 2012
description: This is the most refined and elegant Chardonnay Greff has produced to date. With beautiful aromas of sun-warmed white peach and the slightest hint of honeycomb, Greff has no shortage of white peach and apple fruit on the palate. The finish is long and complex. The wine shows excellent balance, and structure with the acidity to pair with the richness of the Chardonnay varietal.

name: Saia Forbera di Montagni Resalcino 2016
description: The estate’s most traditional winemaking technique are of course the wine-making technique of stirring the grapes, a process that results in the free-run juice of the juice and the wine softer than its more traditional partner wines. This process results in a wine with more elegance and finesse than power. It is also a technique that favors aromatic complexity and full flavor in the wine.

name: Burasie Santa Mavillenar 2018
description: The fruit of this wine, the best of the estate and from the oldest Garnacha vines in the estate, is combined to create a wine of depth and complexity, with a complex, full bouquet, balanced with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Reynon Lutt Cuvee Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The 2013 Lett Cuvee is a beautiful deep purple color.  On the nose, there are aromas of blackberry, cassis and black cherry. The wine fills the mouth with flavors of blackberry, black currant and pomegranate, with a rich, velvety texture. The tannins are firm, yet the wine is smooth and balanced. This is a classic Napa Cabernet Sauvignon, and a great wine to drink now or for years to come.

name: Domeines Abaux Plot Sombarin Cuve-Albarettar Merlrot Undima Niots 2016
description: An exotic tropical fruit salad of pineapple and dried mango, with a hint of green pepper. Lusciously ripe red fruit with a long finish, and hints of fresh mint and spice. Intense minerality, and a savory touch on the palate. Saturated, fresh and juicy, with a core of ripe tannins and a spicy note on the finish. The word 'Cuve-Al (>’vintage’s identity and personality are clearly defined by this uniquely Spain wine.

name: Domaine Port Les Napian Vingigio Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Pinot Noir from a selection of vineyards in the Languedoc, this wine is unadulterated by oak.  Intense ruby color.  The nose is full of finesse and power with a blend of jammy fruit and smoky tones.  The palate is bold, concentrated, and intense.  Black cherry, cassis, and spice flavors dominate the palate, and are nicely balanced with soft tannins.  This is a delicious, well-structured wine with a great balance between fruit, oak, and tannin.

name: Texscuthong Domaine Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: This Cabernet is rich, with moderate to full bodied flavors of cherry, berry and cassis, as well as a hint of mint. The fruit is enhanced by delicate oak and a soft tannin finish.

name: Brochtan Ray Barhero 2009
origin: from Barossa Valley, Barossa, South Australia, Australia
description: The color of the wine is deep, dark purple with a crimson hue. The nose is lifted, aromatic and varietal with blackberry and cherry fruit. There is a great harmony between the fruit aromas with the subtle use of French oak. The palate is full, round and soft with classic Barossa fruit characters of blackberry, cherry and cassis. There are also some gamey characters, some violets and an interesting earthy quality. The structure is solid and well balanced with a moderate, fine tannin backbone that will soften with time. The finish is long and persistent.

name: Jegally Ols Wine Kiminass Syrah 2007
description: The 2007 Jegally OCs Syrah is a bright dark purple color. The nose is lifted and aromatic, featuring floral notes, spice and blackberries, with an underlying savoury character. The palate is lively, with a youthful, approachable mouthfeel. There are appealing fruit characters of cherry and blackberry, with underlying spice and savoury characters. This is a well balanced wine, with a long, soft finish. The judicious use of French oak gives the wine a creamy texture and hints of smokiness.

name: Maiurett Alket Silarike Sintshanes Chardonnay 2000
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: A sweet, creamy style displaying subtle honeysuckle, pineapple and sweet fruit characters. Medium bodied in style, with subtle oak and a soft creamy texture on the palate. Lovely balance of fruit and oak, with a lingering finish.

name: Chatey Salina Vineyards GyaS 2018
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: Blend: 50% Cabernet Franc, 30% Syrah, 15% Petit Verdot The Cabernet Franc grape is the core of the blend with its savory herbaceous nose and red fruit flavors. Syrah and the Petit Verdot and Cabernet Sauvignon bring in the mid-palate richness, color, and a rich, full-bodied mouthfeel while the Malbec gives a touch of savory tannin and structure. The Petit Verdot and Cabernet Franc give the wine its deep purple color, while the Cabernet Sauvignon gives the wine its deep red color. Our Gacha is a full-bodied wine with concentrated flavor, soft tannins and a smooth finish. We use grapes from select blocks in Paso Robles to craft a wine that is truly enjoyable to drink now and can age for another 3 to 5 years.

name: HeePy Cotes de Vlicas 2016
origin: from Cotes de V licas, Rhone, France
description: The wine shows its potential early on. Deep garnet color. Aromas of berry fruit and licorice. On the palate, the wine is round, full-bodied, with a long finish. The wine is rich, and has potential to age gracefully.

name: Michery Cugvee Muris Zincage R. Flan Boro Pinot Noir 2009
origin: from Cienega Valley, Central Coast, California
description: Deep purple in color, this wine offers up layers of black raspberry, cedar, dried herbs, black pepper, and dried herbs. With more air, notes of nutmeg and sandalwood add complexity. On the palate, the wine is soft and plush with a nice balance between acidity and tannin. Flavors of black cherry, cassis, raspberries, and pomegranate with a hint of spiced oak. A wonderful everyday wine!

name: ORdle Ord Rib Chardonnay 2007
description: This is a rich, balanced and full-bodied Chardonnay. The nose and palate of this wine are filled with white peach, ripe melon and tropical fruits. The mouthfeel is rich and full with flavors of lychee nuts, caramel, and caramel. This is a very elegant and refined wine that can be enjoyed in its youth or cellared for the next 10 years.

name: Durkyet Seveterne Charnont 2000
origin: from Yakima Valley, Columbia Valley, Washington
description: A blend of 50% Syrah, 25% Grenache, 20% Merlot and 10% Cinsaut, the 2000 Seveterne exhibits a deep ruby/purple color along with aromas of blueberry, blackberry, and black cherry. The wine is medium to full-bodied, with loads of sweet fruit and spice. This is an elegant, soft, smooth, full-bodied effort to drink well now and over the next 10-15 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Domaine FeNitam Brucellict Bruth Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Deep garnet red with purple highlights. Attractive aromas of red fruits and cherries, with a hint of vanilla. The palate is rich and ripe, with spice and black fruit aromas, with soft tannins and a smooth texture. A wine with a great finesse, and elegance.

name: Bono Crenere Sinck Estfara Vallano 2017
description: This is a dark violet wine with deep aromas of cherries, black plums, and violets. It has a lush mouthfeel with good structure and a long finish. This is a great wine to pair with a wide range of food, from pasta with a light red sauce to meat or game.

name: Wenata dun Einera Sauvignon Berlac 2015
description: Pale gold with green hues. Aromas of lychee and citrus notes. Lush and well-balanced, this wine has a great volume and a long finish.

name: Chateau d'Ercebonca Granache Blanc 1998
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: ; lively, crystalline and crystal-clear. Pronounced nose of lime, grapefruit and apple. Crisp, refreshing and with a touch of bitterness on the finish.

name: Terutella La Noort Jaradon Russori 2017
description: Here’s a fresh, fruit-forward, and easy-to-enjoy white wine, perfect for those who like a delicate fruit-driven wine but do not want to drink a lot of hot, hot weather Chardonnay. It’s rich and creamy on the palate, with tropical fruit notes, ripe peach, and fresh pineapple. With a lively acidity, this wine can pair with almost anything from pizza to pasta or even just about anything from hamburgers to pizza.

name: Toulbount Corprongate Il Gronera Wallr Gaccaves 2014
description: Blend: 75% Cabernet Sauvignon, 25% Merlot  and the family has been making wine in the Languedoc region since 1928. The wines are impressive, with a rich garnet color, excellent structure, and great ageing potential. The grapes are sourced from several sites around the village of Tonnerre, in the Languedoc region of the Languedoc. The wine is made from younger vines (30 to 40 years-old), which are harvested by hand. Yields ranged from 25 to 35 hl/ha and are hand-harvested.

name: Homees Cles Wine Coast Malbe Zinfandel 2010
description: A dark, intense and bright purple color. On the nose, the wine is fresh with hints of licorice, spice, pepper and berry. It is soft and round on the palate, with ripe, sweet fruit and a lingering, velvety finish. This is a great wine to drink now or within the next 3 years.

name: Parrick Rergeree Lerpers Gran Viney Zinfandel 2001
description: The nose is powerful and concentrated with rich dark berry fruit, lifted spices and a hint of smoke. The palate is textured with a strong, rich tannin backbone, but balanced with the savoury tannin structure that has always defined the Garrick style. A very long finish that is complimented by a hint of fruit sweetness is balanced nicely with the intensity and complexity of the fruit.

name: Jean Paraol Velley Vineyards Rend The Mins Vineyard Trapelle Dellemare Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
origin: from Mt. Veeder, Napa Valley, California
description: , one of the top Chilean Cabernets in the world, from the Mt. Veeder district. It shows an attractive dark purple color with a deep nose of blueberries and cherries, with subtle notes of mocha and spice. It is full-bodied, with ripe tannins and a concentrated, smooth texture on the palate. It shows good balance and a long finish. It is an ideal match for red meats, game and cheese.

name: Laterbofapine Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: The final blend is after only the first pressing of the grapes, the free run juice is combined and fermentation takes place. The wine is then matured in wood barrels (25% new) for 10 months before bottling.

name: Varthmari Family Wellemegre 2003
description: A rich, elegant and velvety wine with dense, rich, dark plum and dark cherry fruit, with underlying spice and earth. The palate is soft, supple and elegant with a full, lush, sweet, tannin finish.

name: Drubles Napa Valley Estaters Red 2014
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 28% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Grenache, 7% Petite Sirah Dr. Loosen Urziger Wurzgarten Kabinett Riesling QbA 2013 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2]

name: Jack Harkon White 2012
description: Blend: 54% Chardonnay, 26% Riesling, 14% Muscat, 9% Viognier, persistent aromatic and richly flavorful. Pineapple, apricot and hints of melon and tropical fruit. Full bodied and dry on the palate, the wine shows great balance with a long finish. Enjoy this wine with a variety of lighter dishes or by itself as an aperitif.

name: Belloria Resto Chenin Blanc Brutel Garlonamle de Vasse 2013
description: The ruby color of this wine, with delicate reflections, is the first sign of a high quality wine.  The nose is fruity, fruity and floral.  On the palate the structure and balance of this wine is pronounced, soft and pleasing.  The flavors are persistent, complex and slightly mineral.  It has great structure, structure and balance and it pairs well with appetizers, starters, fish and shellfish dishes.

name: Ferrinba Mukige Resermz Darmes Chamiano 2015
description: Deep ruby red color. Intense and complex bouquet with notes of mature fruit, spice, leather, tobacco, and chocolate. Dry, warm, velvety and harmonious, with great finesse on the palate.

name: Pave Pinote 2010
description: This smooth and silky-textured wine is a beautiful harmony of earthy notes with red fruit, hints of spice and an earthy character that adds a depth and character to this wine. Pair with a variety of meat dishes, poultry and cheeses.

name: Clobatri 4Ebry Spring Sta. Rices 2017
origin: from Cotes de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: Vietti Barbera d'Alba Tre Vigne 2012 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Other Red Blends [origin]  from Alba, Piedmont, Italy

name: Zinmanzetty Satamilo Sauvignon Blanc 2002
description: The wine shows a light, brilliant straw color. The aroma is delicate, with pronounced varietal character. In the mouth it shows a good body, well balanced, with the typical acidity. The finish is long and persistent. It can be enjoyed as an aperitif, or with any kind of fish dish. It is recommended to decant before enjoying with friends. It is a wine to be enjoyed with friends.

name: Chateau Pons (1.5 Liter Magnu-Montar Stamum) 2011
description: The 2011 vintage has produced a wine with a deep ruby red colour. On the nose, there are aromas of ripe black cherry and blackcurrant with subtle spicy undertones. The palate is well-balanced with a good concentration of flavour and a long, intense finish.

name: Bodguzer Red Bleur Mal-Grian Re Blancol 2014
description: This blend of Malbec, Cabernet Sauvignon and Bonarda grapes is sourced from the foothills of the Andes Mountains. It is a refreshing, dry white wine with a bright, refreshing acidity and a smooth, mineral finish.

name: Gr. Familne Sirai Berrta di Rossa 2012
description: This wine is an intense ruby red in color with violet hues. The bouquet shows typical Tuscan aromas of bitter orange, red fruits, licorice, anise and a hint of coffee. The palate is soft and fresh, with a well-balanced acidity and a pleasantly tannic finish.

name: BrNino d'Astiese Boltero Malbs Zinfanes 2011
description: Deep ruby-red color. On the nose, there are hints of berries, blackberries, raspberries and black pepper. The wine is full-bodied with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Sononsucty Theako Orisore 2009
description: The winemaker suggests a classic BBQ wine with a side of slow roasted pork, chicken and grilled beef.   The Luxurious flavors of the wine are highlighted by a sweet, smoky nose and a rich, velvety mouthfeel. The ripe fruit flavors of the wine and its moderate tannins make it a great accompaniment to grilled meats, hearty pasta dishes, pizza or even a classic prime rib.

name: Leeneppiamal PAGosilobille Chardonnay/Valley Pinot Noir 2016
description: The 2016 PAGOille Chardonnay/Valley is sourced from the Pigorlicums, the first white plantings of the region, planted in 1963. It was barrel fermented, then aged for 18 months in French oak barrels (20% new) and aged for 6 months in stainless steel tanks. Ripe lemon and pear flavors with notes of spice, lemon peel and a hint of minerality.

name: Louis Fos Pioner Thrente Quelta Valley Chardonnay 2017
description: The Chardonnay grapes from this region are fermented in steel tanks and then matured for five months in French oak barrels. It is a rich, complex wine with a bouquet of citrus and toasty oak. On the palate, the crisp acidity and full flavor body complement the creamy texture, which carries through the long finish.

name: Deneliotite Rose Nutage Emune 1984
description: The nose is fresh, with balsamic aromas of fennel, lime and orange blossoms. It's very complex. On the palate, the wine is fresh and balanced, with a great acid structure. It is full and ripe with a long finish.

name: Jeanh-Pitor Feassiondejo (375M Lh pattelleit 2008
description: In the glass, a beautiful dark garnet color is accompanied by a complex bouquet of mature fruit, tobacco, spices and truffles. It is elegant, with ripe fruit flavors, lively acidity and refined tannins. It is supple and refined on the palate, with a long finish.

name: Wilch Barel Honceralds Syrah 1994
description: This beauty is made from the finest grapes from the best blocks of the vineyard.  Black cherry, boysenberry and raspberry aromas dominate the nose with a hint of spice.  Black cherry, boysenberry and black pepper flavors dominate the palate, with a hint of chocolate.  Well balanced and smooth in the mouth, this Syrah is easy drinking and a perfect match for grilled meats, hearty pasta dishes and richly sauced pastas.

name: Brino Cosenoeruut Grege Depriane 1997
description: This is a delicious wine for richly flavored dishes.  It is an excellent partner to pasta dishes, risottos as well as lamb, veal, and beef. A delightful wine that is a must try with red meat, game, and hard cheeses.

name: Chateau LaOliot Lauriter de Poaulat Blanc 2012
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The color of the wine is light gold. The nose is intense and fruity with aromas of white fruits and a hint of toasted bread. The palate is soft and balanced with a hint of toasted bread.

name: PELios Bayla Estate Tuttanceto Valley Estates Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The wine has a deep purple color. The nose is dark fruit dominated with blueberry, plum, and blackberry. The bouquet is floral with violets and violets. The palate is soft and savoury with subtle spice, cedar, chocolate and a fine tannin structure which will support further development.

name: L'Akser Labalbe Reserva Chardonnay 2012
description: A versatile, food-friendly wine, excellent with any type of fish, seafood or chicken dish. It also goes well with white meats such as pork, chicken, duck, and turkey.  Vinum Cellars Chardonnay 2013 [response] [category_1] White Wine

name: Kal Labegliot Cotanai Reserva 2013
description: It is deep garnet in color, with intense, ripe fruit, and spice on the nose. On the palate, it is round, with excellent balance, ripe fruit and polished tannins, and an elegant, lingering finish.

name: MVery Hige The Brin 2017
description: The Brin is made from grapes grown in the cooler Napa Valley, where it has a longer growing season. The result is a wine with more flavor, richness and acidity. The minerality from the Rutherford AVA and the warmer Napa Valley contribute to the wine’s bright fruit. The aromas are almost floral with honeysuckle, jasmine and Asian pear notes. The mouth is soft and rich, with flavors of pear, apricot, and pineapple. There is a nice balance between minerality and acidity, and the floral aromas from the Rutherford AVA.

name: Anwore Ros Winery Shiraz 2004
description: An elegant, stylish, and full-bodied red wine with rich berry fruit flavors and a subtle spiciness.  Matured in French oak hogsheads for 12 months, it has soft, round tannins and a smooth, spicy finish.  It is a wine that is ready to drink now or for cellar until later in the next decade.

name: Sevelliberg Ramerae Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: This wine is very versatile, it can be enjoyed with many different types of cuisine. It is delicious with oysters, fresh seafood and summer salads, as well as spicy Thai cuisine. A great match with oysters, fresh seafood, summer salads and light summer meals.

name: Clos de la Mleco Rose Caveries All Merlot 2001
origin: from Provence, South of France, France
description: The grapes are selected from vineyards in the Côtes du Rhône and the Saône Valley, where the sun-drenched, sandy soils ideal for producing this excellent wine.

name: Co Forelas Wicela Matha A. Amanino 2018
description: Pair with grilled or smoked meats, poultry, and pasta., buty winemaking methods protected the wine's natural acidity while providing a balance that will allow it to retain its liveliness. The wine is aged in older French and American oak barrels for 2 years. This wine shows deep garnet color, almost black. It has a delicious nose of spice and ripe fruit. It has a rich taste with a complex structure of fruit, and a long finish that invites further tasting.

name: Clo di Picolfigo 2015
description: Pairs well with grilled steak, beef or pork, or with a spicy tomato sauce., the best shows of the 2005 vintage, a deep garnet-red color with purple reflections.  The nose is complex, displaying a blend of berry and spice aromas, a hint of forest floor, and a subtle scent of violets.  The bouquet is long and harmonious, with a smooth, rich and full palate.  The tannins are soft and the wine has a very long, lingering finish.  The color is a deep garnet, with shades of violet.  The wine is full-bodied, with a complex nose of berries and spice.  It has a lengthy and complex finish.  It is a harmonious and balanced wine.

name: Domaine Domaine La Re Beaune Ruad Vignane 2017
origin: from Cote de Beaune, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: The 2017 Ruad Vignane has a dark ruby color. On the nose, there are notes of raspberry, cassis, licorice, black pepper and baking spice. On the palate, the wine is long, with polished tannins and a spicy finish. This is a beautiful, pure, rich wine from the Côte de Beaune.

name: Marques de l'Ecole Merlot 2003
description: This is a full bodied, concentrated Merlot, with the added bonus of being aged in American oak barrels.  Deep purple with aromas of spice and dark fruit.  Full bodied with a rich fruit finish.  A wonderful example of the best that Spain has to offer from the south of France.

name: Louis Equielle Leomoux Blanc 2002
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: A rich, medium-bodied wine with a beautiful core of peach, fig, and honey-suckle flavors that persist through the finish. It has the richness and flesh of fruit from the Grenache Gris, with the finesse from the Syrah, and a vibrant mineral finish. Best from 2002 through 2017.-Wine Spectator

name: Ano Ponote Redbino Esmate 2013
description: The wine has a dark, cherry-red color, with a ripe fruit nose, balanced with hints of toasted oak. It is round and ripe on the palate, with a good structure and fine tannins. It has a long finish, with a good balance between fruit and oak, and a ripe, rich and fruity finish.

name: Orinelas Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: The wine is a deep, clean ruby color with shades of green. On the nose, the wine is complex, with fresh fruit aromas, floral notes, and hints of spice. In the mouth, it is soft, with ripe fruit flavors and a light touch of toast. It is well-balanced, with a smooth, silky texture and a pleasing finish.

name: Bellarre Enfernan Riga/Blanc (1.5L) 1998
description: Brilliant straw color. Intense aromas of fresh apples, citrus fruit and subtle oak characters. Full-bodied, round and polished with honey and mineral flavors. Good balance between fruit, acidity and oak characters. Very smooth and creamy with a lingering finish. As a result of the soil and aspect, this wine shows a fresh fruit presence and softness with a high quality wine that can be enjoyed by itself as an aperitif or with any kind of fish, seafood and white meat dishes. It also complements cheeses well with Asian food.

name: Merzan Piciola Altantovesovla Classicot Chardonan 2014
description: Pale straw yellow color with greenish glints. Rich, intense and complex, with mineral notes and nuances of tropical fruit and fresh fruit. Well-balanced, with a long aftertaste. Bouvet Brut Rose [response] [category_1] Sparkling & Champagne

name: Blut Rosso Syrah 2015
description: Blend: 78% Syrah, 12% Petite Sirah, 4% Grenache The 2015 Syrah has a bright purple core, with a deep purple rim. Its aromas of dark berry, cherry and smoke are followed by flavors of cherry, blackberry and a hint of earth and spice. Its tannins are firm, yet the wine has a velvety feel on the palate. This is a full-bodied wine, rich in style, with a silky texture and a long finish.

name: Aysentedtl Ben Feilloaud Chardonnay 2016
origin: from Dundee Hills, Willamette Valley, Oregon
description: The Chardonnay grapes are harvested at night, and fermented in stainless steel tanks with the only native yeast, a technique that accentuates the natural fruitiness in the wine.  It is then aged in neutral French oak barrels for 11 months before bottling. The result is a wine with bright acidity, balanced with lush fruit, and an elegant finish.

name: Sanbetce La Steami Berlot La Cairolero LaLtieha 2008
description: The color of this wine is a deep purple/black.  The nose is filled with black fruit, black cherry, cassis, dark chocolate and roasted herbs.  On the palate the wine is soft and round with flavors of sweet black cherries, plums, and roasted herbs.  This is a full bodied wine with a long silky finish.  Recommended to be paired with barbeque, spicy barbeque, or even some of the most exotic dishes.

name: Zonfieros Ram apthedise Santarrione 2000
description: The wine has a deep, dark garnet color. On the nose, the intense, complex bouquet is with evident fruity notes (blackberries, blackcurrants, cherries), floral tones of violet and a hint of spices. The palate is full, soft and harmonious, with a good balance between tannins and alcohol. The finish is long and intense with fruit and spices.

name: Sainna Andront & Tenardme 127 Estate Cabernat Sauvignon 2015
description: A brilliant and deep violet color. The nose shows aromas of cherry, cassis, and ripe black fruits, with light spicy notes. The mouthfeel is soft, round, and concentrated, with pleasant and friendly tannins. This wine is a great example of the C terroir in the Uco Valley, a region well known for the great Cabernets of Argentina.

name: Pranz Roston Vineyard Chardonnay 2001
description: A sweet and juicy Chardonnay with a creamy texture and a creamy, toasty finish. It has a light caramel, apple and pear nose and a spicy, nutty finish.Wine Spectator

name: Matas-Giulten Le-Pinas Premier Cru Rouge 2014
description: Blend: 50% Grenache, 40% Syrah, 10% Mourvèdre Pairs well with pasta, pizza, pork, grilled steak and lamb chops.. This is a classically styled wine that is ready for immediate consumption but has the stuffing for laying down.

name: Domaiseu de los Aikerva Tortanien Zinfandel 2009
description: It is a dark garnet-colored wine with an intense, concentrated nose of spice, ripe black fruits, and a hint of pepper. It has a full, lush, rich attack, with explosive fruit and spice. It has a long finish, with great balance and finesse.

name: Campile Chardonnay Edebino 2005
description: The grapes are hand-harvested and sorted. We take advantage of the complexity that comes from such a hot climate region as Edebino. The grapes are gently pressed and the juice is left to settle in stainless steel tanks. Fermentation takes place at controlled temperatures in stainless steel tanks. The wine is then aged for two years in French oak barrels. A soft, creamy texture with tropical overtones. Bright fruit flavors of pineapple and lemon with a hint of vanilla and toasty oak.

name: Lee  abernat Sauvignon Blend 1991
description: Leeuwin Vineyards, situated in the northernmost region of the Napa Valley, has been owned by the Leeuwin family since 1896. In addition to his estate in Rutherford, Leeuwin has been owned by the family of winegrowers who have been producing world-class wines since 1963. Since 1992, Leeuwin has been owned by the Leeuwin family and winemakers for more than 25 years.

name: Norade Brog Criana
description: Criana is a blend of 50% Tempranillo, 40% Garnacha, 10% Syrah and 10% Petit Verdot. It is a beautiful ruby-red color. On the nose, there are aromas of fresh blackberries, plums, and licorice. The mouth is full and warm, with loads of ripe fruit and spice. Flavors of plums, blackberries and blueberries are accompanied by notes of toasty oak and spice. This is a full-bodied, rounded wine with a long finish.

name: Granghee 2002
description: This wine has the signature Chardonnay flavor and balance that has made it a favorite of many fans of this wine in the Napa Valley. This is a crisp, fruity wine with a lightly mineral edge that makes it the perfect accompaniment to a wide range of foods. A unique blend of grapes from the cooler Napa Valley to the warmer Napa Valley, Granghee has the complexity of fruit that comes from the cooler Napa Valley. The wine is fermented in stainless steel tanks and aged in stainless steel tanks to preserve the crisp character and texture. A lightly-oaked wine with a delightfully bright and fruity finish.

name: Steger Macinap Cuvene Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: Deep, intense and purple color. On the nose, there are layers of concentrated black fruits, including blackcurrant, black cherry and cassis. In the mouth, it is full-bodied, with lots of volume, well-balanced with a long finish. Very elegant and refined Cabernet Sauvignon, with pure varietal character.

name: Baranas Ve Montebine 1097
description: Blend: 60% Monastrell, 20% Syrah, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon Sweet, deep, intense and aromatic, with a complex range of berry, dark chocolate and spice. On the palate, it is full-bodied, with soft tannins and a long, complex finish. Very appealing. Enjoy with grilled meats, roasts, pasta and cheese. A great match for game birds or venison.

name: La Nerch Noll Pinot Noir 2015
description: This wine has a deep garnet color. The nose is complex with aromas of dark cherry, berry, cedar, and spice. The palate is rich, round and supple with flavors of dark cherry, blueberry, and sweet spice. This wine is balanced with good acidity and tannin, providing a lengthy finish.

name: Treenons Aldramano Riserva Conterier 2000
description: The deep red color of this wine heralds the intense aromas of sweet, ripe berry fruit with hints of spicy oak. The palate is full and soft with excellent balance between fruit, oak and tannin. This is a wine to savor on its own, but would be a superb accompaniment to game, veal and other red meats.

name: Pribignate 2017
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: The 2017 Petite Sirah is a dark garnet wine with aromas of black cherry, currant, and a hint of mocha. Flavors of blueberry, black cherry, and cassis are accented with spice and a touch of pepper. Medium bodied with soft tannins and balanced acidity, this wine has a long, smooth finish.

name: Dolamina Carnarca Cuvee Bragne Saevignon Blanc 2017
description: Cuvee Bragne is the name of a single cuvée in the Dolamina family. This wine, the first in the estate, is a blend of the three native white varieties in the region: Vermentino, Viognier and Riesling. It is a delicious wine to drink as an aperitif and a great companion for appetizers.

name: RVoen Estate Surostille Yuerras Pinot Noir 2011
description: The wine has a deep garnet color and an expressive nose of wild blackberries, cranberries, and cherry cola. The palate is long and supple with flavors of dark berry and spice. The wine finishes with great balance and structure.

name: Vinger Galle Vineyards Ginge Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: The wine shows its potential, but we believe this vintage has no future ahead of it. The intense nose of black cherries, black currants, licorice and spice is complemented by an earthy edge. On the palate the wine is rich and elegant, with a round, full-bodied core of cherry, berry and cassis fruit, and toasty oak and vanilla. The finish is long and smooth, with an elegant balance of tannins and crisp acidity.

name: Berrofbey Cranamily Nape Blund 2014
description: The 2016 vintage is an aromatic white wine with a fresh, fruity nose. The palate is nicely-balanced, dry and refreshing, with a delicious crisp acidity and a smooth finish.  Ceretto Arneis, the Godfather of Wine, is here! The blend of Trebbiano, Pecorino and a touch of Malvasia dei Vigna, the Godfather of Wine, is here! The label above the wine has a pic of a backdrop of a guyot with a stylistic hand. It is the image of a Nicolas' God, who predominating the winery.

name: Groborg Reserva Zinet Noir 2012
description: This is a wine of great character and finesse. It is deep cherry-red in color with aromas of ripe blackberries and redcurrants. It is well-structured with smooth tannins and a long finish. It is a wine that can be enjoyed by itself, but can be also used with a wide range of foods: from pasta or risotto to meat dishes, and even pizza.

name: Cleiver Abley Latecti Pinot Grid 2015
origin: from Dundee Hills, Willamette Valley, Oregon
description: Pairs well with foods such as smoked salmon or tuna. It also pairs well with smoked chicken and pork, as well as beef or game. RH Phillips EXP Syrah-based Pinot Gris 2014 [response] [category_1] White Wine. Best when chilled with a bit of air, the wine will delight the senses. The wine is deep, rich, and ripe with aromas of tropical fruit, orange peel, and tropical notes. The finish is long, with notes of honey, apricot and a hint of minerality. This wine is an excellent match with grilled salmon, seafood, pasta, risotto, duck, and cheese.

name: Kester Botre Red Roado 2016
description: The 2016 Red Roado has a deep purple hue in the glass. This wine has aromas of plum, cherry, and blackberry with subtle hints of cedar. Flavors of black cherry, dark chocolate, and spice. The wine has a silky mouthfeel and is framed by refined tannins and a bright acidity. This is a full-bodied wine with a long finish.

name: Pianto 1988
description: This wine is deep ruby in color, leaning towards garnet.  It has a complex bouquet of spice and fruit.  On the palate it is dry, full-bodied, and velvety, with excellent structure.   This is a wine suited to all occasions.

name: Bonnquita Bouzianu 1998
description: The bouquet of this wine is filled with scents of violets, cherries, and currants, with subtle hints of pepper and spice. The palate is dry, warm, and full-bodied, with perfect fruit flavors and soft tannins. A delicious match with pastas with tomato sauce, or with mature cheeses such as Parmigiano Reggiano, Pecorino, or Pecorino.

name: Rapalas des Pinas 2004
description: The name of the wine comes from the Latin bovale, which refers to the fact that the varietals used to produce the wine are Vernaccia, Tempranillo and Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Rado Martino La Felicqued Classione Gran Spenig Jamalnino 2017
description: Deep, intense violet color. On the nose, it shows aromas of dark fruit, spices and balsamic notes. The palate is smooth, with soft tannins and a medium structure. The finish is long, with notes of fruit and spices.

name: Tnha Unrwero Cabernet Sauvignon (375ML half-bottle) 2014
description: The color is deep and deep purple. On the nose, there are aromas of wild berries, black cherry, cassis and spices. The palate is smooth with soft tannins, and flavors of cassis, berries, plums, and a hint of chocolate. A very balanced wine with a long finish.

name: Mognaildp Edo Napa Valley Zinandel 2014
description: The Edo Napa Valley Zin is a delicious red wine blend of Zin from our finest Napa Valley vineyards. Deep red color, ripe black cherry and raspberry fruit flavors with a rich mouthfeel. The sweet, spicy, jammy aromas are accented by vanilla and cinnamon. On the palate, this wine is bursting with jammy, black cherry and a hint of spice. This wine is rich and layered with smooth, silky tannins.

name: erramet Holdnes Estate Russion Vineyard Chardonnay 2000
description: The delicate fruit of this wine makes it the perfect complement to the finest fish, and it is excellent with Asian, Mediterranean and other richly sauced dishes.  Terrunyo Sauvignon Blanc 2001 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] White Wine [category_2] Sauvignon Blanc [origin]  from Chile

name: Lra Grist Bit Vineyards Caberet Sauvignon 2004
description: The wine is characterized by its deep garnet color. The nose is intense, ripe black fruit flavors with an exotic hint of violets and toasted oak. The mouth is full and smooth with an added touch of soft tannin, while the finish is long and concentrated. This is a full bodied wine that is enjoyable on release, but will continue to improve with bottle aging. Enjoy with grilled beef, game or poultry.

name: Grogelal Shardonne Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The color of this wine is light yellow with green hues. The bouquet is intense, complex, with tropical fruits (pineapple, banana, lemon), as well as some floral notes (lime blossom) and a hint of vanilla. The wine is dry, full-bodied and rich on the palate with a long finish.

name: Re Brosnerson Vineyardi Vineyards Zinfandel 2018
description: The nose of this Zinfandel is filled with scents of ripe cherry, spice, and toasted oak. Flavors of blackberry pie, pomegranate, and currants mingle on the palate and are supported by soft tannins and balanced acidity. It is a luscious, mouth filling wine with a smooth finish.

name: Brobo de Landy Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: This is the second release of the 2014 Brobo de Landy Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine is a dark purple color. Aromas of black cherry, dried herbs, cassis, dried herbs, and black pepper spice. Rich, balanced and well-structured with flavors of blackberry, cassis, and cocoa nibs. This wine is full-bodied and has a long finish with fine tannins.

name: Argiana Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: Intensely fruity, full-bodied and complex on the nose, rich, spicy and complex on the palate. Firm but velvety tannins. A long finish. A great wine to roast meats and cheeses.

name: Sagal 2 Ballorelord Pinot Noir 2013
description: The color is deep, dark ruby.  On the nose, aromas of blackberry, cherry, licorice, spice and sandalwood.   The palate is ripe and concentrated, with flavors of blackberry pie, bramble, and hints of spice.  The tannins are firm and the wine has good weight, yet balanced with a lingering finish.

name: Tinrey St. Eoghine Zinfandel 1999
description: The 1999 Zinfandel is a rich, full bodied wine with a spicy, strawberry aroma.  It is very elegant and supple in the mouth with a beautiful balance between fruit and structure.  This wine was produced from grapes grown in the northern most part of the Napa Valley.  It has a deep garnet color.  Aromas of berries, cherries, and spice.  Flavors of berries, cherries, spice, and herbs.  Medium bodied, with a long finish.  This is a big wine but can be enjoyed by itself as an aperitif or with any meal.

name: Ca Bato
description: The Ca Bato red is a light and clean wine. It has a lively color with light violet hints. It has a high-intensity berry-fruit nose with a high amount of finesse. It also has a high-quality structure, high acidity and a high-alcohol level. This balance is ideal for producing high quality, high-quality Spanish sparkling wines.

name: Reman Reselenca 494 Cranashy Scheriolbera 2012
description: The grapes from the Reserva 484 come from younger vines (6-20 years) planted in sandy soils with a high limestone content, which, with a high proportion of clay, is ideal for growing high quality, concentrated and powerful red wines.

name: Loye Seneopena Reserve Chardonnay 2009
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The Sèopena Reserve Chardonnay has aromas of lemon peel, butterscotch, and roasted chestnut. Flavors of white peach, nectarine and crème brûlée with hints of vanilla, caramel, and toasted brioche.

name: Guquica Syrah Alan Daria Nedita Reder Pionlo 2002
description: The color of the wine is deep purple with violet tones. The nose is spicy and fruity. On the palate, the wine has a soft tannic structure with an acidity level of perfect balance. The final is spicy and fruity.

name: Breen Sigery Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: The Breen Vintage Ports are always a pleasure to drink. Very fruity, full-bodied, very complex, with a long aftertaste. A blend of some of the best regions in the Cabernet region. A deep purple/black color. On the nose, concentrated aromas of blackcurrant, cassis, blackberry, and smoky oak. The palate is full and soft, with excellent balance and very good structure. Enjoy this wine with grilled meats, hearty pastas, and richly flavored cheeses.

name: Yalinarza Anda Velte Buncia 2014
description: Deep, dark ruby red color. On the nose, the wine shows its complex and intense bouquet, with notes of ripe blackberries, cherries, and sweet spices. The wine has a velvety feel on the palate, with soft tannins, and a long finish.

name: Garnari Tam' Jelo Moscato d'Apila Borgano 2016
description: The grapes are harvested at optimal ripeness and then immediately placed in the sweets. The grapes are then cooled in steel tanks to prevent bruising. After the grapes are harvested, they are delicately pressed in traditional basket presses. The juice then spends time in steel tanks to develop its full potential, while retaining its natural Co2 content.

name: d'Arelion Chardonnay 2013
description: The Arelion Chardonnay is a bright golden color. On the nose, notes of white flowers and citrus fruit. The palate is well balanced, with flavors of pineapple and green apple and a delicate minerality. This wine has a rich texture, with a long finish. A great pairing with seafood and white meat.

name: Celerbot Soumi Carnare Romallina 2002
description: Bright red color. The nose is fruity, fresh, and floral. On the palate the wine is dry, but fruity and mineral. It has a good structure, tannin, and acidity.

name: J. Lorenseact 201 Sauvignon Bllanc 2016
origin: from Lake County, North Coast, California
description: The color of this wine is light yellow with a slight greenish edge. The aromas are reminiscent of fresh-cut grass, yellow apples, lemon peel, and a hint of minerality. The flavors are also citrus, mandarin, and mandarin oranges. The wine has a crisp, refreshing finish.

name: Yarnady Duant Pinot Noir 2014
description: Vibrant garnet in color, this wine has aromas of cherries, berry, earth and savoury French oak. The palate is rich, complex and textured with dark berry fruit and savoury French oak. This wine has a fine tannin structure, which will support additional complexity with cellaring.

name: Duvaista yervro Reserva Chardonnay (1.5L) 1998
description: The wine is bright gold in color. Intense varietal character with layers of rich tropical fruit flavors. Intense and full-bodied, the wine has a lovely creamy texture and a long finish. This wine pairs well with seafood, poultry, white meats and cheeses.

name: Novilt Bermane Mountain Pinot Niiner 2000
description: This wine shows a deep black cherry nose with a touch of earthiness and a dash of pepper. In the mouth it is silky and complex, with a well balanced finish. This wine will age nicely over the next 4 to 5 years.

name: Lousso Family Cellars Sauvignon Blanco Estate Pinat Noir 2015
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The 2015 Sauvignon Blanc has a light straw color. The nose is filled with bright citrus and fresh cut grass. The palate is filled with notes of grapefruit and lime. The finish is long and clean with a clean bright finish. The wine is a great match with a wide range of foods from grilled fish to chicken. It also pairs well with spicy Asian cuisine.

name: Lancenato Rerfel Welhorake Syrah 2003
description: Deep garnet red with shades of violet. Intense and elegant, with a delicate hint of violets. Full-bodied and harmonious with soft tannins, it shows an excellent structure and a long finish.

name: Gricke Wintantes Mobacholba Cabernet Sauvignon 1995
description: . Deep, dark red with a garnet core. Vivid aromas of boysenberry, dark chocolate and savoury oak complement undertones of blackcurrant, anise and cigar box. The wine is lush and elegant, with a velvety mouthfeel and a long, concentrated finish. Ripe berry and cherry fruit flavors dominate the palate. The wine is balanced and full bodied with soft tannins. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Cabernet Franc.

name: Forgele Merrot 2007
description: The 2007 Forgele Merlot has a rich purple color and aromas of cherry cola, cedar, tobacco, and sweet tobacco.  The flavors are full of blackberry and cherry cola.  The tannins are soft and round with a long silky finish.

name: Vallabertema's Chreix des Padinu Grane Cles Herrestondarey Chardonnay 2011
description: The grapes from the Castelao Alentejo vineyard are selected for their high quality and low yields. The result is a complex wine with great structure and a long finish. It is an elegant, elegant Chardonnay with great balance and great ageing potential. It will develop in the bottle for 10 to 12 months.

name: Deannel Landets Shi Hoer White Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: Sh Hoer Vineyard sits at the top of the hill above the winery, overlooking the Columbia River. It is located at the top of the hill where grapes ripen evenly, developing a high level of rich ripe fruit. The vines are meticulously farmed with low yields of small berries and very little irrigation. The resulting wine is deeply colored with a complex nose of mint, cherry and an earthy nose. The wine is big, with excellent structure and a silky texture. It has a long finish with flavors of raspberry, spice and earth.

name: Chastulin Andescer Red Trenella Pinot Noir 2017
description: Ruby red with garnet highlights, this wine has a complex bouquet with a hint of spice. It is smooth and balanced with flavors of black cherry and plum. The finish is long and savory with a hint of spice.

name: Selbert Ridgensalnan de Vica Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The nose is intense with ripe blackberry, cassis, tobacco and spice. The mouth is long and balanced with a hint of chocolate. A rich, supple wine with a long silky finish.

name: Maisalo Vinaoti Pricoti Syrah 2013
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: A delicious Syrah from the most southern of the Paso Robles appellation.  Deep and spicy, with layers of blackberry, plum and black currant fruit.  Flavors of plum, black cherry, and blueberry lead to a rich, smooth finish.

name: Nico antrisila Prepumino 2010
description: Ruby red color with light shades of garnet. Aromas of fresh fruit, including wild cherries, raspberries and plums. The palate is smooth and savoury, with an elegant structure, mild tannins and a smooth finish.

name: Elle & Vistifondima Malbee 2016
description: Pair with red meat, game and seasoned cheese. A classically styled wine with excellent structure and balance. It is a true regional blend of the best of the best of the best regions to produce a full-bodied, rich, soft and complex wine with smooth tannins. It is a wine that can be enjoyed today or cellared for future enjoyment.

name: Louis Jadot Pachelly-Cotesset Premier Cru Cru de Artrosonste Rombota 2016
origin: from Pachey-Cote de Beaune, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: Pineapple and apple fruit flavors with an earthy, smoky edge. Rich and concentrated with a long finish. Pairs well with grilled salmon and poultry.

name: Domaine Ferrii's Bruterses Le 2023
description: This spumante wine has a fine and persistent perlage. The nose is elegant, fruity and floral, with a hint of minerality. The palate is harmonious, fresh and very Brutish.

name: Brunon Semillog/Rosse 1997
description: An elegant, rich, fruity and floral wine, with a fine and delicate mousse. An exceptional vintage from the great chocolaty hills of Champagne. A perfect partner for meals with finesse, delicacy, style and finesse.

name: Chayter Negite Les Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The nose is filled with a mix of black cherry, currant, and blackberry fruit with a touch of dark chocolate and a hint of sage. The wine fills the mouth with a richness and density, while maintaining the elegance that has always defined Château Margaux. The tannins are firm and the acidity brightens, creating a very approachable Cabernet Sauvignon. This is a well-balanced wine with a great aging potential.

name: Tambanit Jeas Pinot Noir 2010
description: This wine is a cherry red color with violet tones. It has a fruity nose, with notes of raspberry, blackberry, plums and a hint of coffee. The wine has a soft, well-balanced mouthfeel, with a great structure and lingering finish.

name: Jean Lith Estatese Old Vineron 2005
description: Established in 1885, the family has been farming these ancient, head-trained vines since 1928. The Estate Old Vineron is located at the winery's highest elevation point on the Vistorta. Made from grapes harvested from the highest parts of the Vistorta, the wine is rich, complex, and balanced.

name: Napavalll Chardonnay 1998
description: The nose of this wine exhibits layers of ripe fruit with layers of complexity. The aromas are immediately expressive with pineapple and lemon-lime notes. The flavors are of pear, lemon-lime and apple with a hint of toasty oak. This is a rich and full-bodied Chardonnay with a toasty finish that is balanced by a note of bright acidity.

name: Carveon Difbertine 2013
description: This wine has a deep dark ruby color and opens with aromas of dark cherry, ripe raspberry, sandalwood, sandalwood and a hint of vanilla. On the palate, it has a full, lush texture and flavors of cherry pie, fresh berry pie, red cherry cola, and brown sugar.

name: Domaine Dol Month du Callaro Casaler Feoravais 2016
description: Dol Month's calls to mind the flavors of the Corsican summers. The wine is a blend of three white varieties grown on the meander of the Serein, one of the region's most beautiful white wines. The mineral character of Gavi is balanced by the citrus and citrus notes of the Sauvignon, and the softness and opulence of the Chardonnay. It has a beautiful balance of ripe fruitiness and crisp acidity, with flavors of citrus, pineapple and just-ripened melon.

name: Domaine de la Mouvier Ducot Viar Deu Belnaretulo 2015
origin: from Viar de la Marra, Cote de Nuits, Cote d'Or, Burgundy, France
description: The Ducot Viar de de deubelnarta 2011 has a light ruby red color with light purple hues. It is fruity, with some mineral notes. The mouth is fresh, with good structure and soft tannins. It has a nice balance between acidity and tannin. The aftertaste is long, with some notes of licorice, raspberry, blackberry, and plums. A wine of great finesse. It will improve over the next 3 to 5 years.

name: Domaine Ord Mardognion Chambertin Chateaud Blaccrioole Chateaunnan Sauvignon Bointafelles Vieillas 2017
description: Blend: 80% Sauvignon Blanc, 10% Merlot, 10% Petit Verdot

name: Bericge Estate Varley Mes Endera Reserva Syrah 2009
description: The wine shows a deep, purple-black color, with aromas of blackberry, blueberry, and cassis, with a hint of dark chocolate. On the palate, it is rich, with deep berry flavors and an exotic spice quality, with notes of pepper and tobacco. This is a layered wine with soft, velvety tannins, and a long, elegant finish.

name: Gayned Avitia Friava Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: The 2009 Friava Cabernet Sauvignon is a well-balanced, full-bodied wine with aromas of blackberry, plum and cedar. On the palate, the wine shows rich berry flavors, with notes of black pepper, dried herbs and a smooth, soft finish. Enjoy with red meat, grilled meats, and hearty pasta dishes.

name: Renocho Priamerrati Torgetary Prossioch Gamreauttaroet Merlot 2001
description: , one of the oldest estates in the Rueda district, is the estate of Dona Marguery. Located at the foot of the Sierra Foothills in the heart of the hills above the Russian River Valley, the winery occupies Renocho Prieur's historic domaine in the region of Mendoza. The estate was founded in 1896 by the Etchart family. After making such a wine in the area, winemaker Damien Chianti Fonseca produced a wine that was aged in new French and American oak for 16 months.

name: Chateau Quantht Meuits Shato bin Gruvigno 2014
description: Blend: 80% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Franc, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon The color is a deep purple, almost blackish, with violet shades. On the nose, the wine is intense and very fresh, combining finesse with the richness of the wine. The wine has an elegant structure with round, polished tannins. It is a harmonious wine, with good complexity and a very long finish. The intensity of the color is deep and the nose is very expressive and pleasing. The intensity of the wine is expressed with a great finesse, without being in excess. The wine has a lovely balance between a great elegance and power, without being in excess.

name: Moscatton Roen Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: Blend: 81% Cabernet Sauvignon, 17% Merlot, 4% Malbec, 3% Petit Verdot, winemaker Ross Givry Domaine Givry Domaine Givry is pleased with the 2000 Cabernet Sauvignon Classico. This is a rich, full-bodied wine with a lovely perfume of cassis, spice, and toast. A dense, saturated purple color in the glass leads to a sweet, elegant, full-bodied wine with layer after layer of ripe black fruit, savory, and smoky oak flavors. This beauty is the epitome of the word  Juggle which comes from  Juggling which is  Chinon and punchy and rocky and it shows the potential of the wine region of Champagne.

name: Zinabaliessio Granga Nortana Petro Montacuucsa Siluil Suvignono 2014
description: The 2014 wine shows a bright straw yellow color with delicate aromas of citrus fruit, tropical fruit and a hint of sage. The wine is full and fresh on the palate, with good acidity and excellent structure.

name: Murtara delle Naciqui Arma Valley Cabernet Saivignon 2016
description: The wine is a deep ruby red color. On the nose, it has intense aromas of ripe blackberry and cassis, which are also complemented by notes of sweet spices, tobacco, cedar and mint. On the palate, it is full-bodied, with sweet tannins, and a long finish.

name: Per Hillma Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
origin: from Hillside Estate, Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: The 2016 Per Hillana Cabernet Sauvignon is deep garnet in color. Aromas of plum, blueberry, and a hint of toasty oak complement the intriguing nose. On the palate, this wine shows bright berry fruit flavors, along with a hint of spice, pepper, and chocolate. This full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon has a silky, soft texture, with supple tannins and a round, smooth finish.

name: Innaban Tenvanz Riesling 35 Cabernet Noir 2016
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: A pure expression of the grape in the Russian River Valley, this wine shows the power and beauty of the Russian River Valley terroir. The wine has a beautiful golden straw color. The nose is filled with white flowers, sweet spice, and a hint of minerality. The wine fills the palate with flavors of honey, spice, lemon peel, and fresh ginger. The tannins are in balance with the fruit, and the wine finishes with a hint of toasty oak.

name: Chateau Quarturs-Santenatage Sauvignon Blanc 2013
origin: from Pays d’Oc, South of France, France
description: Poujeaux-hessian Les Voleysesuedes (OU Kosher) 2017 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] Sauvignon Blanc [category_2] Sauvignon Blanc [category_2] Sauvignon Blanc [origin]  from Poujeaux-Villages, the appellation of Lantignie, France

name: Snostae aublon Langa Wine Diurry Chardonnay 2005
description: The 2005 Chardonnay is medium to light yellow in color. Aromas of fresh cut Pippin apples and stone fruits jump from the glass. A hint of butterscotch and some subtle vanillin oak add complexity. The palate is soft and approachable with flavors of apple, peaches and grapefruit. This is a fruit forward Chardonnay that is perfect for current enjoyment but will continue to improve with 2-3 years cellaring.

name: Gurssnon Chateauneuf-du-Pape 1999
description: Here is a wine to savor on its own terms, but with a little attitude. Deep red/purple in color. On the nose, aromas of blackberries, cherries, truffles and spices. Rich and ripe in the mouth, with a core of supple tannins. A wine with a personality that is so successful that some tasters even suggesting it will improve with age. This is a wine for the ages without the doubt one of the best Chateauneuf-du-Papes from the region. It is a blend of 75% Grenache, 20% Syrah, 10% Mourvedre and 5% Cinsaut. The grapes are 100% old, all from the oldest estate vineyards in the region, with an average vine age of 65 years old.

name: Chateau St. Deust Le Cormes P.A. Cochillaa Cuvee Elbarria 2013
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Blend: 60% Syrah, 40% Mourvèdre It is a deep purple color. The nose is rich and intense, showing concentrated flavors of dark berries, cassis, black cherry, and licorice, along with spicy and smoky notes. It is well balanced, smooth, with a good tannic structure and a long finish. A great pairing with grilled steak, spicy sausages, or steak tartare.

name: Chateau Sauver) 2008
description: The style of Chateau Sauvignon Blanc is harmonious, with a fine nose of red fruits, citrus fruit, and freshness. It is fresh, smooth and balanced on the palate, with good complexity.

name: Dena Castore Monteno Songia Schola 2006
description: A vibrant, berry-fruit bouquet with a hint of violets. On the palate, the wine shows good integration of fruit and oak, with plenty of structure and fine tannins. Berry fruit flavors dominate, with some mid-palate black pepper and a hint of spice. Good depth and concentration, with a long finish.

name: Tary Ferrington Posciquesto 2013
description: Blend: 80% Douro white, 20% Tinta Roriz, a grape that has never had any new oak casks, and was bottled unfined and unfiltered.  The wine shows incredible depth of fruit and full body. It's a delicious wine that has just a touch more charm and class than the regular vintages. You can feel the vibrant fruit in the wine, and the intensity of the fruit is incredible. The aromas of this wine is the result of an old-vine blend of 80% Douro white and 20% Touriga white grapes. It is a fresh, crisp wine with loads of citrus and floral notes, but the best elements are the crispest ones, the minerality and the minerality. The wine is very fresh and aromatic, with great balance.

name: Domaine do Creganche Reanzuge d'Astande Reservifano Chirante 2017
description: Chirante is an attractive ruby color with light shades of violet. It is a wine of great finesse and elegance. It has an attractive and complex nose with a light touch of spice and balsamic notes. In the mouth it is fresh, dry and harmonious with a great structure, with a fine acidity and balance. It has a very nice and persistent finish.

name: OFuntade Valley LaChanfer Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: This is the first time in the estate's history that the grapes from the estate of LaChanfer have been selected as tasting-over-elivers wines. This is a step in the traditional Rioja crianza.

name: Michaopello Riesling Shiraz 1998
description: A brilliant pale yellow/greenish wine with lifted, rich, floral nose. Hints of peaches, pears and garden herbs, with a distinctive, subtle mineral edge. The palate is soft and full with excellent fruit/acid balance and a subtle, rich finish. The wine has good structure, but it is supple and easy to drink. This wine is an ideal match with spicy Asian foods, especially spicy Thai and Szechuan Chinese food.

name: Sadericella Zinfandel Norgreler Cotkelt Jands Chandonnay 2007
description: The fruit for this wine comes from the winery's own vineyard, the Norgreler, at the base of the hill on a fog-swept slope. The site is just inside the entrance to the winery and enjoys a cool climate which produces very flavorful grapes.

name: Codeninte Wiert-Strassew Chardonnay 1999
description: A wine with a rich texture and an expressive nose.  The particular typicity of the grapes with a high natural sugar level (as is often the case in Chardonnay) is balanced by the low yields of the vineyards with an attractive acid level.  The result is a wine with a rich full, fleshy mouthfeel, well-rounded wood integration and a creamy texture on the palate.

name: Dry Riccation Bes Cabernet Sauve 2006
description: The 2006 Bes is a blend of fruit from our Estate Vineyards, as well as some additional fruit from our growers in the southern part of Napa Valley. Aged for 18 months in French and American Oak barrels, this is a rich, powerful, delicious wine with a deep, rich color and a beautiful nose of blackberries, cherries, and cassis. This is a wine that truly expresses the unique character of the Rutherford AVA.

name: Sewott Snection Sauvignon Blanc 2001
description: This wine has a vibrant and vibrant light straw color. The aroma is very inviting with delicate tropical notes of guava, lychee and passion fruit. The palate is very expressive with citrus, passion fruit and grapefruit flavors. The finish is long and balanced with a nice crisp acidity that refreshes the palate. This wine is a perfect accompaniment to grilled seafood such as lobster, crab or scallops, as well as salads, pastas and mild cheeses.

name: Datolion Grige Vineyard Family Hiill Sauvignon Blanc 2018
description: The 2018 Sauvignon Blanc from the Grige Vineyard has a golden straw color. Aromas of lemon peel, white peach and honeysuckle. The palate is refreshing with tropical fruit and a light minerality. This wine is a perfect accompaniment to grilled chicken or fresh fish. Serve chilled.

name: Daurmin Rabc Suneak Zinfandel 2007
description: A garnet red colored wine, very complex and elegant. It is elegant on the nose, showing an exotic, spicy and fruity intensity. The palate is dry, smooth, round, with a good tannic structure. It has a long aftertaste, with hints of fresh fruits.

name: Yarmonsa Reder Sumen Valley Riesling 2014
description: The wine has a vibrant straw color. The nose is clear and fruity. The palate has a lively mouthfeel. This wine is perfect with any kind of Chinese or Thai dish, or with any kind of Chinese or Chinese-spice dish. It has a good balance between sweetness and freshness.

name: Barontoro Red Rois Merlot 2004
description: The 2004 Barontoro Red (100% Merlot) has a rich ruby color and an elegant nose featuring jammy cherries, blackberries, and spice. It's well-balanced with soft tannins and a smooth finish. Its deep red color, full body, and smooth texture make it a wine that can be enjoyed by itself as an aperitif, or with any kind of grilled meat dish.

name: Peille Cotes des Nourvel Pouves Laulandosso Drie Chalis Mounte-Proberty Piageurs Paaule) 2007
origin: from Pouves, Roussillon, South of France, France
description: The Laulandon family has always desired a bright, pure, rich Chardonnay from the Languedoc. This 2006 is rich and intense, with mineral notes and a touch of fresh herbs. This is the wine of choice for grilled fish, pork chops, or chicken.

name: Carminia Moscaco Reserva Cabertet Sauvignon 2004
description: This is a bright, full-bodied wine with intense aromas of blackberry, cassis, and a hint of sweet cigar box. Flavors of blackberry, cassis, and cedar are balanced by sweet oak and a soft tannin finish.

name: Ferra Segeztoffore Vinoz 2016
origin: from Cachapoal Valley, Rapel Valley, Chile
description: Intense red color. Aromas of blackcurrant and cherries. Velvety in the mouth with notes of cassis, cherries and a hint of chocolate. Soft tannins lead to a long and complex finish.

name: Greonens Estate Gopdumail Pinot Noir 2018
description: This wine shows the unique characteristics of the Estate Gopdumail site. Intensely perfumed, this Pinot shows bright raspberry and cherry fruit with a touch of earthy earthiness. The palate is full and rich with a hint of dark cherry, black raspberry and a touch of earth.  This wine shows well on release and should continue to improve with time in bottle. The tannins are firm, yet velvety.  Enjoy this wine with grilled salmon, beef and pork.

name: Rayk Hosson Juth Chaber La Grords 2016
description: Pairs well with richly flavored dishes such as grilled salmon with a roasted portabella mushroom and roasted butternut squash risotto.. Pairs well with BBQ pork.  Try with spicy chili sauce or venison with a side of sweet potato fries.

name: Hour-Gamandes Pmignes 2001
description: The 2003 Pmignes (100% Cabernet Sauvignon) is a blend of 90% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Merlot aged for 12 months in new French and American oak. Opaque purple-colored, it offers an alluring perfume of cassis, spice box, pepper, and black cherry. Supple and smooth, it has excellent balance and a long finish. This is a hedonist's delight and drink-me-now wine should evolve nicely for 2-3 years. It is a blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon, 22% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc, 4% Petit Verdot, and 2% Malbec.

name: Vead Scolle 1998
description: This wine is a delicious blend of our favorite lots.  Cabernet Sauvignon provides structure, and Merlot softens the tannin and fruit.  The Cabernet Franc component adds a brambly quality to the wine.  We blended the Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Petit Verdot for this wine, creating a wine that has a rich nose and a soft silky palate.  Flavors of cherry, plum and spice complement the complex structure and long finish.

name: Dumuis Della Grenergues Mognuux 2005
description: The wine has a deep red color with purple shades. The nose has berry fruit aromas. There is also some mineral notes. On the palate the wine has a soft, fleshy fruit with mineral notes. It is well-balanced with a long finish.

name: Chateau Janean Montain Gros Charbiere Gerard des 1988
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: , the benchland of the Languedoc district in the Languedoc district of the Languedoc district of the Languedoc. The charbiere trees are 20 to 40 year old, situated at the foot of Mont d'Oc. The vineyard covers 300 acres of vineyards which are located on the south side of the hill in the Languedoc. The climate is mild, hot and sunny with hot summers, low rainfall and mild winters. The region's high altitude of the Languedoc is the key to producing great wine.

name: Colal Foros Corstona Doy Ispatett Redernar Snichaech Astate Red Monobarivallese 1997
description: , meaty and full-bodied, with loads of berry fruit, herbal and earthy aromas. Full-bodied, with chewy tannins and a long finish. Perfect for hearty pasta dishes, risotto, meat-based pizza and meat-based venison dishes.

name: Deax Jodus Casteto 2014
description: Blend: 50% Grenache, 20% Syrah, 15% Cinsault, 5% Mourvèdre, 5% Counoise The 2014 J Rudy is a deep purple color. On the nose, the wine is both concentrated and aromatic, with an exceptional depth and concentration. On the palate, it is full bodied and elegant with rich fruit, and an incredible balance between acidity and tannin. The wine has a velvety mouthfeel, with a long finish. The finish is long and harmonious, with flavors of red berries, spice and minerals. It is a wonderful example of a wine from this region.

name: Chateau Pagual Duin Sererot 2014
description: Blend: 75% Syrah, 25% Grenache, a blend of 80% Syrah and 5% Viognier, a blend of 80% Syrah and 5% Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Chateau Fyigugen 2014
description: Deep garnet red with an intense nose of red berry fruit, mocha, spice, and liquorice. Lush and round on the palate, with silky tannins and a long finish.

name: Chateau Chavetol Blanc 1994
description: Chavetol winery is located in the heart of the Graves region of Bordeaux.  This is the first village in the Côtes de Gascogne valley to have the rare combination of both great finesse and power.  The majority of the blend is from gravelly soil and the remainder from clay soil.  The soils are clay with gravel. The wine has a lovely aromatic nose, rich and creamy on the palate, with lots of finesse and great balance.  Chavetol winemaking is modern, with modern techniques, low yields and traditional winemaking techniques.  The wine shows great finesse and a great personality.

name: Twesseller Jadoma Merlot 2001
description: The Jadoma Merlot is a dark cherry-colored Merlot blended with a small amount of Cabernet Sauvignon and Cabernet Franc to give a complex, smooth, and supple wine.  The wine is crisp, jammy, and full of cherry and berry flavors with a touch of spice and mint.  This Merlot pairs well with roasted meats and other hearty fare.

name: Puciano Serlico 2012
description: This is a delicious, crowd pleasing wine. It's a blend of Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Cabernet Franc, that's perfect for the casual, yet sophisticated profile of this wine.

name: Pazado Rilo Ronse 2000
description: Tasting Notes: Deep red with purple glints, it shows a complex bouquet of toasty oak and spice. Flavors of licorice and black fruit. Rich and complex, with a long finish. A wine of structure and balance that will continue to evolve for the next 8-9 years.

name: Tratoris Barbary Red Reserve Pinot Noir 2011
description: This wine shows a deep garnet color. It has a complex bouquet of dark cherry, ripe raspberry and plum. Hints of sweet vanilla and toasty oak. The palate is round with a silky texture and a rich, long finish.

name: Dalkson Petrat Klick Du Host Nata Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: , our second release of this new wine continues the KlickDuHost, a blend of two of our favorite vineyards. The winery is located in the village of Fleurie, the very first village in the Côtes du Rhône Valley. It is a wine with a deep garnet color and great finesse. This wine has a beautiful, deep purple hue. On the nose it shows its potential with aromas of black cherry, blackberry, cassis and some balsamic notes. In the mouth it is complex and powerful with smooth tannins and a long finish. This wine will continue to develop with further aging.

name: Laguteni Merlot 19988
description: Deep, intense, ruby red color; fruity, elegant, distinct varietal character and pleasing finish. Ruby-red in color. A medium bodied, mellow, velvety, stylish wine with a pleasing finish.

name: Maes Cries Roesde Zinfandel 2012
description: The wine shows a deep, dark purple color. It is extremely fruity on the nose, with aromas of black fruit jam, spices and smoked notes. On the palate, it is powerful, with ripe and spicy tannins. It is an elegant wine with a great structure and balance.

name: Hanson Ruwing-Taures Bxauct Rood Shiraz 2013
description: The palate is ripe, rich and full-bodied, with aromas of dark berries, spice and pepper. The tannins are soft and elegant, with a long, velvety finish. This is a classic Barossa Cabernet Sauvignon that will benefit greatly from short-term cellaring.

name: Thich Napa Valley Gemangh Rient Chardonnay 2014
description: The 2014 Gemangh Rient has a bright nose of pear, pineapple and a hint of nougat. This is a rich, weighty wine with a creamy, oily mid-palate. The finish is long and fruity with just a touch of minerality.

name: Siramarey Hender Lefy Capar Chardonnay 2012
description: Pale yellow in color with a green tinge. The bouquet of this wine is full of rich tropical fruit flavors. Lime and ripe apple are the dominant fruit notes. The French oak adds complexity. The palate is rich and well balanced with a long complex finish.

name: Trethamer Estate Banbechen Ingioniellar Merlot 2013
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: This full bodied red has a beautiful deep purple core with a red brick rim. Aromas of raspberry, black cherry, and cedar. Flavors of cherry, chocolate, and spice. The soft tannins are balanced by a sweet long finish.

name: Domaine Beravey Haut Lors de Viognieri 2016
origin: from Cotes du Rhone, Rhone, France
description: Blend: 45% Grenache, 40% Syrah, 15% Mourvèdre, 5% Cinsault, winemakerredhead. The wine has a deep purple color. On the nose, the wine is spicy with black pepper, licorice and plums. The palate is very well balanced with soft tannins. It has a long finish with a pleasant spiciness. A great wine to pair with full-flavored dishes.

name: Domaine Roos Pethit Cotenaud Chuvilloliar 2016
description: Blend: 80% Chardonnay, 20% Pinot Gris  Pasty, creamy notes of dried cherries, cassis, sandalwood and mint. This is a rich, smooth wine with a long finish. This is a wonderful introduction to the wines of Chablis. A blend of three village wines from different vineyards in the Côt de Beaune and Côt de Nuits.

name: Bantion CaTne Old Valley Chardonnay 2014
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Pair with rich seafood dishes or chicken. Livio Felluga Pinot Grigio 2012 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] White Wine [category_2] Other White Blends [origin]  from Veneto, Italy

name: Winey Gryan Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: The wine shows aromas of cassis, plum, and cedar box with undertones of brown sugar and sandalwood. Flavors of black cherry, cassis, dried herbs and toasty oak are followed by a long, smooth finish.

name: Nottarlem Chardonnay (OU-K Moshorne) 2013
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The use of natural methods and traditional methods for vinification of the grapes continues to take place. The result is a wine of great structure, depth and complexity. A nose of ripe melon and tropical fruit notes is complemented by hints of vanilla and a light oak presence. The palate is rich, ripe and balanced with a lush, round texture. A long finish of mouthwatering acidity makes this wine a perfect match with a variety of foods, such as roast chicken, salmon, veal, pork, and seafood.

name: Chateau La Cres Leopriolo Chianta 2012
description: The Chianti Classico Riserva has a beautiful ruby red color. On the nose, the wine is fruity and complex with scents of black cherry, plum and cherry jam. It is dry and smooth on the palate, with flavors of black cherry, plums and a hint of vanilla. It has a lengthy finish.

name: Robegtuvieleal T. Ges. Riesling 2014
description: Pale yellow color with green reflections. Complex and intense on the nose, with notes of lime, peach, exotic fruits and herbs. On the palate, the attack is soft and round. The minerality is noticeable, with a nice balance between acidity and sweetness. The minerality is noticeable, with a nice concentration, a fresh and minerally finish.

name: Mallattolotela Cuvee d'Al Indsbo Leapa Gu 1996
description: The wine is dark ruby in color with purple edges. It has a ripe fruit nose, intense with varietal characteristics of plums, berries and raisins, complemented by slight spicy and toasty notes. On the palate the wine is complex, rich and full-bodied, with sweet tannins and a long finish.

name: Ruboel Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Pairs well with grilled red meat, game, and cheese. The Ruboel family has produced a Cabernet Sauvignon that is rich, with ripe, soft tannins and beautiful structure. The 2015 vintage has a dark garnet color. It has intense aromas of blackberries, cassis, and subtle earthy notes. This is a big wine with firm tannins and a long finish. This is a rich, balanced wine with great potential to be enjoyed now or cellared for 5 to 10 years.

name: Tuwlens Valfertino 2015
description: The Valfertino grape from the winery is a little more Old World in style than the Tempranillo and the Garnacha Blanca grape. The vines are between 3 and 40 years old and planted on a mix of lime and clay. The vineyard is situated at the foot of a hill which cuts through the mountains in the Ebro River valley.

name: Badina Hermonso 2013
description: Ruby red color. The nose is intense and fruity with aromas of red fruits and spice. The palate is soft and warm, with good structure, integrated tannins, and a long finish.  Pair with roasted meats, stews, casseroles, and well-aged cheeses.

name: Awpes Seliogrico 2001
description: The grapes are fermented in steel tanks, then matured for 3 months in French oak barrels. awpere wood and smoky French oak complement the bright berry nose. The palate is smooth and supple, with a hint of sweetness balanced by the firm tannins characteristic of the Awpere fruit.

name: Esenta Rood Blanc Sanessian Pinot Noir 2016
description: Bouquet of spicy dark cherry fruit with a touch of savoury notes. Palate shows power and weight with a long silky finish. Enjoy with grilled salmon, beef and duck.

name: Vineal Gifba The du Vallomiger 2007
