description: This wine is a wonderful match with roasted meats, fish and pasta with meat sauce. It is excellent with rice dishes, pasta with meat sauce and mushrooms.

name: Fimy Dryen Forsang Toutas Red Mollen 2005
description: The 2005 Garnacha Tintorera (Tempranillo) was aged in new French oak, and bottled unfined and unfiltered. It exhibits a dark ruby/purple hue along with a sweet perfume of smoke, pepper, smoke, and black cherry. The palate is medium to full-bodied, with loads of fruit, good fruit, and a lengthy finish. This is a great wine to drink now, but should evolve nicely for 2-3 years. It should drink well for 2-3 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Starta Oristion Runse 2004
description: A great wine to pair with paella, pasta, pizza, barbecue, roast beef, or cheese. The 2004 starts off with a nose of cherry liqueur and cloves. Firm in the mouth, but very soft in texture, the wine has a silky texture and excellent balance. The finish is long and pleasing. A delicious wine to drink now and enjoy for the next 5 years.

name: Termunter Pionant Filance 2009
description: The Pionant filice has a straw color with greenish hues. The nose is intense and complex, with ripe fruit aromas (quince, peach, pear) and floral tones (liquorice, acacia, honeysuckle). In the mouth, the fruit aromas (quince, peach, pear) are well-integrated and balanced, with a great concentration and richness in the mouth. The finish is long, with notes of fruit and floral aromas (liquorice).

name: Dariosto Gavo Failliviera Sait 2018
description: The nose is intense and characteristic, with berry fruit and spices notes. In the mouth it is round, soft, and elegant, with a slightly tannic finish.  Pair with pasta or risotto, meat dishes, venison, and cheese.

name: Veedozion Estate Estate Winery Winemake Nazamaine 2013
description: The wine has a dark, opaque, ruby-red color. The nose is floral and spicy, with fresh fruit, such as cherries, blackberries, and plums, as well as fresh, aromatic herbs. The flavors are full, round, soft, and elegant, with great balance and a long, lasting finish.

name: Molphard Hidrmonied Viollia Colmy Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: A full-bodied wine with bright aromas of yellow peach, tangerine, apricot, and honeydew. With more fruit on the palate, and more freshness and acidity, this wine has more character and makes a great aperitif.

name: Fersany Reserve Syrah 2012
description: Deep, dark purple. Syrah-based aromas of smoked meat, wild berries, pepper and black pepper. Fine-grained tannins add structure and a hint of minerality. The finish is long and persistent. This is a wine with character. Deep purple, it has an impressive core of fruit, with a delicious core of blackberries, cherries, plums, spices and vanilla. Full-bodied and intense, with a long finish. This is a wine with the soul. It will continue to improve for at least 10 years.

name: Sambarat Palleviemle Wisersed Sesselle Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
description: Bright garnet color. Red fruit nose, with a hint of licorice. The palate is smooth and round, with a hint of chocolate and a good, long finish.

name: Talbamrioren Sheta Syrah 2005
description: This wine is a deep purple with a deep crimson hue.  The nose shows red berry fruits with a hint of liquorice and black pepper.  The palate is full and rich, with flavors of blueberry, spice and dark chocolate.  This wine has a velvety tannin structure, with a long and smooth finish.

name: Jack Jadonne Bohgete te Vigne-Hormagno 2016
description: The vineyards are located on the eastern side of the hill, at an altitude of 300m. The soil is clay and sand, and the vines are pre-phylloxera. The wine is full-bodied, with black fruit and spice on the palate, and a long finish.

name: Jo. Rico & Chondon 2000
description: Blend: Macabeo (45%), Parellada (45%), Parellada (10%) & Xarel.lo (10%) & Macabeo (10%) & Parellada (10%)

name: Clon Herrentes de Malbec 2003
description: Deep violet color.  Intense red fruit nose (raspberry, blackberry, etc…) with some mineral notes.  Well structured and balanced, with good tannic structure and a long finish.  This wine pairs well with red meat and game, and cheeses.

name: Bonkdefts Te Albyek Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2014
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: Pale straw color. The nose shows passion fruit, green fig, and grapefruit with a hint of lime blossom. On the palate, there is a velvety mouthfeel with juicy, fresh flavors of honeydew, grapefruit, and green fig. This wine is full and round with a crisp, clean finish.

name: Metrricot Sphere's Umegampagni Zinfandel 1993
description: Plum, cherry, raspberry, spice, and truffle, with a hint of pepper. Eucalyptus and oak are evident on the palate, with a light, pleasing, and lingering finish. Pietroso Brunello di Montalcino 2013 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Sangiovese [origin]  from Montalcino, Tuscany, Italy

name: Domaine Futries Cotes deur dies Chateauneuf-du-Heuge Lrutiam Pesrisemelaa Il Reserve Saint Classiono Brut
description: The Liraméricente vineyard has been organically-farmed since 1992. The soil consists of clay and limestone, which lends a great finesse to this sparkling wine.

name: Gebentiany Hinsoue Pinot Noir 2016
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: This Pinot Noir has a bright garnet color. The nose is filled with cherry, berry, cola and spice. The palate is rich and smooth with flavors of cherry, blackberry, cola, spice and hints of spice. The wine is balanced and has a smooth finish. Pair this wine with grilled salmon, lamb chops, duck confit or soft cheeses.

name: Forder Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Maltum)-Smere 2007
description: The 2007 Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep purple core. Blackberry, plum, and spice on the nose. This wine has a smooth, velvety texture on the palate with a long, balanced finish. Our favorite pairings include grilled lamb chops, duck, and beef tenderloin.

name: Martoi Restoulai 2001
description: From therestoulai district of Galicia, the free-range Martoi family vineyard has been farming dry land since 1967 in the Upper region of the region. From there, they have produced a refreshing, dry white wine with a fresh, fruity, spicy style.

name: Catelbilante Casa Rose Romano 2015
description: Pale pink with violet reflections. On the nose, notes of fresh fruit with a hint of citrus. In the mouth, it is dry and fresh with citrus fruit flavors and a hint of minerality. It is a lively, refreshing wine with a long finish.

name: Suento Ridrettono Anta Alber Pas Canve 2009
description: The color is a dark ruby red with garnet highlights. The nose is characterized by notes of ripe fruit, berries and sweet violets, with seductive balsamic and spicy hints. The mouth is rich, with great structure, ripe tannins and a well balanced acidity. The finish is long and savory.

name: Dauchescies Blans Te Baron Symave Merlot 1999
description: The color is a deep dark ruby/purple with aromas of cassis, black cherries, spice, and mint.  The wine is medium to full bodied, with great depth of ripe fruit and a long finish.  This is a wine that can be enjoyed upon release, but will benefit from 4-6 years of bottle age.

name: JaEvin Norrary Vineyard Pinot Noir 2007
description: This Pinot Noir is a blend of grapes from the warmer northern end of the Monterey AVA.   It exhibits bright berry fruit with hints of earth and spice.  It has a soft, silky texture and a smooth finish.

name: Rebent Sonny Estate Zinfandel 1999
description: This Estate Vineyard is located at the headwaters of the Russian River Valley. The hillside was planted in 1997 to the old Wente clone of old Zinfandel which has produced a unique, highly-extracted wine. This unique clone of old-vine Zin is a result of a joint venture between the families of Napa and Sonoma. The wine has a spicy, raspberry aroma and a firm tannin structure. The wine is full-bodied and rich with a long finish.

name: Morterladscato Sauvignon Blanc 2008
description: This wine is bright, clean and lively on the palate with tropical fruit aromas of pineapple and lychee. It is nicely balanced with a creamy, round finish.   Foley Estate Winery Santa Barbara County Sauvignon Blanc 2008 [response] [category_1] White Wine

name: Reffertine Cabernet Sauvignon 2003
description: The 2003 Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and full-bodied with a deep ruby-red color.  On the nose, the wine offers complex aromas of cassis, cherries, spice and herbs.  Flavors of black cherries, spice, herbs and herbs are complimented by a long, smooth finish.  Enjoy this wine with grilled meats, wild game, or aged cheeses.

name: Lapunpa Nicca Brums Espata 2010
description: The cool, dry summer months of the foothills of the Andes Mountains provide the ideal terroir for the Cabernet Sauvignon grape.  With a brilliant dark purple color, this wine shows ripe, concentrated fruit flavors with notes of spice and mint. The Petit Verdot contributes an extra level of complexity and depth to this wine.

name: Testar Grougo Damio Lamol Grofano Prepalligpori del 2008
description: Purple color. Intense, characteristic nose of berry fruit. Soft, full-bodied, harmonious, and velvety texture. A lingering finish with spicy tannins.

name: Penradori Brando Reder Vieletra Rosela 2013
description: Pairs well with fresh salads, fried calamari, and grilled salmon., winemaker Mario Giorgiungeri Artzi brandied cherry pie in garnet-red tones. Expressive aromas of red fruit, pomegranate and cranberries. Lush, juicy flavors of red berries, especially cherries. Smooth and refreshing with a touch of sweetness on the palate, the finish is long, fresh and fruity.

name: Fourwan Red Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: The 2002 Cabernet Sauvignon is a deep ruby/purple color as well as a perfume of blackberries, cherries, and plums. It offers a medium to full-bodied, silky, elegant, concentrated wine with layers of black and red fruits. It has beautiful purity and beautiful definition. It should drink well for 10-15 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Jugni Willyming Riserne Sauvirancon Cavertion 2008
description: The perfect accompaniment to grilled swordfish with lemon sauce, tuna marinated with basil pesto or a delicious goat cheese with figs, chamomile and fresh pippin apples.

name: Terma Spol Hersagni Salestino Amitil Rancheres Rose 2010
description: In the mouth, the wine is fresh and juicy, with a well-balanced acidity. A long finish with a hint of minerality.  , wine-making and winemaking techniques were used, with whole clusters pressing and fermentation taking place in stainless steel tanks. The wine is aged for 4 months in stainless steel tanks. The wine was bottled after 18 months barrel maturation, with a lightly filtered and bottled wine.

name: Fortari Oregie Selestion Reak Abites 2014
description: This wine is deep purple in color. On the nose, it shows notes of black cherries and plums, complemented by hints of spice. On the palate, it is full-bodied with excellent tannins and excellent balance.

name: Boita Fris Dando Malihi Riservia Reserva 2009
description: Deep violet color with intense aromas of sweet spices and berries. The palate is full and rich with red fruits, sweet spices and integrated oak. Tannins are soft and silky. This wine has a long finish with great balance and complexity.

name: Badier Krettona 2014
description: The color is pale gold with green hues. The nose is intense with tropical fruit aromas such as pineapple, citrus, and mandarin. These notes are complimented by subtle woody and spicy oak aromas. The palate is soft and full with flavors reminiscent of the nose, with a nicely balanced acidity. The finish is long and fresh, with mineral notes and a hint of tropical fruit flavors.

name: Peap Gata Veltollin Porthe 1998
description: A rich, velvety wine with a rich, spicy nose and a smooth, long finish. Very appealing, intense, and fruity on the nose, with lots of fresh, ripe fruit. A great year of aging potential.

name: Moyaras Hiranginion Vineyard Pinot Noir 2014
origin: from Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: The 2014 vintage is the first vintage of the Hirangille Vineyard Pinot Noir. This is the first vintage of the vineyard designated ‘Hirangolic' wine that is a 100% estate blend from the winery.

name: Montearst Ponth Pinem Sauvignon 1998
description: This wine exhibits the best of the vineyards from our estate vineyards. The aromas are reminiscent of fresh cut grass, the flavors of ripe pineapple, and the ripe honeydew melon. A soft, silky texture is the key to the full flavors and excellent finish. This wine is the perfect accompaniment to grilled seafood or any light summertime fare.

name: Crlessack Vineyards Oest Honcoa Hill Murgagniera 2013
origin: from Walla Walla Valley, Columbia Valley, Washington
description: Blend: 52% Semillon, 26% Riesling, 17% Riesling Cultivated in the highest parts of the vineyard, where the soil is volcanic, the winery was surprised by how successful this wine has turned out. The wine has a deep straw color with a nose of honeysuckle and ripe peaches. It has an elegant balance between acidity and fruit and an extraordinary finish. The wine has a delightful balance of acidity and minerality.

name: Chuteau Dateillo Itnell Mougness die Beaunes 2016
description: It is the wine of a family winery with a very friendly reputation. Its personality and finesse are a surprise, with a balance between the fruit and the aromas of the oak barrels. The wine has a very clean, intense, concentrated nose, with black fruit, mineral notes, spices and licorice. It is fresh and fruity in the mouth, with a smooth, friendly tannic structure and a long finish.

name: Domain Artuliat Santa Blanc Chablis 2014
description: The nose is expressive and open, developing fruity aromas (citrus fruits, citrus fruits) as it is. It is full-bodied, well-balanced and harmonious on the palate, with a nice mineral finish.

name: Apra Cabernet Sauvignon (OU Kosher) 2010
description: This is a dark, dense, and concentrated Cabernet Sauvignon, with a spicy and fruity nose and a full-bodied mouth feel. This Cabernet is excellent to drink now, but it will continue to evolve for another 3-5 years.

name: Hefd Reservion Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: The wine is deep purple in color. Classic Cabernet aromas of black cherry and black currant dominate the nose, with a subtle hint of mint. The flavors are full bodied and rich, with layers of concentrated black cherry, currant, and cedar. This Cabernet Sauvignon is well balanced, with a toasty oak finish. The wine is enjoyable upon release, but will continue to improve with additional bottle age.

name: Kiil Merlet Ruingach Heiret Chardonnay 2003
description: Kiil is an exciting new site in the heart of the Heiret, just outside the village.  One of the most exciting sites in all of Germany, the Heiret vineyard is located on the steep hills surrounding the village of Heideberg.  The tiny, berry-like vineyard is completely surrounded by forest, and the wine has a subtle herbal, spice character that is very refined and elegant.  This is the wine for the American importer, and for the German importer, this is a truly interesting and unique Chardonnay from the Mosel.  The Heiret has good structure and depth, with a long finish and excellent balance.

name: Alballe di Catolia Sulonfica Orion (1.5 Liter Magnum) 1996
description: The grapes are harvested at optimal ripeness and sorted, destemmed and crushed. The must is then fermented in steel tanks with temperature control. After malolactic fermentation, the wine is aged for one year in barriques (20% new oak barrels).

name: Macwood Rarvona Vineyards Cabernet le Chardonnay 2016
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: This wine is a bright pale gold color. On the nose, the wine is floral and fruity. With floral aromas of jasmine, citrus and white peach. The palate is smooth, with a slightly creamy texture and a crisp finish.

name: Penfollee Enloria Red 1998
description: A light, spicy, fruity red wine with a soft, slightly earthy finish.  This wine is a blend of mostly North Coast grapes.  It is a lighter, easy-drinking red wine with a fresh, pleasing finish.  It has fresh and spicy aromas.  The earthy aromas of this blend are a good match for game and beef.  It is excellent with pasta, risotto, poultry, or just about any grilled meat dish.  Try this wine with a spicy Thai beef salad.

name: Goastarbil Pogge Napa Hadriet Neia La Brane Reserve Lenja Barala 2015
description: Deep garnet red in color, with aromas of black cherry, cassis, spice and rosemary. On the palate, the wine has a soft, full attack with a hint of sweetness balanced by lively acidity and a supple, firm structure, and flavors of ripe dark fruit and spice. This is a full-bodied wine with a long, smooth finish.

name: Lawo Malico Valmy Inbaraso 1995
description: A blend of 60% Tempranillo, 20% Cabernet, 10% Merlot, 10% Syrah and 10% Petit Verdot, the 1995 Valmy Inbaraso is sourced from the high altitude region of Valmy in the region of Alicante. A deep ruby/purple color is followed by a nose of spice box, smoke, and black cherry fruit. On the palate, the wine is medium to full-bodied, with loads of fruit, spice, and earth. It is a blend of 50% Tempranillo, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, and 10% Syrah. It is a rich, supple, elegant wine with a long finish.

name: Willeyasso Stena Cabernet Sauvignon 2012
description: The 2012 Stena Cabernet Sauvignon is a big wine that is deep garnet in color. The aromas are filled with notes of dark cherry, blackberry and blueberry, with subtle hints of spice and earthy minerality. The palate is filled with flavors of blackberry, dark cherry, vanilla and spice. The wine's tannins are firm and well-integrated, providing a mouth-filling texture and a long, lush finish.

name: Stagian Vines Cellar Pinot Noir 2008
description: This wine is deep purple in color. Aromas of red cherry, cranberry, rose petals, vanilla, and sandalwood. Flavors of black cherry, cranberry, and cola with a touch of earthiness. The finish is long and elegant.

name: Chateau L'amifangel Rose 2012
origin: from Cotes de Provence, Provence, South of France, France
description: The robe is a deep salmon-pink and rosy. The nose is very expressive, with aromas of exotic fruits (pineapple, lychee and passion fruit), citrus fruits (grapefruit), and white flowers (lime blossom, acacia, acacia and lilac). The mouth is full, rich and well-balanced, with great finesse and a great freshness. The final is long and fruity.

name: Dumado Melloquellar 2000
description: A dark, dense color with a brick red rim. An elegant nose of mature fruit with hints of vanilla, chocolate and spice. The palate is lush and well-structured with a pronounced roundness and great balance. A long finish with hints of vanilla, chocolate and fruit. This wine has great ageing potential.

name: Chateau Brunosso Maucano Rose 1999
description: Crisp, bright and wild strawberry with floral aromas. Fresh, lively fruit. Light to medium bodied with a lingering finish. A blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah. The result of a blend with other Rhône varietals, this dry, light bodied wine is a nice light-bodied red wine with a touch of spiciness. It is a dry, soft wine with a soft, round palate.  It has a lovely salmon color. It has an aroma of strawberries, plums, cherries, and a touch of spice. The finish is soft and round. You can taste the flavors in the wine, but the wine has good structure to allow it to age well. It is a great Rose to enjoy with pasta, poultry, pork, salmon, or just about anything!

name: Borgel's-Redagu Zas Chapataaurel 2010
description: A perfect accompaniment to charcuterie, pizza, grilled meats, stews, hearty pasta dishes, and cheeses. A deep garnet-colored wine with a violet edge. The nose is broad and complex with aromas of raspberry, strawberry, and black pepper. The wine is fleshy and well-balanced with flavors of black cherry, raspberry, and spice. Its tannins and structure make it an ideal match for a wide range of food from pizza to pasta, hamburgers, and even pizza.

name: Lamoria omes Juavince Julls Barre Rader 2016
description: Blend: 40% Syrah, 20% Garnacha, 20% Tempranillo, 10% Petit Verdot, the majority of the blend went through malolactic fermentation, resulting in a concentrated, full-bodied wine with an intense perfume of spice and black cherry fruit. The wine has excellent balance, deep, dark color, and a long finish. In the mouth it shows plenty of body, with round, soft tannins and a long, fruit-laden finish. It should continue to improve for at least 5-10 years, but can be enjoyed now with decanting.

name: Terrindes Lendoney Valannen 2016
description: This is a delicious, refreshing white blend from the region of Barcelona with the richness of fruit from the coastal vineyards. Lend Honey is a light, refreshing white wine with a fresh, fruity palate. It is fermented in stainless steel tanks and aged on the lees to give it added complexity and body. It is perfect for summer days.

name: Froghineztan Meadenlellay Merlot 1998
description: The grapes from this vineyard have undergone extended maceration and 50% malolactic fermentation. The resulting wine is a full-bodied wine with spicy and smoky flavors, elegant tannins and a smooth finish. The wine is a fine example of the best that our vineyard has to offer.

name: Odendanzian Tte bertis Vineyard Syrah 2014
description: A light-bodied, fruit forward, easy drinking Syrah with just a touch of tannin and good structure. It has sweet fruit with an abundance of cherries, plums, and chocolate flavors, and smooth, soft tannins. It is a versatile wine that complements a wide range of foods, from light pasta to hearty meat dishes, and can even pair with meaty fish such as salmon or tuna.

name: Wille Viczoiss Cellars Rose 2017
description: The wine is light and dry with a beautiful minerality and aromas of fresh cut wild strawberries. A balanced acidity on the palate with crisp layers of fresh fruit flavors and a lingering finish. Perfect for a warm, sunny day on the river or a warm, sunny afternoon on the river. It is a perfect wine to enjoy by itself as an aperitif or with a wide range of foods.

name: Kunnamette Valettra Olda Zinfandel 2007
description: A robust and concentrated dark red wine with a full-bodied flavor spectrum of flavors of dark cherry, black pepper, cinnamon, and spice. This Zinfandel has a juicy mouthfeel, ripe with plum, blackberry and cassis. It has a robust structure with smooth, silky tannins and a long, complex finish. This wine is ready for immediate enjoyment but can continue to improve for 5-7 years.

name: El JSSantrignio Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This wine has a deep, deep purple color. On the nose, there are berry aromas, with balsamic and toasted notes, and some toasted bread. It is warm and round in the mouth, with a lot of structure and balance. It is very pleasant and elegant. It is a very elegant wine with a great potential.

name: Slo Valetto Balla Chardonnay 2003
description: This is a fresh, tasty, light-fruited wine with a creamy texture, mild acidity, and a crisp finish.  It is perfect with seafood and lighter fare. Davis Family Vineyards Russian River Pinot Grigio 2011 [response] [category_1] White Wine

name: Tint Coll Treadition Reserva 2017
description: The TinticOL “Corda” (Tempranillo) is the winery’s selection of the best oldest Tintill fruit from their oldest vines. The oldest vines are located at an elevation of 500m and are planted on ungrafted, pre-phylloxera rootstock. They are harvested by hand in the second week of March. The wine is aged for 18 months in French oak barrels (20% new) and 10 months in bottle before release.

name: Bropks
description: nan

name: Halle EstaPe Paran 2014
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: Blend: 44% Petite Sirah, 26% Petit Verdot, 15% Zinfandel In the glass, the wine is deep purple in color. On the nose, aromas of raspberry, blueberry, and violet. Flavors of raspberry, blackberry, and pomegranate are complemented by a hint of pepper, anise, and cedar. A well balanced, full bodied wine with firm tannins and a long finish. A blend of 50% Syrah, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petite Sirah, 6% Grenache, 5% Mourvèdre, 2% Merlot, 3% Malbec

name: Shatasel Elpage Raa Cabernet Sauvignon 1993
description: The color of this wine is deep crimson. On the nose, it is rich, full bodied and fruit-forward with aromas of ripe berries, plums, black cherries, spices and some earthy characters. On the palate, it is nicely-balanced with sweet, soft tannins and a long, smooth finish.

name: Peadim Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 vintage of the Peadim Cabernet Sauvignon has a deep purple hue. The nose is filled with notes of red cherry, currant and raspberry. The palate is soft, but has a lush mouthfeel, with flavors of red fruits and hints of spice. This wine is a perfect match for the ever-so-slightly-not-over-oaked Chardonnays from around the world, as well as smoked salmon, risotto, lamb chops, and even pizza with goat cheese.

name: Bounettoria CVazfonne) 2005
description: The color is a deep purple, almost blackish. The bouquet is elegant, intense and fragrant with clear-cut overtones of red fruits, particularly cherries and plums. It is dry, warm and slightly tannic on the palate, but at the same time it has a warm and inviting feeling of being in balance with a long finish.

name: Ballingas Mounti 2004
description: The wine shows intense dark fruit aromas with hints of spice and toasted French oak. On the palate the wine shows great balance with a soft velvety texture. Flavors of ripe black fruit and a toasty, nutty vanilla oak finish.

name: Santa yotana Ro Pinot Grigiana 2009
description: This wine has a yellow color with pale greenish hues. The nose shows intense aromas of ripe peaches, pears and citric notes. The palate is well-balanced and complex, with good acidity and a long finish.

name: Cotefaine de Purletrour Losentito Sopianion Roccia Santantullo 2018
description: Deep ruby color. Intense aromas of red fruits, spice and balsamic notes. Well structured on the palate, with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Grand Hurry Winery Unecsrophe 2014
description: This wine is the first blend of the four white varietals that make up the Uneclines. It has a lovely nose of honeydew melon, orange blossom, and tropical fruit notes. Flavors of crisp pears, peaches, and hints of cream are followed by a smooth finish. This is a delightful wine to drink as an aperitif, or to drink with any meal.

name: Posibay Reserve Cabernet Sauvignnon 2004
description: The 2004 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is a blend of 80% estate-grown Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Syrah, 10% Merlot, and 10% Petit Verdot. Opaque purple-colored, it exhibits a perfume of smoke, cedar, blackberry, and cherry. Dense, chewy, and tannic, it is a classic Cabernet that should evolve for 3-4 years and drink well through 2015. It should drink well for 10-15 years.

name: Cartina Y Charles Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 Pinot Noir has a ruby color. The nose is fruity, with aromas of cherry, plum and spices. The palate is balanced with a long finish. , the winery has produced a wine with an impressive deep purple color. The nose is very elegant and fruity on the palate with good structure and good volume. The oak adds a very pleasing touch. It is a complex, harmonious wine with good tannic structure, good balance, with very good acidity and a round, silky texture.

name: Peilginyl Pinot Blanc 2004
description: This is a wine to enjoy on its own, as an aperitif, or with any grilled fish.  The wine shows great fruit and an exotic array of floral, fruit and herbal notes. On the palate the wine is full and rich with a long, soft finish. A good wine to drink with friends.

name: Hewhol Garnovardon Seruci Reservre Pinot Noir 2014
description: The 2014 Garnacha is a classic that exhibits a lush palate of fresh cherry, red plum and rose petal. With a subtle earthy edge, this wine has a firm structure that is a perfect complement to the beautiful fruit flavors. This wine finishes with a long, silky finish. A delicious wine to pair with a wide range of dishes, from savory to spicy ethnic, this is a wine that is great by itself, but will also make a wonderful partner to game and meat dishes.

name: Canby Syrah Blenrich Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
origin: from Red Hills, Lake County, North Coast, California
description: Blend: 91% Syrah, 5% Petit Verdot, 1% Grenache The first vintage of the Canby Syrah has a deep purple hue. The wine shows aromas of black cherry, blackberry and cassis. On the palate, it shows an amazing full-bodied attack with loads of ripe fruit and a smooth, long finish. We feel that the Canby Syrah will continue to improve with age. The Canby Syrah will continue to improve with cellaring and should continue to drink well for at least 5-7 years. The Canby Syrah is a blend of the best Syrah and Merlot from our estate vineyards in Red Hills, Lake County.

name: Tallas Famialy Ranc. Lew Cellars Chardonnay 2015
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The nose of this wine is very fruit forward and fragrant. The Ranc is showing a balance of minerality, crisp acidity, and richness. A soft and inviting texture is filled with notes of stone fruit and citrus. The mouthfeel is soft and inviting. There is a lot of power and a great balance between minerality and fruitiness. The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Markaiva Masero's Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: Deep, intense red color. On the nose, the wine shows notes of dark cherries, plums, and cassis. It is full-bodied and rich on the palate, with layers of jam and black fruits. This well-structured wine is full of flavor, with a smooth, lingering finish.

name: Berons & Hamin Shiraz 1997
description: The palate is full and the wine has excellent varietal fruit flavours. The wine has a soft, round palate, which is the hallmark of excellent shiraz from Australia. The wine has long been the first in the Cabernet Sauvignon area to be given a traditional vinification with the skins, thus retaining a vibrant, fresh, fruity style. This wine was made from grapes grown in the Clare Valley, the Limestone Coast and Yarra Valley, with each region providing complexity to the wine. The wine was fermented in stainless steel tanks and matured in French and American oak hogsheads for 12 months.

name: KP. Or Faliry-Estate Blend 2008
description: The 2008 vintage of the Falthy-Estate Blend has a beautiful garnet color with a nose of blackberries, red plums, and sweet oak. The flavors of dark berries, black cherries, and spice are framed by velvety tannins and a soft, round finish. This is a full bodied, rich wine that is great for everyday enjoyment.

name: Axxandmohill The Bay Coamtta Vineyords Anglex Pinot Noir 2037
description: Brilliant ruby color. On the nose the wine is perfumed with notes of violets, black cherry, blackcurrant and a touch of cloves. The wine has a soft and elegant attack, a rich mid-palate and a soft tannin structure. The wine has a full and persistent finish. Perfect for pastas or cold cut sandwiches.

name: Elox Rederse Carysemache Hiscitipheiso 2015
description: The wine has a deep purple color. The nose is rich and complex with scents of red fruits, spices and pepper. The palate is long and smooth with soft tannins and excellent acidity.

name: Jomanca Pese Wliolledto Dolo Regela 2001
description: Ronchi Barbaresco 2011 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Nebbiolo [origin]  from Barbaresco, Piedmont, Italy

name: Elk Pretid A. Espy Cabernet/Sauvignon 2015
description: This wine is a dark, dense, deep garnet color. The wine has aromas of black cherry, cherry pie, cassis, and cedar. The wine fills the mouth with a medley of ripe red fruits, and a rich, balanced and persistent finish. This is a delicious Cabernet Sauvignon from the northernmost portion of the Willamette Valley. The wine was bottled unfined and unfiltered to retain all its deep complex fruit flavors. The wine shows great depth and concentration. Enjoy this wine with grilled steak, barbecued ribs, or a hearty beef stew.

name: Sentasto Sepino Swestoine Estate Chardonnay 2012
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2012Swestnut Chardonnay opens with aromas of peach and jasmine with hints of toasted bread. On the palate, the fruit is bright and fresh with flavors of pear, lemon and lime. The finish is long and complex.

name: Greeadon Syrah 2016
description: A deep purple-black center with a blue-black center in the glass. Aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and cassis dominate the nose with subtle hints of anise, vanilla, and chocolate. On the palate, the fruit is predominant with a nice balance of sweetness and tannin. Flavors of blackberry, cherry, and blueberry are followed by notes of cedar, anise, and toasty oak. A rich, smooth, velvety wine with a long finish.

name: Albin Red Roye 2008
description: A full-bodied, complex wine, with layers of ripe, dark berry fruit and spice. It has a long, pure, intense finish, with velvety tannins. A wine to enjoy with roasted meats, game, stews and rich pasta dishes.

name: Closaco Vomy Salati Petlinas Vhilne (375ML Alferett 2015
description: Pale yellow color with a nose of peach and tropical fruit, with hints of toasty notes. On the palate, it is well-structured, with a long finish and perfect acidity.

name: Gilan Winth Vineyard' Winera Zinfanter 2009
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: This wine is a rich, luscious and juicy red-purple color.  Black cherry, plum and cassis fruit with notes of tobacco and vanilla.  On the palate, this wine shows rich flavors of blackberry, raspberry, cassis and spice.  This wine is lush and concentrated, with soft tannins and a long, smooth finish.  This is the perfect wine for the holidays.

name: Redgoals Santa BarutE Rembonna 2018
description: The namerembonna is a tribute to the Rembonna of the family who delivered the grapes to the winery in a box of 3.5 parcel (4.5 ha) in the region of Madrid. It is a Rembonna ( Cambrian) wine produced from the Cabernet Franc grape, the native variety of Spain, with a small amount of Syrah.

name: Fato Mariote Thereek White Blanc 2010
description: Pale gold color with greenish shades. On the nose, aromas of citrus and white flowers. The palate is balanced with citrus notes, a hint of minerality and a long finish.

name: Fyphullerlo Horico Shiraz 2003
description: A richly flavoured and textured wine with a deep purple hue. The palate is a complex mixture of dark berries, spice and cedary French oak characters. The tannins are firm yet fine and smooth, and the wine has excellent balance and structure. It should evolve nicely for at least 3-5 years.

name: Cuvee Lusaille Chateauneuf-du-Pape 1997
description: The 1997 vintage is a little cooler than usual with mild temperatures, and we had a warm, dry winter. We had a lovely harvest in late March. This gave way to a wine with plenty of stuffing, as it came to us. A little rain came through during veraison, but we had a wonderful harvest to go on. It shows a rich color, with a vibrant nose of fresh cherries, sweet spices, and a touch of earth. On the palate it is round and soft with layers of red fruits and spice. It has a silky mouthfeel and a long finish. It is a wine to enjoy with dinner. It will continue to improve with age.

name: Barnor Carnettole Vineyard Litha Gulenina Latiomel's Preracian 2009
description: Blend: 50% Nero d'Avola, 25% Syrah, 20% Rondinella, 5% Alicante, 10% Malvasia

name: Benutner Amatione Conme Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: The 2016 vintage has produced a wine with a vibrant color and aromas of dark cherries, strawberries, raspberries and plums. With fresh fruit, some earthiness, and a hint of cedar, this wine has a delicious palatefeel and great balance.

name: Travicco Napa Fraerie Nieri 2007
description: This wine is a blend of old vine Syrah (70%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (30%) that has been aged for 24 months in small French oak barrels. A dark ruby/purple color reveals an impressive perfume of blackberries, black cherries, and violets. This full-bodied, layered, rich, supple, luscious, rich, layered, opulent, rich, concentrated wine should evolve for 10-15 years. It should drink well through 2023.

name: Pinero dela Criassiole 2015
description: This wine is a delicious match with grilled meats, roasts and game. It also pairs well with hard cheeses, such as Parmigiano Reggiano., region's best example of the Tuscany region, this Pinot Noir displays a bright ruby color. Aromas of ripe berry fruit lead to a well-balanced wine with intense fruit flavors. It's a wine with plenty of character and an impressive structure.

name: Vina Pridota Castolo Rose 2015
description: Pale pink with a light fuchsia rim. On the nose, aromas of fresh fruits and flowers, such as violets and red berry fruit. On the palate, this is a fresh and balanced wine with a great structure and great volume, with an elegant, mineral and fruity finish.

name: Ol Forasezo Baroja Randha 2012
description: Blend: 80% Tempranillo, 20% Garnacha, winemaker Chris Ringland of Rock 'n' Roll Wines and Winemaker Chris Ringland of Rock 'n' Roll Wines and Estate Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Touja Tulenriet Duilli Bantassico Fressonett 2001
description: Touja is a full-bodied, concentrated, deep-colored wine made from the indigenous grape variety, Tinto Fino, with a small amount of Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine is aged entirely in French oak barrels for 2 years. Rich and velvety with plenty of body, it is a beauty from the great estate of Duil Estate in the northwest part of the Duil Valley.

name: Ferma Ofcis Reserva 2018
description: Intense ruby color. On the nose, fresh notes of red fruits, balsamic notes and aromatic herbs. The palate is full, warm, and well-balanced, with silky tannins. The fresh notes of the nose follow through to a long-lasting finish.

name: Santa Navit 2000
description: Drink with all types of meat, pasta and risotto.  Full-bodied, with soft tannins and a long, long finish.  A perfect wine for game birds, barbecue and spicy dishes. The wine shows intense berry fruit, plums, cherries, and chocolate characters, with an attractive, velvety aftertaste.  This is a full-bodied, rich wine, with good tannins and a long, persistent finish.  It is a perfect wine to enjoy with food or by alone as an aperitif.  It is a wine that complements anything, any meal, or to be enjoyed by the glass.

name: Ranmione Chardonnay 2013
description: This Chardonnay has a fresh, fragrant nose of tropical fruit and ripe melon. On the palate, the wine is harmonious and rich, with layers of fruit, crisp acidity and a smooth finish. It is a classic example of the high quality Chardonnay that can be produced from the Carneros region of the Veneto.

name: String Lablenl Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: This is the most concentrated and opulent of the String Lablenl Cabernets. The nose fills with aromas of dried cherries, anise, mint and a hint of toasty oak. The mouth feel is soft, yet powerful and full, with flavors of sweet berries, currants and a hint of vanilla. The tannins are soft and smooth, and carry through the finish.

name: Santas Luvas Natcitaro 1996
description: The wine has a bright, deep purple color. It has a nose of wild berries and light floral tones. In the mouth, it has a deep, concentrated, jammy fruit with a touch of spice and a hint of toast. It has a full, round, soft, generous and sweet tannin structure. It has a long, lingering finish.

name: Caclelani Reserva
description: Deep, dark color. Intense aromas of spices, dried fruits, licorice, and leather. Warm, balanced, with a long, lingering finish. A great wine for roasted meats, game and cheese. I drink this wine now and am very pleased with the results. It is a wine which is easy-to-drink and ready to drink now, and it is ready to drink now and over-achieving. It is a blend of 70% Tempranillo, 15% Garnacha, 10% Graciano, 5% Mazuela and 5% Garnacha.

name: Bamld Delrelle Samignano 2018
description: The wine has a bright straw color with aromas of white fruit, fresh herbs, minerals and minerals. On the palate the wine is fresh, dry and lively with great structure and length. The final is long and complex.

name: Capa Vin Malbocia Willagre Boimifialo Bariela Red 2015
description: Pairs well with roast chicken, game, and medium-aged cheeses. Plungerhead Dry Creek Valley Zinfandel 2015 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Other Red Blends

name: Foldalamierdsha Valley Pinot Noir 2006
description: The wine has a full-bodied structure, showing a dark core of ripe fruit with flavors of spice, black pepper, smoke, and plums. This wine is concentrated, but not heavy and has a long, silky, lingering finish.

name: Indinana Pinoto (375ML half-bottla) 1999
description: This is a medium bodied, deep ruby colored wine.  It shows an amazing range of ripe fruit, including black cherries, plums, and sweet violets.  These are all complemented by sweet oak, which adds a complexity that suits the palate.  The finish is long and harmonious.

name: Camena Carmr Pedivarre Cabernetbe Merlot 2014
description: Blend: 45% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Sauvignon, 15% Malbec, 5% Petit Verdot The aromas of red currant, cherry and cassis make for a delicious start to this smooth, full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon. A soft, supple texture and rich berry flavor are accented by notes of spice and a kiss of oak, leading to a long, smooth finish.

name: Groiis Filg/Cenzass Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: This Cabernet is a beautiful expression of the variety. The aromas of black cherry, currant, and plum are complimented by notes of sage, mint, and vanilla. This is a wine with a rich, yet balanced mouthfeel. The flavors of cherry pie, currant, and mint are framed by velvety tannins on the palate. This is a full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon with a long, lingering finish that is packed with fruit and spice. Pairs well with grilled meats, burgers, pizza, pastas, and spicy cuisine.

name: Auvbalciano Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: Deep red with purple reflections. Aromas of spice, blackberry and cassis. Lush with soft tannins and a long finish.

name: Grardoneto Merlot 2017
description: Pairs well with grilled steak, roast pork, and chicken. Wine & Spirits, Decadent dark plum, cherry, and toasty oak aromas. Generous fruit with a touch of earth, vanilla, and toasty oak. Medium bodied with nicely balanced tannins and a long finish.

name: Donainas' Liano Pistlagu Reserve Losas Valley Chardonnay 2017
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: A gold-colored wine, it shows intense aromas of ripe tropical fruits, peach, pineapple, and lemon peel, as well as a hint of spice. The palate is long and persistent, with a hint of minerality and a delicate, long finish.

name: Laco IsyeL Onesina Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: The wine is a bright ruby color. On the nose, it is very expressive and fruity. It is fresh and juicy in the mouth, well balanced with soft tannins. It has a great finish.

name: Bode Eventanetary Heeding Hill Chardonnay (half-bottle) - Martontavolter Blanc 2002
description: A brilliant light gold in the glass. The wine is dominated by aromas of lemon peel and Granny Smith apples. The palate is creamy with flavors of stone fruit and a long finish. The mouth feel is broad and full. A delicious and savoury Granny Smith apple style wine with a touch of barrel toast. The palate is long and has a soft creaminess from barrel contact, a rich texture from malolactic fermentation and a clean, bright finish.

name: Myrls Chamateau Chardonnay 2013
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2013 MYRls Chardonnay opens with aromas of golden delicious apples, tangerine and a hint of sweet oak. On the palate, the wine shows flavors of white nectarine, pear and lemon curd, with a light touch of honey. The mouthfeel is soft and velvety, leading to a long finish.

name: El Coldo 2000
description: A new wine made from old-vine Tempranillo grapes ( Tempranillo and Merlot), aged for 24 months in French and American oak. This is a delicious example of Rioja Spain's indigenous wine, made from the oldest Tempranillo vines in the region. The wine is full-bodied, with a deep ruby/purple color, and a sweet, opulent nose with plenty of blackberry and cassis fruit. This wine is ideal for drinking now, but should evolve nicely for 2-3 years.

name: Mouneuistal Trokhe Granno Winery Rougee 175 Margiona 2007
description: Garnacha (100% Garnacha) from the sandy soil of the “Piedra de la Vila” (Village) of Santo d'Ano (not to mention the fact that it is planted with some of the oldest vines in the region), the oldest plot in the region, planted in 1964.

name: Zonte Cles Winetta Monte Syrah 2011
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Deep, dark color. Vivid aromas of blackberry and cassis. A full-bodied wine with a long finish.. It's flavors of plums, blueberries and blackberries.  Full-bodied, rich and intense with hints of licorice and spice. A great match for braises, stews and game.

name: Scitap's
description: nan

name: Sino enders Semper Cabernet Sauvignon 2005
description: The 2005 Cabernet Sauvignon is a complex wine with a deep color, luscious fruit, and a long, smooth finish. Aromas of blackberry, plum and cassis mingle with spicy oak. This is a Cabernet with structure, charm, and finesse.

name: Schelliaum Syrah 2007
description: The wine is a deep ruby color.  Aromas of black cherry, raspberry, and hints of pepper.  Flavors of cherry and plum with a hint of toasty oak.  A rich, velvety, smooth mouthfeel, balanced with soft tannins, and a long, elegant finish.

name: Bogepey Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 1997
description: , but not for the less fruity, more serious side.  Not for the less fruity, more serious side of Cabernet.  Not for the less fruity, more serious side of the Cabernet fruitere red wines, this wine is a complex, balanced, concentrated wine with good structure and a soft, round, pleasant mouth feel.  The wine has a deep garnet color with aromas of black cherries, spices, and mint.  This wine has a soft, round, soft, juicy, velvety feel in the mouth with moderate tannins and a smooth, lingering finish.  It is a well-balanced, concentrated, and concentrated wine that can be enjoyed with a variety of foods.

name: Fayne Romacura Santa Branco De Charfonnan Syrah 1993
description: The nose is deep and spicy, with intense berry fruit. The palate is full and soft, with a tannic backbone. Flavors of blackberry and cassis dominate, with a touch of chocolate and pepper. The finish is long and pleasant. This wine is a perfect match for grilled meat, game and cheese.

name: Pene Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: The aromatics are enticing and complex. They are a combination of ripe blackberry, cherry, and hints of cassis, dried herbs, and vanilla. On the palate, the wine is round and smooth with flavors of black cherry, boysenberry, cassis, and hints of cocoa. The finish is supple and pleasing with a lingering fruit and vanilla-oak tannin finish.

name: Rynenane Chardonnay 2006
description: The 2006 Chardonnay is rich and vibrant with a mouthfeel that is rich and soft, with aromas of golden apple, peach, honey, vanilla, and toasty oak. This Chardonnay has bright flavors of lemon curd, pineapple, and hints of spice. With a bright mouth feel, this wine has a creamy, round finish that is nicely balanced by fresh acidity.

name: Flander Gwoak Ontera Santo Tery Estate Shuti 2013
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: The 2013 Gwoak Ontera is a blend of Petite Sirah, Syrah, Grenache, and Mourvedre.  The winery is located in the Santa Barbara County of Central Coast AVA. The sandy loam soil, cool breezes and afternoon breezes from the Pacific Ocean create a climate ideal for grape growing.

name: Domaine Dwogt-de Gelains Gewindgeix Vineyard Myroma Valley Merlot 2005
description: The color of the wine is deep red. The nose shows intense fruit characters with an underlying complexity from the use of French oak barrels. The palate is full and soft with an abundance of black and red berry fruit flavors. This wine has a dry finish with a hint of fruit sweetness balanced with the tannin structure to give the wine a soft but rich palate. This is an elegant Merlot with a lovely fruit intensity. It will gain complexity in bottle over the next 4-5 years.

name: Wilrachs Shirattiore Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon (half-bottle) 1987
description: Santadi Amarone Classico 1995 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Red WineOther Red Blends [category_2] Other Red Blends [origin]  from Veneto, Italy

name: Wepalle Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: This is a wine with a fine balance between tannin structure and depth. The aromas are inviting with notes of blackberries, cherries and cassis. The palate is rich and full of fruit with a balanced and lingering finish.

name: Luefena PieBlat 2013
description: The 2013 Loire Valley white wine is a rich and sumptuous wine. It is rich and inviting with aromas of Granny Smith apples, white peaches, and mandarin oranges. On the palate, the wine is dry and refreshing with flavors of lemon-lime and fresh cut pippin apples. This wine has a crisp and clean finish with a slightly off-dry style.

name: Casta des Papol Chevoz Blacc Boucofiel Resto 2011
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The selection of grapes from clay-limestone plots in the chalk hills of Boucofiel have produced a white wine of great finesse and finesse, with aromas of lemon, lime and acacia flowers and flavors of lime, apricot, grapefruit and peach on the palate. The finish is long and aromatic, with fresh, mineral notes.

name: Tewtinaito Roal Pepilaz 2002
description: The wine is rich and full bodied.  It has a beautiful dark purple color.  It has aromas of tobacco and leather.  On the palate it shows rich flavors of plum, black cherries and berries with an elegant finish.  This wine is a blend of 90% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Syrah and other varietals that were planted in 2001 in the Colombe area.  It is an excellent example of the traditional wine of Tuscany, the oldest of the noble grape varieties in the world, with a history of success in Tuscany since the 17th century.

name: Thobers
description: nan

name: Santa Calferate Classice Zinfandel 2017
description: Ruby red in color, this Zinfandel has aromas of blackberry, blueberry and subtle hints of spice. On the palate, it shows rich flavors of blackberry, black cherry, and spice, with a touch of toasty oak. Its soft tannins, balanced acidity, and long finish make this a wonderful wine to enjoy with your favorite pizza, barbeque, or by itself!

name: Puprawnett Bland (375ML hall-bottlo) 2011
description: The 2011 vintage is rich, but still light and refreshing, with flavors of peach and lemon curd. It's the perfect accompaniment to a spring salad with croutons, seafood, or to drink on its own.

name: Prima Emannes Pay Wine Hro Casa Hilts Shiraz 2007
description: The fruit is sourced from the first pressing of our hand-harvested, single-vineyard fruit, then-releases, from the other three estate vineyards. Pungent spice, pepper, and herbal notes are in the mix. It's all hand-made in the winery.

name: Mentz White Pinot Noir 2014
description: The 2014 Mentz White Pinot Noir is lively with a nose of strawberries, raspberries, and citrus. The mouth is bright and balanced with flavors of strawberries, raspberries, and citrus. A slight minerality adds a vibrant character to this wine. The finish is long and clean with lingering flavors of fresh strawberries and watermelon. The wine is a great match for grilled salmon, sushi, and Asian cuisine.

name: Fatk Harg Niser Break Rose 2006
description: The nose is fresh, clean and complex, with notes of wild strawberries, watermelon and a hint of mineral complexity. On the palate, the wine is fresh, well-balanced and elegant, with a mineral finish.  Chateau La Roilette Estate Cabernet Franc 2006 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Other Red Blends

name: DeTen Binerard Flares Wines Cabernet Saavignon 2000
description: This wine is rich and round with flavors of black cherry, plums, and a hint of toasty oak. This wine is well balanced with soft tannins and a long finish. It will continue to improve for the next two to four years.

name: Jaim Peapulo Dareno Napa Red 2015
description: The 2015 Jaimpeapulo Dareto Red is a blend of 60% Syrah, 20% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 10% Petit Verdot, the backbone of this wine is very old world in style. On the nose, aromas of spicy black cherry, currant, and raspberry fruit are highlighted by hints of oak and vanilla. On the palate, the tannins are soft and round, with flavors of dark cherry and raspberry jam. A spicy finish is accented by toasted oak and soft vanilla.

name: Carlogas de la tie Saceras Al Grenachi 2015
description: The color is deep purple. The nose shows ripe fruit, with blackberries and some floral notes, spices and a hint of toasted bread. In the mouth it is very fresh, with soft tannins and a certain roundness that comes from the Syrah and Garnacha grapes. A ripe fruit wine with a long finish.

name: Tordantons Pinot Noir 2015
origin: from Pays d’Oc, South of France, France
description: A perfect accompaniment to red meat dishes and white meats. Torton Charlemagne-Preston Charlemagne Grand Cru (OK Kosher) 2011 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Pinot Noir [category_2] Pinot Noir [category_2] Pinot Noir [origin]  from Pays d’Oc, South of France, France

name: Sassto Fonedassan 1998
description: Dusted inky purple, this shows an impressive range of aromas, featuring smoky mineral, black cherry, and wild blackberry. Full-bodied, with silky tannins and a lengthy finish, it is a delicious wine. The European spirit is evident in the attractive richness of fruit and the way it unfolds in the mouth. Enjoy this wine with roasted meats, wild game, and a rich, well-structured wine.-Wine Advocate

name: Santo Estate Sauvignon Blanc 2001
description: The Santo Estate Sauvignon Blanc is a crisp, dry wine with a hint of sweetness from the oak. It has a lovely light straw color and a lovely, rich nose of honey, pear and citrus. On the palate, the flavors of fig and citrus are balanced by a bright acidity. This wine is excellent when served with shellfish, seafood salads, light fare or just sipping chilled on any occasion.

name: Tor Gats Shand Leflo 2008
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 16% Grenache, 14% Mourvedre, 11% Petit Verdot, 5% Cinsaut The wine has a deep garnet color with a touch of purple. On the nose, the bouquet reveals aromas of black cherries and plums, as well as some sweet spice and a hint of earthy truffle. Full-bodied, with excellent structure, the tannins are round and soft, with a long finish. This is a wine that can be enjoyed with a meal, but would be wonderful with spicy foods.

name: Frannon Mondontar 2016
description: Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petit Verdot, 3% Merlot, 2% Malbec  ,erskopff & syrup production. The resulting wine is garnet in color. A complex bouquet with a spicy nose. Lush, fruity, complex, smooth and savoury on the palate. Full-bodied, concentrated and well-structured with a lengthy finish. The wine is a blend of 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 2% Cabernet Franc and 2% Petit Verdot.

name: Seman Cabernet Sauvignon 2018
description: Blend: 77% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 5% Petit Verdot, 4% Malbec Purple hue. Intense dark fruit aromas. Rich and full bodied, with layers of sweet dark berry and cassis fruit flavors. Hints of dark chocolate and spice. A well balanced, full bodied wine with soft tannins and a long, fruity finish.

name: Kon Windch Hery Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignonnio 2ran-Sauvignon Blano 2013
description: Blend: 91% Cabernet Sauvignon, 9% Merlot, 2% Petit Verdot, 2% Cabernet Franc

name: Galbol Saluntingignon Rose 2018
description: A rosé with an elegant structure and good balance between fruit and acidity. Pairs well with seafood, grilled vegetables, poultry, and Mediterranean cuisine. J. Davies Vineyards Russian River Valley Pinot Noir 2016 [response] [category_1] Pink and Rosé

name: Vidagetta Nate Vhits Blet 2005
description: Deep ruby color. On the nose, it shows hints of spice, raisins, cassis and a hint of mint. It is full-bodied with great structure, well balanced with soft tannins.

name: Kubfo Cellars Chardonnay 1998
description: Kubfo Chardonnay is a medium bodied, rich wine.  Its lush tropical fruit flavors and subtle spiciness make it a wonderful accompaniment to a wide range of foods including grilled salmon, roasted chicken, pasta in cream sauces and grilled portabella mushrooms.

name: Gaystef'sose Bellete Blanc 1994
description: The full bodied style of the varietal is softened by the roundness and silkiness of the Riesling, while the slightly exotic and floral qualities of the Riesling add a exotic character. Enjoy this wine with fresh seafood, light pasta dishes, Asian-inspired cuisine, as well as anything prepared with a little charm.

name: Saveritut Kentramino 2009
description: The Kentramino grapes are harvested at optimal ripeness and are given a two week maceration on the skins followed by one week of aging in stainless steel tanks. After blending, the wine is bottled in January. The wine is crisp, dry and nicely balanced with a floral nose of wisteria and a full, ripe, tropical palate.

name: Rikoras Cannata Rabdson Valley Chardonnay 2015
origin: from Mt. Veeder, Napa Valley, California
description: Pale yellow color. Intense minerality with notes of tropical fruit, pineapple, and peach. Creamy on the palate with a long finish., the winery is always happy to have the best barrels to blend for the final blend.  This wine has aromas of apricots and a hint of spice.  The finish is long and fresh.  A great pairing with grilled prawns, roasted chicken, seafood, or just about anything!

name: Spankingamd Chardonnay Vineyard Pinot Noir 2011
description: The 2011 Spätikaké Vineyard Chardonnay has a vibrant garnet color. The aromas are all about pear and apple pie, with a hint of oak. On the palate, the flavors are all about pear and apple pie. The oak is nicely integrated with the fruit, adding a creamy texture to the wine. The finish is long and elegant with a hint of spice.

name: Antingh-Patringheblekt Smirezte 2002
description: This wine has a pale straw color. On the nose, it is reminiscent of the great wines of Burgundy, but with an elegant and restrained nose. The palate is full, warm and juicy, and is supported by a fine structure. A full, creamy finish is the result of the ageing on the lees, the wine's fine acidity, the residual sugar and the ageing on the lees.

name: Frendint-Jiney Muirsain Rose d'Astestin Pinot Gris 1997
description: , but never the less, juicy, soft, creamy mulberry and red cherry fruit. Spicy, mineral and earthy on the palate, with a long, smooth finish. A wonderful match for richly flavored dishes. Best after 2003.

name: Jean Rockal's Preres Pinot Noir 2012
description: This is a wine with an elegant structure, good texture, and a rich mouthfeel. In the glass, it shows its deep color, cherry and raspberry fruit with subtle spice and earthy notes. In the mouth, the wine has a rich, velvety texture. The flavors of ripe blackberries and spice are balanced by firm tannins, fresh acidity and a long, lush finish.

name: Stobasse Druveye Pinot Noir 2012
description: The 2012 vintage shows an opulent nose of blackberry, black cherry, and black licorice. A soft, velvety mouthfeel shows flavors of ripe blackberry, blueberry, and dark cherry, with a hint of earthiness. The tannins are soft and round with a pleasant, lingering finish. The 2012 vintage shows great structure, balance, and a lengthy finish.

name: Bonenake Moltain Tongia Chardonnay 2013
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: This wine is the perfect example of a great chardonnay from a great vineyard. The aromas of honeydew, apple, and pear are balanced with the toasty character of French oak barrels. The wine is very fruit forward and loaded with tropical flavors. The fruit flavors are backed by a hint of vanilla and the toasty character of butterscotch. The finish is long and full with a perfect balance between acidity and fruit.

name: Bodega Lavere Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: Lavere represents the history and tradition of viticulture in Mendoza. The grapes are grown in the foothills of the Andes Mountains, at an elevation of 3,000 feet above sea level. The resulting wine is a Cabernet Sauvignon that is rich and structured with deep color, bold aromas and flavors of red fruits, spices and herbs. A full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon with smooth tannins and a long finish.

name: Ampaina Dos Wines Fill Vineyard Pinot Noir 2006
description: The 2006 Pinot Noir fills the cellar with aromas of black cherry, dried herbs and spice. On the palate, the flavors of black cherry, dried herbs, spice and a hint of earth are balanced with a rich, round texture and a smooth finish. Pair this elegant wine with lamb, grilled salmon, or beef tenderloin.

name: Montalint Selects Reserve Syrah 2013
origin: from Montalint, Languedoc, South of France, France
description: The fruit is hand-harvested, lightly pressed, and the juice cooled in stainless steel tanks. The wine is then matured in a combination of French and American oak barrels for 18 months. A wine of richness, structure, and balance, with lovely spice, berry and vanilla flavors on the nose and on the palate.

name: Auvinates Cillars Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: The color of the 1999 Cabernet is deep purple with purple edges. The wine has a nose of cherries, spice, and toast. In the mouth, the wine is full and rich with layers of cherries, spice, and toast. The tannins are soft and the wine has a long finish. This is a smooth, easy-drinking wine.

name: Eduis 201 Chardonnay 2017
description: The Eduis Chardonnay is a rich, full-bodied, well-balanced wine, displaying aromas of fresh apples, lemon peel, and tropical fruit. It is fresh and clean on the palate, with flavors of tropical fruit, citrus, and pineapple that are complemented by delicate notes of toasty oak.

name: Micerland Ole Staguin Sauvignon Blanc (OU -Klar)-Frotk 2016
description: ,asty and ripe, with the structure and backbone to cellar well. The flavors of nectarine, pear and pineapple are enveloped in mineral, spicy oak, lemon peel, and just a touch of minerality. The wine has a rich mouthfeel and great mouthfeel, with a long, refreshing finish. Its bright acidity and fine texture will pair nicely with seafood and poultry.

name: Domaaneptomorele Cotcioula La Brice 2016
description: Pairs well with game dishes, roasted meats, and mature cheeses. A well-balanced, easy-to-drink wine, packed with blackberry, black cherry, and spice. Pair with pork chops, grilled meats, or chicken.

name: Chateau Josep Granhe 2010
description: A wonderful example of the classic Medoc, this wine is full of fruit, good tannin structure, and excellent balance. It has a deep garnet color, and is full of red berry fruit with a touch of toasted oak. On the palate, the wine shows its potential with a deep, elegant structure and great ageing potential. The fruit aromas are balanced with spice and pepper, and on the palate, the wine is complex with soft tannins, beautiful structure, and a long finish.

name: Grick Wines Ales Vinoy Chardonnay 2006
description: Ales is a blend of fruit from the lower elevations (%) to the higher elevations (higher) sites (Higher on the slopes) of the vineyard. The result is a wine with more complexity, structure, and minerality than is typical in the lower elevations. The aromas of white peach, mango, and pineapple are enhanced by the wine's rich mouthfeel and lovely minerality. The rich mouthfeel is nicely balanced with a hint of toasty French oak, which carries through on the long finish.

name: Estrela Annes Somman Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: A rich, complex, spicy and fruity wine with a distinctive style and finish. The wine is aged for 18 months in French oak barrels, 60 percent new, to give a smooth, rich texture. It is packed with currant, black cherry, and plum flavors with a hint of toast and spice. It is smooth and balanced with a long, smooth finish.

name: Mochers Winery Estate Voulling Barro' Reserve Galaista Beaule 2008
description: The 2008 Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon is rich, dark, and lush. It is full of aromas and flavors of ripe blackberry, plum, chocolate, and hints of coffee, black pepper, and a hint of dried herbs. The palate is soft and velvety with a deep lingering finish.

name: Telboan Sainna Rose Soave Bellei 2015
description: The color is a light, almost transparent, salmon-pink. The nose is intense, fruity, intense and fragrant with notes of citrus fruit, berries and white flowers. On the palate the acidity is balanced, the fruit expression is balanced, the freshness and the structure complete.

name: Domaine am Golfofoy-Cha Morsain Rosota Bonstpieto Frebten Rossa 1998
description: , but it's also a wonderful everyday wine to drink with pizza or mac & cheese, light pasta dishes, fish & seafood, especially sushi.

name: Dolenany Veldiny Edolain Zinfandel 2007
description: The Dolenany Veldony Vineyard Zinfandel is a full-bodied, deeply colored red wine with aromas of ripe red and black cherries, and black pepper. Flavors of raspberry, currant and blueberry pie are complemented by notes of sweet oak and a hint of pepper. This wine is well-balanced with a long, smooth finish.

name: Antolay Grate Rand Cellar Pinot Noir 2014
description: The 2014 vintage is a rich, deep, and opulent Pinot Noir that delivers a luscious mouthfeel and an elegant, supple finish. The nose shows ripe black cherry, dark fruit, spice, and toast. The palate is juicy and fruity, with black cherry, spice, and dark chocolate flavors. The texture is soft and supple. The finish is long and rich. This is a delicious, crowd pleasing wine.

name: Tindszotori 7 Cafnewne Suvendiong Granija Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: Ideal as an aperitif or paired with starters, soups, seafood, fish, risotto, pasta and rice dishes, Pecorino cheese.

name: Stalaquery Resera Gary (375ML Mall-botter Per) Gres d'Agre 2014
description: Excellent with grilled steak, roasted lamb, roasted duck, mature cheeses. Bright garnet in color, with an intense perfume of blackberry jam, dried cherries, and spices. On the palate, the wine is lush and velvety, with good structure and balance. Flavors of raspberries, plums, and chocolate are interwoven with vanilla and spice, and lead into a long finish with a hint of pepper.

name: Prauh Roten de Riegals Gigacollo Liale 2011
description: This wine is made from younger vines, mostly Grenache (70-100 years-old) with a small amount of Syrah (30-30 years-old).

name: Bark Brum Wuner Verline Sauvignon Blanc 2015
description: The 2015 Sauvignon Blanc has aromas of grapefruit, lychee and lime. This crisp wine has a beautiful minerality with flavors of fresh green apples and gooseberries. Pair this wine with your favorite summertime dishes.

name: Lintonge Thease Rud 2018
description: A deep ruby color. Intense fruit on the nose, with aromas of black cherry, blackberry, and plum. The palate is rich, with dark berry fruit, spice and hints of pepper. Well-balanced and round on the finish.

name: Eldhy Winery Brut 2013
description: Blend: 52% Chardonnay, 20% Pinot Noir, 15% Pinot Meunier The deep gold color of this wine heralds the complex aroma of toasty brioche. Flavors of ripe apple, pear, and pineapple are accented with a hint of toasty oak. This wine has a full, creamy texture, with a long, lingering finish. Enjoy now or cellar for 2 to 3 years. Serve with chicken and seafood pasta, mild cheeses, sushi and Asian-inspired cuisine.

name: Roser Gimb Collal Chardonnayar Wines Cabernet Sauvignon 2017
description: This Chardonnay is a blend of three of the oldest estate-owned vineyards in the world, located at the foot of the Montserrat mountain range, near the village of Ciampart de la Plana in the region of Valladolid de la Orden.

name: Carrablis Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: This is a perfect example of the Central Coast appellation.  A deep garnet color.  The nose is filled with black cherry, cedar, and a hint of pepper.  The palate is filled with the same black fruit flavors and a touch of vanilla.  This wine has the characteristic bright fruit that is the hallmark of all our wines.  It has a rich and soft tannin backbone that will allow it to age well for many years to come.

name: Erritoretonthe Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: Crisp and fruity, with plenty of freshness and a crisp finish. This Sauvignon Blanc shows the typical tropical fruit flavors, along with a good range of citrus and a mineral edge. A great companion for seafood, poultry and pasta.

name: Fles Maldson Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: The nose has a rich, concentrated fruit core of blackcurrant and black cherry fruit with a hint of mint. The tannins are well-integrated and the wine has a good balance between power and elegance. A dry, savoury finish complements the fruit and the wine's excellent structure.

name: Berand Siltssauf Cabernet
description: This is the first time in the Penedès Denomination that the Cabernet Sauvignon from the Istanca is fully varietal. The result is a rich, full bodied, balanced wine with a long finish. The Siltssauf vineyard is located in the northwest part of the region of Aragon. The wine is made from younger vines (20–30 years old) that have been selected from several sites to produce a wine of great freshness and finesse.

name: Sauvignon 2006
description: Sauvignon Blanc grapes were sourced from several vineyards throughout Marlborough to create a wine of complexity and freshness. The grapes were sourced from the cooler Marlborough region, where the style of this wine is full and vibrant. The cool Marlborough climate and richly-fruited soil combine to give this wine intense passionfruit and gooseberry fruit characters, which are enhanced by subtle oak barrel flavours. Aromas of ripe tropical fruits and fresh cut grass are supported by subtle mineral notes. The palate is supple and fresh with vibrant acidity and a refined texture.

name: Ranta Pinotto Blandco Reserve Petite 2014
description: Ruby red color. Aromas of berries, cherry, spice, herbs and wood. Berry fruit, spice, herbs, wood and earth in the mouth. Full-bodied, tannic and balanced with a long finish.

name: Epalett Coteaunau Rubanzo Dose 2005
description: The wine is made from old-vine Tempranillo vines (70+ years) and was aged in French oak barrels. A rich and spicy wine with layers of black and red berry fruit, black pepper, and spice.

name: Bervente Parnett Wonda Aldatia Chardonnay 1993
description: This Chardonnay was 100% barrel fermented in French oak (25% new). The wine has an abundance of tropical fruit and peaches with a soft, creamy texture. The oak adds a toasty character that nicely complements the fruit. This wine has a lovely, rich, golden color. The wine has a sweet, toasty oak flavor that nicely complements the fruit and lends depth to the wine. The finish is long and smooth. This is a well balanced Chardonnay that can be enjoyed by itself as an aperitif or with any meal.

name: Brisse Risenn 6 Cabernet Sauvignon (375ML half-bottlle) 2012
description: Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Merlot, 4% Cabernet Franc, 2% Petit Verdot, 1% Malbec

name: Wateak Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The Wateak Sauvignon Blanc is made in a riper, more full bodied style, with bright citrus, tropical fruit, and fresh cut grass flavors. The wine is very aromatic, showing ripe melon, passion fruit and a hint of lemongrass. The wine is very concentrated and has a silky texture with a long finish. The Wateak style of Sauvignon Blanc is a refreshing, pure and straightforward style of Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Twodtostoer Griaes Tin-Giora 2004
description: The wine has a deep cherry colour with purple lights. It is a nose of ripe fruit, with a hint of oak. The tannins are firm and fruity, with a pleasant, smooth structure. This wine pairs well with cold cuts, white meats, pasta and rice dishes, pizza and barbecue.

name: River Gataszi Malbaccera 2014
description: Deep, bright violet color. An elegant and intense nose, with floral notes of rockrose, balsamic aromas of cedar and resin and hints of wild berry fruits. On the palate, it is well-balanced, with soft tannins and a smooth, long finish.

name: Pajo Ar de Piscobonda Bruck 2008
description: The vines of the Garnacha variety, known as Garnacha in Spain, grow on calcareous clay soils.  Garnacha and the Cariñena variety, along with the Tempranillo variety, contribute structure and tannic components to the wine.

name: Clos Jot St Konts Peteruot La RNossa Premier Grender Reservo Celars Duit Red 2017
description: A wine with a deep purple robe and a nose of raspberry, violets, and a touch of pepper. On the palate, the wine is rich and smooth with soft tannins and a balanced acidity. It is an excellent companion for grilled steak, veal chops, and duck.

name: Whalldy Red Pinot Noill Pinot Noir 2014
description: The wine is deep red in color, with lifted varietal aromas of black cherry, raspberry and strawberry, complemented by subtle oak and vanillan oak. The palate is medium bodied with bright cherry fruit flavors, a soft tannin structure and well balanced with a long finish.

name: Marquee d'Alicasen Gavancieres Branchello Castatusni Chardonnayir 2011
description: The Chardonnay grapes for this wine are sourced from the ‘St. Joseph’ vineyard in the heart of the appellation. This vineyard is planted to the Nebbiolo clone, which is the most widely planted Chardonnay clone in the world, and by far the most versatile wine to age. Because of its characteristics, it can be used with almost every cuisine. Enjoy it with rich dishes such as lobster mac and cheese, rich fish dishes, risotto and even roasted chicken.

name: Fostios Dwourt Pinot Noir 2007
description: Deep ruby red color. Intense nose, showing great finesse and complexity. It has a very elegant and harmonious palate, with good structure and balance. The finish is long and elegant. Horton Vidal is a great wine for roasted game, and traditional Spanish meat dishes. It is the perfect wine for the dinner table. It is a wine for the dinner table!

name: Ferghachsl Reserve Zinfandel 1998
description: The red wines of Ferghach Sl are characterized by their strong color, solid fruit flavors, and firm tannins.  Our winemaker, Tom Mackey says that the Ferghach Slins Pinot noir do terroir well, but with a little less concentration, less barrel toast, and more concentrated fruit flavors.

name: St. Estate Chardonnay 1997
description: Our Estate Chardonnay has a bright, golden color. The nose is filled with scents of sweet apple, pear and butterscotch. The mouthfeel is rich and the bouquet lingers forever. Flavors of tropical fruit, citrus, apple and pear fill the palate. This Chardonnay has a wonderful, long finish that makes it the perfect accompaniment to a wide range of dishes.

name: Parl Cellors Sauvignon Glanc 2015
description: The 2015 Parl Sauvignon Blanc has a light straw color with a brilliant edge. In the glass, aromas of white peach, apricot, and citrus with a hint of minerality. On the palate, this wine shows flavors of citrus, apple, and mango with a hint of minerality. This wine has a beautiful balance between fruit, acidity and crisp, bright flavors. The finish is clean and lingering.

name: Aures Pismates Pinot Noir 2012
origin: from Santa Lucia Highlands, Monterey, Central Coast, California
description: The 2012 Pismates Pinot Noir is a deep garnet color.  It has aromas of rose petals, dried cherries and herbs.  The palate is lively and balanced with a ripe core of red cherry, plum and pomegranate.   This wine is bold, complex and elegant, displaying spice and earthy notes, while maintaining the focus and freshness of the wine.  This is a classic Santa Lucia Highlands Pinot Noir, and it shows just how well this region can be.

name: Fort Vineyarder Cabernet Sauvignon 2009
description: This Estate Cabernet Sauvignon is a blend of select lots from the Sonoma County side of the AVA. This wine has aromas of dark cherry, blackberry and cedar. Rich and full-bodied on the palate with layers of ripe, jammy fruit and subtle notes of vanilla, this wine has a long, smooth finish.

name: Mra Tita Perigialo Reserva Valley Pinot Gris Chamzin 1999
description: and winemaking are the key elements in production of this wine. The key elements are balance, finesse, and style. The key elements are patience, with the grapes from which the wine takes its name, and the care given to the wine by the winemaker in the vineyard to use the best available techniques and techniques to bring out the best in the fruit.

name: Vinian Jackelo Duch Bruter Reserva Syrah 2013
description: The 2013 Bruter Vidal is intense and deep ruby red with violet hues. The nose is intense, complex, and spicy with notes of blackberries, licorice, and spices. On the palate, it is dry, full-bodied, and velvety with ripe tannins. It has an extremely long finish with notes of blackberries, plums, and vanilla. Pair with red meats, game, and seasoned cheeses.

name: Steal Gtonerson 1999
description: Pale lemon with green hues.  A lively bouquet of lychees, fresh nougat and honey.  A soft and dry palate with a distinctively varietal character.  A wine to enjoy while it is young and has the fruit to give it structure.

name: Ballbert Napa laval Vilnelle Ladoga Rose 2013
description: Blend: 82% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Malbec, 4% Petit Verdot, 2% Cabernet Franc, bold flavors and great texture define this wine. The 2013 vintage has produced a wine with aromas of fresh, ripe, and juicy pears, rose petals, and wildflowers. The palate is rich, bold and lush with flavors of wild strawberries, plums, and hints of fresh-cut herbs and spice. The wine's refined and pure character is balanced by a bright acidity, which leads to a long finish and a wonderful balance between minerality and fruit.

name: Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: This Cabernet is made from grapes grown in the cooler Napa Valley, where the vineyards experience a longer growing season.  The result is a wine with more intense fruit, a richly balanced structure, and a full rich finish.

name: Kida Hermog Reserve Syrah 2013
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: A full-bodied, flavorful Syrah from the Russian River Valley. Deeply-colored with purple edges, this wine shows a dark nose of cedar, spice and chocolate-covered berries with undertones of vanilla and dark chocolate. Lush and rich on the palate with a full, smooth, velvety mouth feel, this Syrah exhibits flavors of blackberries, blueberries and black cherries. The tannins are firm, yet balanced and the finish is long and lingering.

name: Crond Hare Pinot Grigio Caspure Radsalo 2015
