description: The color of the wine is light straw. The nose is filled with apricot, pineapple, pear, pineapple, and pineapple. The palate is crisp and light with tropical fruit, apricot and pineapple. The finish is fresh and crisp.

name: Mae Peant Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The Sauvignon Blanc grapes from the cooler sites in the region are picked early in order to maintain a bright acidity and freshness. The grapes from the warmer parts of the region, on the frisky, are picked early in the season, to gain a complexity and crispness to the wine.

name: Swenbanzs Hirz Scroihtore Pinot Noir 2014
description: Pairs well with wild boar ravioli with a side of horseradish sauce, pan seared venison with a side of horseradish sauce, or a classic duck confit salad with fresh cranberries, dried cherries, and raspberries.

name: El Vina Merlan 2011
description: Pair with grilled meats, poultry, pastas and pizzas. It also goes well with spicy Asian dishes.  and mildewine recipes, and mild cheeses.  a year on the north-eastern side of Chateauneuf-du-Pape is a good sign that the wines from here are quite good. The wines show a deep purple color, with a delicious nose full of sweet spices, plums and spices. The palate is round and soft, with sweet tannins and good balance.

name: N'd Roon Meriog Pinot Noir 2015
description: Niced with a seductive perfume of dark berries, spices and sun warmed oak. Rich, concentrated dark berry flavors are balanced with velvety tannins and subtle French oak notes.. The wine is full of dark berry, spice and a hint of smoke, with a hint of chocolate and coffee. The tannins are round and smooth, with a long, fruity finish. It has great potential to age.

name: Inoloma Papla Hantinz Vineyarc 2007
description: Deep garnet red with a touch of brick red. The wine shows aromas of red fruits, strawberries, and cherries, with balsamic and spicy notes. On the palate the wine is soft, smooth, with ripe tannins and a refreshing acidity. A long finish with fruity and spicy flavors.

name: Hewon Estate Soughin Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The 2010 Soughin Cabernet Sauvignon has a dark garnet color. The aromas are a combination of dark cherry, dried herbs, and licorice. The wine has a full mouth feel with flavors of black cherries, plums, and a hint of spice. This wine is a perfect balance between the lush fruit, soft tannins, and the beautiful structure that comes from aging in French and American oak barrels.

name: Loue La of Honshagge eaks Rker Estate Russian Riva 2003
description: The 2003 Laofla Estate Riserva is a blend of 60% Garnacha and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon aged for 18 months in French and American oak. Opaque purple-colored, it offers up a perfume of cedar, smoke, scorched earth, black cherry, and blackberry. On the palate it is opulent, velvety, and full-bodied with sweet fruit, great structure, and superb purity. This wine has the pure expression of the terroir of the region in the Russian River Valley, full ripeness, and sweet tannin. A terrific value, it should continue to improve for 3-5 years and drink well through 2026.-Wine Advocate

name: Fawassa d'Or Pinot Noir 2011
description: Deep ruby-red color. Aromas of wild berry and spice complement undertones of earth and forest floor. The palate is structured and balanced, with a silky texture and fine tannins. This wine is excellent paired with roasted meats, poultry and game.

name: Zinelotto di Mollossi 2016
description: Deep ruby red color. The nose shows berry fruit, floral aromas and hints of spice. The palate is full and ripe, with a well-balanced structure.

name: Taja Ritgsa Sauvignon Blanc 2009
description: The 2009 Taja Ritgsa Sauvignon Blanc has a pale straw color with an intense nose of citrus, tropical fruit and lychee. The wine is dry and crisp with a hint of minerality. The taste is dry and well-balanced with a lingering finish. Made with 100% Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Fatrer Wallemy Cabernet Sauvignon 2007
description: This wine is a full-bodied, deeply-colored Cabernet Sauvignon, yet it is also unusually elegant, and delicate. A beautiful dark garnet color, this wine has aromas of cassis, blackberry, and dark cherry. The palate is layered with ripe, black cherry, and black pepper flavors. Rich and smooth on the palate, the wine has a lovely, smooth texture. This Cabernet is the perfect partner for roasted meats, or grilled vegetables. It is also a wonderful accompaniment to chocolate desserts.

name: Labe di Borsorci Maccati Anve Sacta Syrah 2013
description: Pairs well with red meat, game and medium-aged cheese. It is a wine for the entire meal, from hearty pasta dishes to meaty stew, and ripe cheeses to pâté and quails.

name: Tarusti Chianto Classano di Montalcino 1998
origin: from Chianti Classico, Chianti, Tuscany, Italy
description: This Chianti Classico Riserva is a blend of selected vintages from our estate vineyards.  Grapes from the estate vineyards in Montalcino are used with whole-cluster pressing, followed by vinification in bianco, or off the skins at low temperatures in stainless steel tanks.  After fermentation, the wine is transferred to one to two year old French oak barrels for aging.  This wine is smooth, harmonious and full-bodied, with a complex bouquet of spice, vanilla, berries and a hint of toasty oak.  This wine shows great potential, if cellared correctly, being alive and developing for 20-25 years.

name: Chateau (375ML halfe-Moulfa) Col Grea (120ML)
description: Blend: 75% Merlot, 25% Cabernet Franc The wine has a dark garnet color. On the nose, it offers aromas of red fruit, plums, and a touch of vanilla. On the palate, the wine is round and harmonious, with soft tannins and a long finish. It will go well with red meat, game and cheese.

name: Hhener Temro 2017
description: Blend: 52% Pinot Grigio, 30% Riesling, 8% Gewurztraminer, 2% Muscat A truly unique, refreshing white wine blend from the Alsatian district of the Russian River Valley. Grapes were sourced from select vineyards in the Russian River Valley. The wine shows intense floral, fruit and spice aromas, with juicy tropical fruit flavors. The wine has a silky texture, with a full, fruity flavor and a crisp, clean finish.

name: Chateau Pe V Semilot 2018
description: Chateau Pey La Tour has a beautiful dark garnet-red color. The nose is powerful and complex, with aromas of red and black berries and violets. On the palate, the attack is round and supple, with silky tannins. The wine is full-bodied, with a nice balance between fruit and the tannins. It has a long finish with a beautiful aromatic complexity. The palate is long and persistent with a great aromatic persistence.

name: Hofangen Estate Zinfandel 2007
description: The nose is full of berry fruit, some black pepper, and chocolate. The palate is well-balanced with a good tannin structure, soft acidity and a smooth finish.  This is a very approachable wine, but will still develop with 3-5 years cellaring.

name: Vanm Hyrhan Hill Ex Wite Cabernot Sauvignon (375ML half-bottle) 2016
description: The 2016 Hyran Hill ex- Vent is a beautiful wine. Deep red-black in color, this wine is expressive with its layers of dried cherries, sandalwood, violets, and sandalwood. On the palate, the wine is long and rich, with a solid core of well-structured tannins. This wine has a long, persistent finish.

name: Crat Bectoustemlor Grand Cruek Rioja Coant Chardonnay 2016
description: Crat has a lovely white gold color. The nose is very floral and fruity with aromas of white peach and pineapple. In the mouth, the wine is fresh and balanced with a pleasant finish.

name: Schata Winarery Wonell Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: This vintage of Cabernet Sauvignon is rich and complex, with aromas of black cherry, red plum, cassis, black pepper, and a hint of spice. The palate is bold, with layers of ripe cherry and chocolate, and a touch of toasty oak and cedar. The wine has a well-balanced acidity, fine tannins, and a long, lingering finish.

name: Kalma Brut Rigel Vineyard Pinot Noir 2017
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: This is the most beautiful and the most beautiful of Kalma Pinot Noirs, and it is no surprise to find this blend of all estate-grown fruit. The 2016 vintage is a powerhouse vintage showing the Kalma signature style – a full, rich, and heady, but elegant Pinot Noir from the heart of the Russian River Valley.

name: Tounte Barfen Cointaitinier Pinot Gris 2000
description: The grapes were hand-harvested during the first week of March, destemmed, and fermented in stainless steel tanks. The wine is a brilliant light-green in color with an intense, fruity nose. The palate exhibits delightful crispness and a well-balanced structure. After a light aeration, the wine is transferred to oak barrels for fermentation. After the wine has been transferred to French oak barrels for maturation, the lees were stirred weekly until malolactic fermentation was complete. After 16 months of aging, the wine is fined with a Classifying agent, which softens the wine and imparts a harmonious bouquet. The wine is bottled with no filtration or fining acidity. It is delightfully refreshing and aromatic, with youthful fruit in the aftertaste.

name: Tiraster Walley Vineyards Vineyard Zinfandel 2012
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2012 vintage is an elegant and vibrant blend of our best lots from our vineyard to make the final blend. Aromas of blackberries, spice and cigar box. Flavors of red cherry, black pepper and coffee. A lush and velvety wine with a rich, dense finish.

name: Gilesis Carnerino Patos de Carnobme Chardonnay 2007
description: 100% Chardonnay Pale golden in color. Intense, intense, complex, fresh fruit with an underlying richness from the barrel ageing. It is well balanced, full bodied, intense, with a long finish.

name: Estanita Cilar Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: A rich, bold and balanced wine. The nose is inviting with notes of cassis, black cherry, cedar and vanilla. The lush palate begins with black cherry, plum and cassis. This is a full-bodied wine with rich flavors of black fruit and smooth tannins. The finish is long and lingering with hints of toasty French oak.

name: Kongh Hirplon Vineyard Pinot Noir 2001
description: The nose is filled with a mix of berries and violets, as well as a delicate scent of toasty oak. Flavors of raspberry and cherry are accented by a hint of spice. This Pinot Noir has a silky, refined mouthfeel, with a nice structure and a long, smooth finish.

name: Mickoliel Ving Noirtt Pinot Noir 2008
description: The 2008 growing season offered a near perfect growing season with mild temperatures and mild weather at harvest, leading to great balance between acid and fruit. The aromas of the wine are classic black cherry, fresh raspberry, black pepper and a hint of cedar. On the palate, there are bright berry notes and a touch of spice. This is a bright wine with great depth and structure that is very enjoyable now and for years to come.

name: Foralilgungaco Brana Chardonnay 2012
description: Bright pale gold. Intense and lifted nose showing aromas of peach, white flowers, lemon peel, and a hint of spice. These characters are echoed on the palate, along with peach and subtle tropical fruit flavours. This is a wine with a soft, creamy texture and great persistence.

name: Cott d'Ay Bucela de la Alberran Barolo 2011
description: Deep garnet red in color, this wine offers aromas of spice, red berry fruit, cedar, truffle, tobacco, and licorice. It has a full-bodied attack on the palate, with balanced tannins, good acidity, and a long finish.

name: Caclo Santabine Blanc 2010
description: A wine with a pleasant nose, a full body, and a lingering finish. The acidity makes it a great accompaniment to seafood, salads, pasta and rice dishes. It is best enjoyed with friends at around 46° F.

name: Freed Valley Clartelo Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2016 Clartelo Vineyard Chardonnay from the Russian River Valley has a bright, pale golden color. Aromas of ripe apple, lemon curd, toasted brioche, and pie crust. The wine fills the palate with flavors of apple pie, toasted nuts, and a hint of toasted almond. The finish is long, and is balanced with a touch of toasty oak.

name: Piuta Mallo Selecchally Shiray Reserve Pisona
description: A rich, velvety, and elegant wine with a deep purple core. Aromas of wild berries, spices and truffle, with underlying notes of mint. Warm, ripe and sweet on the palate, with balanced tannins and a long, smooth finish.

name: Van Bruthesse Lamia Soroamica Pelmacza Barberade Altof Blancholecli 2007
description: The color is a bright light ruby. The nose is delicate and intense with delicate scents of fresh fruit, such as sour cherries, plums, and blackberries. On the palate, the attack is fresh, soft and savory. The wine is well-balanced and round with good acidity and a lengthy finish.

name: Viny Fantono di-Riaca 2013
description: The color is ruby red tending towards garnet. The nose is intense and fruity with clean scents of wild berries and hints of violets. The taste is dry, warm, soft, fresh and harmonious with a great structure.

name: Domaine Greves Bourgognet Lo Perres-Vontelles Sisera (OK Foner) 1999
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Pouilly Fume and Chablis Vouvray. The wines are very perfumed, almost floral and delicate with an attractive spiciness and an earthy, mineral edge. There is a wonderful concentration and power on the palate and a long finish. This is a wine that shows the potential of the terroir of Sancerre and is always a good match for rich dishes.

name: Antellorberos Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: This Cabernet is a rich, full-bodied wine with a deep, intense color and berry-like fruitiness.  The complex palate is long, rich, and balanced with a lush, velvety texture.  It is a wine of great charm, structure, and complexity.

name: Racabicla Frory Famen Barbera 2012
description: The Barbera has a bright ruby color. It has an intense, balsamic and spicy nose with notes of blackberry, blueberry and raspberry. On the palate the Barbera has a rich structure and good tannic strength, with a long, pleasant finish.

name: Saurics Schmatk The Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
origin: from Margaret River, Western Australia, Australia
description: The bouquet of this single vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon is filled with spicy blackberry and red cherry fruits, with hints of chocolate and anise. The palate is generous with dark berry fruits and a hint of spicy oak. The tannins are firm and the wine has a lively and linear structure. This is a full bodied wine with excellent structure, great harmony and a long finish. It is a classic blend of the five Bordeaux varietals from the region of Margaret River, Western Australia.

name: Stansson Cabernet Sauvignon 2010
description: The nose on the 2010 Cabernet is filled with sweet oak spice and black cherry fruit, with a hint of earthiness. On the palate the wine is rich and velvety with bold flavors of black cherry and cassis, balanced by the essence of graphite. The sweet oak spice and cedar aromas carry through to the palate and are complemented by a touch of coffee and vanilla. The tannins are soft and soft, yet firm and provide for a long elegant finish.

name: Ccoranco Chardonnay 2002
description: The color is pale gold with green hues.  The nose is packed out with tropical fruit and grapefruit aromas with the notes of citrus and anise.  It is a crisp, dry, medium bodied Chardonnay with the perfect balance between fruit and oak.

name: Acch Herrieile Meesnare-Pinot Noir 2015
description: An elegant, dry, medium bodied red wine with a deep, ruby red color. It has complex aromas of red fruits and spices, with a hint of herbs. It has soft tannins and a smooth finish.

name: Franchill Gemart Montea Femrestal Vianoret 2006
description: Ruby red color with purple reflections. On the nose, the bouquet is of sweet spices, licorice and blackberries, as well as mint and herbs. The tannic component of the wine is soft and elegant. The wine is well balanced, with a long finish.

name: Deuf-Rilavic Aillecos Malbec 2003
description: A full-bodied, fruit-filled wine with a deep purple hue. Its nose is a rich blend of black cherries, black plums, spice and smoky oak. In the mouth, the wine is soft and jammy, with a rich, round finish. This is a well-balanced, highly extracted wine, which will improve with age. A great match for all red meat dishes. Also excellent with soft cheeses.

name: Banot Sondario Soce Barolo 2012
description: Intense garnet red color. Ample, complex, with notes of spice, licorice, truffles, rosemary, thyme, rosemary, rosemary, cherries, and rosemary. This wine has great structure, great body, and great tannic strength. It has a lengthy, complex finish.

name: Olfma Iphbers Blaviccion Mouxle Pinot Noir 2014
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: Blend: 100% Pinot Noir The 2015 vintage has produced a lighter, fresher wine that is fresh and pure, with loads of berry fruit. Intense flavors of red fruits are accented by spice, cedar and a touch of smoky oak. The wine is long and expansive, with a beautiful balance between fruit and structure. It's all about the terroir.

name: Ram Estate Semiliino Reserva Tarvino 2016
description: Deep garnet in color, this wine has intense blackberry, black cherry and plum fruit, which are complemented by a spicy note, a hint of white pepper and a hint of anise. On the palate, the wine is soft, with ripe black fruit flavors, and a hint of toast. Its tannins are round, and its acidity soft, giving the wine a pleasant balance, leading to a long, pleasant finish.

name: Cavenio Wihe Alenandn Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2008
description: The 2008 Alenandn Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon has a purple color, with a nose of blueberries, blackberries, and cassis. The mouthfeel is full, balanced, and full of blueberry fruit. This is a lush, rich, well-structured wine with a great finish.

name: Setallys EfAek Coast Red Blanc 2000
description: Blend: 52% Pinot Gris, 20% Riesling, 14% Muscat, 11% Pinot Blanc The EfAek Coast range is produced from the Rhône valley's high altitude vineyards.

name: Colson California Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: This Cabernet Sauvignon is a striking dark purple color in the glass.  Flavors of blackberries, cherries, and hints of spice surround the palate and lead to a full, round finish.  This wine is an ideal match for grilled meats and hearty pastas.

name: Cay Rielva Bambera Pinot Noir 2017
description: A nose of red cherry and red licorice with notes of leather, dried herbs and black pepper. A hint of fresh mint and a hint of brown sugar. Round and supple on the palate with a velvety mouthfeel and a long, smooth finish.

name: Polfance Gaponca Caberget Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: This wine has a beautiful golden straw color. On the nose are tropical fruits, citrus and green apple. The palate is a mix of citrus, tropical fruit and green apple flavors, with a touch of minerality and a clean, refreshing finish.

name: WDnettrewno Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: This Sauvignon Blanc is a bright pale lemon-green color. The bouquet shows an array of tropical fruit with a hint of citrus. The palate is fresh, clean and lively with an abundance of green apple and a clean mineral finish.

name: Weet's Sonoi Vineyards Chardonn-Griancolla Reserve 2010
description: The Estate Chardonnay grapes for this wine have been harvested from our Estate Vineyards in the Carneros district. With cool afternoon breezes from the Van Duzer Corridor, this vineyard produces grapes with beautiful acidity and a long finish.

name: Schehbe Dodriondi Pinot Noir 2014
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The nose of the 2014 Dodrion di Pinot Noir is filled with dried cherries, black raspberries and a hint of spice. The wine is rich on the palate with layers of blackberries, toasted oak, spice and a hint of dusty earth. This wine is all about balance. With a lovely structure, this wine has a silky finish. The 2012 vintage of Dodrion di Pinot Noir will continue to age gracefully for the next 10-15 years.

name: Beauchiel Katye Valley iassice Riesling 1997
description: A classic dry Riesling from the mountainside of the Chehalem Mountains.  Pure, clear pale yellow-green color. The nose is floral, spice, citrus, and a hint of peach. The palate is luscious, yet with a beautiful acidity and a wonderful finish. The 1997 vintage is showing beautifully, with a long, moderate finish. The 1997 vintage is showing beautifully now, and we feel it has the structure to age well.

name: DeClouve Valley Biancena de Pruverretitas 2016
origin: from Cotes de Provence, Provence, South of France, France
description: Pale yellow color. The nose is characterized by notes of citrus and white flowers. The mouth is smooth and has a lovely balance between acidity and fruitiness.

name: Ravosda yy Pont Bitke Als Pinot Noir 2007
description: The grapes are grown on the highest parts of the vineyard, where the soil is rich and clayey, ideal conditions for the Pinot Noir grape.  The wine is fermented in stainless steel tanks at controlled temperatures to preserve its freshness and fruitiness.   The wine is aged in French oak barrels, one-third of which are new, for about 18 months.

name: Pentoim Sauvignon Blanc 2000
description: The wine has a light straw-green colour. The nose is clean with hints of citrus and tropical fruit. The palate has a well-balanced structure with a long finish. The wine has a bright, clear straw colour. On the nose, the wine shows typical Sauvignon Blanc varietal flavours of citrus and tropical fruit. The wine has good structure, with a clean, bright, pale yellow colour. The varietal character is reflected in the palate, with a crisp, balanced acidity and a rounded, creamy texture. This wine is an excellent accompaniment to seafood and pasta dishes, as well as white meat, pork and even vegetables.

name: Shal Otk Toatre Vineyards Pinot Blanc Red 2001
description: This wine is the first wine that we make from the vineyard of the vineyard planted in 1965.  This vineyard was planted to the different Pinot Blanc clones that are typical of this variety, with a mix of Pommard and Wadenswil clones, each of which we make into a unique wine.  The nose is big and spicy, with lots of fresh black cherry fruit and a hint of mint.  The palate is soft and supple, with lots of fresh fruit and a hint of toasty oak.

name: Pucrey Cerrard Pinot Noir 2010
description: A blend of fruit from four different vineyards. The wine has a deep garnet color, with a nose of cherry, strawberry, and hints of sandalwood and cedar. Flavors of black cherry, strawberry, and raspberry are complemented by a spicy, vanilla finish. This wine is a perfect match for grilled salmon, herb-roasted chicken, veal, and pork.

name: Woldrey Astate Nepsents La Hanca Churaz 2013
description: The wine is full of spice and smoke, but also offers dark fruit flavors of plum, blackberry and cassis. This is a smooth, rich wine with a soft, round mouthfeel and a long finish. The wine is ready to drink now, but will continue to develop over the next few years.

name: Robard Berno Rayver Hodgadite Bevas 2010
description: Blend: 40% Touriga Nacional, 40% Garnacha, 20% Syrah A wine with a deep purple color.  On the nose, the wine is intense, fruity, spicy and floral with a hint of raspberry and plum.  In the mouth, it is dry, soft and tasty with a deep garnet core.  Its noble origin is reflected in the final taste, with a long aftertaste and a hint of almonds.

name: Kabent Merlat 2001
description: A rich, velvety, generous red wine blended from four fine, cool-climate viticultural regions. The Cabernet is rich, the Merlot gives the wine a spicy, plummy character, and the Cabernet Franc gives the wine a soft, fleshy character. The wine has fine tannins and is aged in American oak hogsheads. The Merlot softens the tannins and the Cabernet gives the wine a savoury, spicy character.

name: Pehero & Rhekine Sinent Celtalo 2013
description: Pairs well with burgers, grilled meats, pizza or pasta.  , the most promising of the wines are deep purple in color with a black core. The nose is intriguing with aromas of ripe fruit and exotic spices.  The palate is soft and round, with a smooth and long finish. The wine is fresh, with a hint of sweetness, showing loads of ripe plums and black cherries, and a touch of toasty oak and toasty vanilla. The wine is full of charm and great promise.

name: Orrato Barotoria 2016
description: The 2016 Barotoria has a deep garnet color. It has an expressive nose of ripe red cherries, dried plums, and notes of spice. On the palate, it is supple and round with flavors of dried plums, figs, and a hint of toasty oak. The finish is long and smooth.

name: Aceve RGtoas (OU Kchature Red Blend 2015
description: It has a deep and intense ruby color. On the nose, there are hints of berries and blackberries with subtle spicy notes. It is elegant on the palate, with ripe and soft tannins. It has a very good balance between acidity, tannin, alcohol and fruit. It has a long aftertaste.

name: Meroog Estate Denelickich Pinot Gringo 2017
description: The 2017 vintage of theDenelickich Estate Pinot Gringo has a deep ruby color and nose with ripe black cherry, pomegranate and pomegranate fruit. In the mouth, it is full bodied and supple, with a deep core of ripe, dark fruit and balanced acidity. The wine has a long, lasting finish with hints of tobacco, dried fruit, and spice. Enjoy this wine with a grilled ribeye steak, a hearty lamb stew, or a good old steak on the grill.

name: Blodpar Brey Chardonnay 1999
description: Our Chardonnay is characterized by crisp apple and citrus flavors with a slight creamy finish.  Blending Chardonnay from a variety of vineyards to enhance the wine, adds layers of complexity that only a California vineyard can achieve.  Blending fruit from the warmer, northern end of the Napa Valley, and cool, southern end of the Napa Valley, this wine is wonderful by itself or as a complement to grilled poultry and light pasta dishes.

name: Rodeorbazgo del Con Macion Montona 2009
description: The grapes for this wine come from the Vallegrande area, where the hills of Montona sit at 800m above sea level. The area's low rainfall and cool summers help the grapes retain excellent acidity and balance.

name: Bederata Oldo Sezie Melle 1998
description: The grapes are harvested early in order to maintain a bright fruit character. This traditional method of winemaking is used with whole clusters pressing, fermentation with native yeast, limited racking, limited bottling and extended aging in French oak barrels.

name: Castalourina Marjia Capatabaris di Montalcino 2010
description: Intense ruby red color. The nose is intense, with fruity notes of blackberry, cherry, and red currant, as well as spicy and balsamic notes. The palate is elegant, with good structure, good balance, and a pleasing finish.

name: Trenood Lufang Ed Coumantinir Napi Rondo 1999
description: The 1997 Lufang Edouard is a well balanced, medium bodied wine with a deep garnet color and aromas of dried cranberries, black cherries, and spice.  This wine is full-bodied, with layers of ripe black cherry and berry flavors, and hints of toasted oak.  This elegant, balanced wine finishes smooth and supple.   Edouard is a blend of grapes from the finest regions in the southern, coolest growing areas of California.  It is rich, with a distinctive fruit finish.

name: Becziotare Griarfialico Il Napa da Ro Ordoso 2007
description: This wine pairs well with roasted meats, tuna and cheeses.. The 2005 Griotte is rich and silky in texture, showing a deep ruby/purple color as well as a perfume of dark cherries, earth, spice, herbs, and sweet toasty oak. Full-bodied, with good balance and a rich, velvety texture, it should continue to improve in the bottle, with proper storage should last for 2-3 years.

name: Anmena Pinot Blanc Blanc 2004
description: This Pinot Blanc from the California region is a lighter, more aromatic style of Pinot Blanc.  The warm 2004 vintage has produced a crisp, fruit-forward wine.  The result is a wine with pure fruit flavors of melon, citrus, and a hint of

name: Vietti Bouston Rose (375ML half-bottlfe) 2010
description: The grapes from the Piedmont region are used to make a light, dry, crisp, refreshing and fruity rosé.  It has a lovely, vibrant and intense pink color. The wine's delicious, full-bodied flavor makes it the perfect wine for any occasion.

name: Mauscion Chenat Druczi Sanda Flon Red 14 2013
description: Pairs well with paella, pasta, (noodles, spaghetti, macaroni), vegetables, mushroom, stewed meat, sausage, pork, roast meat, red or/or white meat with sauces, short or medium cheeses.

name: Malari Ra Serioy Coppallo Sauvignon Blanc 2016
description: The nose is filled with an elegant floral fragrance, with notes of jasmine and acacia. The mouthfeel is filled with a hint of freshness, with a great persistence and depth.

name: Margrinomested Wine Zinfatondi 2006
description: This was a cooler year, which meant a longer growing season. This also allowed the grapes to develop at an even pace with lower yields. The 2006 Zinfandel has a deep garnet color and aromas of bramble berries and spice. On the palate, the wine is soft and plush, with flavors of blackberry, blueberry and hints of anise. The wine finishes with great structure, balanced acidity and fine tannins.

name: Artavionpe lesris Pinot Noir Cabernet Sauvignon 2006
description: A rich ruby color.  The nose is deep and intense with hints of red berry fruits, and a touch of spice.  It has great structure, elegant and harmonious tannins, great length and a great aging potential.

name: Arova Classic Chardonnay 1999
description: Estate grown, but handcrafted, and bottled unfined and unfiltered, Arova's 1999 Chardonnay offers a bouquet of butterscotch, vanilla beans, and coconut. Full-bodied, with plenty of extract and richness, and layers of ripe fruit and spice, it has a silky finish and a wonderful balance. This is a hedonist's delight. Enjoy it with seafood, chicken, or even pork. If you want to drink a truly great Chardonnay, let it sit in your glass for a while.

name: Kupserathe Balbera Red Blaccion Lata Nema Sugifa 2012
description: Kuperserathe Balbera has a dark, intense purple color. The nose reveals aromas of fresh fruit, including blackberries, plums and blueberries. A very well-structured wine on the palate, with good acidity, excellent balance and fruit and fine tannins. The finish is long and spicy, with fruit and floral notes.

name: Ca Blunello di Or Amtivor 1999
description: Deep ruby red in color.  The nose is filled with the scent of dark cherries, plums, and exotic spices.  On the palate the wine is lush and ripe with red fruit and a hint of toasty oak.  This wine is smooth and rounded with a polished finish.  Recommended with roasted meats and game.  Ideal with aged cheeses.  Serving Suggestions: Amti (grilled eggplants/pear sauces) 1999

name: Elber Chardonnay 2015
description: Pale yellow color. On the nose, aromas of fresh fruit with citric notes. On the palate, the wine shows great structure, well-balanced acidity, with a long finish. Pair with seafood and chicken. It also goes well with white meats, soft cheeses and white pasta.

name: Fairado Cabernet Sauvignon 2001
description: Deep ruby red in color, with an elegant, full nose of ripe cherries and berry fruit. The palate is round and soft with balanced fruit, tannin and acidity. Recommended with grilled steak, braised meats or roasted vegetables. A perfect partner with spicy Asian cuisine.

name: Pebatte Sen'sicha Cabernet Sauvignon 2014
description: Aromas of red fruits, cherries, and redcurrants are expressed in the nose. In the mouth, this wine shows great structure, great tannins, and great concentration. It is a complex, balanced wine with a great personality. The finish is long and lingering.

name: Roberts Orber's EXIver de haugaine #982
description: An elegant Bordeaux style blend of Merlot (70%) and Cabernet Sauvignon (30%), the EXident shows an exotic mix of berry, cherry and cedar aromas, and soft, sweet tannins. An elegant, refined finish is accented by a touch of vanilla oak.

name: Jaino Noratrey Einena's Pilet Noir 2011
description: A wine of structure and complexity that reveals its potential. It is the perfect wine for the long haul. The Pilet in the area is a blend of Tempranillo and Merlot grapes, aged in used French oak barrels. It has a deep garnet color, and a lively nose of spice and vanilla. The wine is balanced and complex on the palate, with a pleasant and long finish.

name: ORd Blanconi Classico Vin Meillacio Sirescala Spata Valley Chardonnay 2012
description: The spiciness of the grapes gives a well-balanced structure and the lightness of the wine makes it very approachable. It is a wine that can be drunk young but also kept for years to come.

name: Dadhon Merlot 2000
description: The color of this wine is a deep purple. Aromas of black cherry, blackberry and blueberry fruit are followed by subtle hints of spice and vanilla. Flavors of black cherry, berry, and vanilla. The wine has a soft, round mouthfeel with a long, balanced finish.

name: Chateau Bewuntth Zinfandel 2000
description: The 2000 Bewittth Zinfandel is a rich and balanced wine with layers of red cherry, spice and a hint of earthiness. This is a full-bodied, well-structured wine with a long finish. Pair with grilled meats, pasta dishes with red sauce, pizza, poultry, barbecue and spicy foods.

name: Walcuth Loute Estate Geeve Bruchet Redd Blend Red Roed 2009
description: The Loute is a blend of Syrah, Grenache, Petite Sirah, Carignane, and Counoise. , meaty, spicy, and full-bodied, this wine has a deep ruby/purple hue as well as an opulent perfume of blackberries, cherries, plums, and currants. This is followed by a medium to full-bodied, rich, velvety wine with loads of fruit and soft, supple tannins. It is a blend of 45% Syrah, 30% Grenache, 20% Mourvedre, and 5% Counoise.

name: Mollamerstis Yeon Chardonnay 2020
description: The aromas of pineapple and grapefruit are evident at first sniff through the wine. The crisp acidity and rich texture from the neutral oak and the richness from the malolactic are balanced out nicely on the palate. The finish is long and is accented by a creamy richness.

name: Kolmingellumbedite Siveree Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: , fruit-laden, unfiltered and naturally vinified, with minimal intervention, combining traditional vinification methods with the techniques of modern winemaking to bring out the best in the fruit without losing any of any of the natural assertiveness that can result from traditional vinification methods. The Sémillon grapes are hand picked, fermented in stainless steel tanks and aged for 12 months in French oak barrels. The resulting wine is a rich, full-bodied wine with ripe berry fruit, subtle herbal tones, smooth tannins and a toasty oak finish.

name: Lobbador da etwald Cellrame Zinflane) 2017
description: Lobbador da etwald's Côtes de Luz wine has a deep violet color. On the nose, there are complex aromas of black pepper, tobacco and red fruits. The wine is elegant, harmonious and has a velvety mouthfeel. Its long finish is accompanied by mineral notes of graphite and minerals. A great wine to pair with a variety of meat dishes.

name: Fondaveen Syrah Merlot 2008
origin: from Cachapoal Valley, Rapel Valley, Chile
description: Deep purple in color. Expressive nose of blackberry, cherry, and blueberry. Smooth and rounded on the palate, with a silky texture.  A long, pleasant finish.

name: Winde Zindalliine Lic Pacoa Steaberg Risesare Vineyard Vineyards Pinot Gron 2015
description: An elegant and refined wine that is rich, textured, and balanced. It has aromas of bright berry and spice. It has a silky mouthfeel and a long finish.

name: Domaine de Jasticques & Fume Ragemal Abanreirris 2005
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: A harmonious blend of vanilla, melon and tropical fruit flavors with a touch of smokiness from the Syrah, while the crisp acidity gives the wine a lovely balance. A wine for the ages, this delightful wine pairs well with grilled seafood, chicken, and even pizza with tomato sauce.

name: La Nailla Chirat 2000
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: This is a perfect wine for the holidays, but it pairs well with most every kind of meat. It can even pair with the traditional cuisine, such as roasted lamb or beef., this wine is a blend of 25% Syrah, 20% Grenache, 15% Cinsault, 15% Carignane, 10% Mourvèdre, 5% Counoise, 5% Petit Verdot, 5% Malbec

name: Chateau La Marthetslor Prick Primamote Bourgogne La Perrio 2014
description: and, sometimes, the word 'perrier', this wine has a pretty, friendly nose. There's also a touch of earthiness. Soft and round on the palate with lovely soft tannins and a smooth finish. A beautiful example of the Côte Chalonnaise terroir.

name: Jatoca Froncher Promiane 2014
description: A blend of Tempranillo, Cabernet Sauvignon, and Merlot, with aromas of wild berry, spice and pepper. In the mouth, it is medium-bodied, with bright, balanced acidity and ripe tannins.

name: Guunts Fold Hills Caberet Sauvignon 2014
origin: from Margaret River, Western Australia, Australia
description: The nose is fine and complex with hints of dark cherries, dark plums and subtle floral notes. The wine has a lovely structure and generous fruit, with a lovely balance between the fruit and the fine French oak. The palate is long and intense, with dark berry fruit, dark chocolate and fine tannins, finishing with a fresh acidity and great structure.

name: Filber Heimillon Rigera Reserve 2003
description: This is a deep plum/ruby-colored effort offering an earthy perfume of cedar, spice, and black cherry. This medium to full-bodied, fruity, crowd-pleasing, fruity, easygoing 2003 is a blend of 50% Tempranillo, 30% Merlot, 10% Cabernet Sauvignon, and 10% Syrah. There are approximately 20,000 cases of this fruit-filled, fleshy, rich, opulent, luscious, pure, medium to full-bodied, and delicious wine to drink over the next 3-4 years.-Wine Advocate

name: Pock Digan Vinay Caroboncra Granch 2001
description: This is a lovely, rich wine with tropical fruit, and lots of Pinot Grigio. The aromas are of fresh melon, honey, and cinnamon, with just a hint of varietal character. The wine is soft and rich in the mouth with flavors of figs and melon. The finish is long and lingering. This wine is an excellent accompaniment to chicken, salmon, and even spicy Asian cuisine.

name: Falrait Russione Chateau Classica 2014
description: The 2015 is a bright ruby red color. Aromas of sweet cherry and blackberry fruit mingle with notes of cedar and tobacco. The palate is fresh and mineral, with refined tannins, balanced acidity, and a finish of red fruit and chocolate.

name: Talporis Estate Zinfandel 2012
description: This wine is a great match for a variety of rich dishes. Serve with BBQ-style ribs, grilled meats, pasta and pizza, spicy sauces, BBQ-style ribs, BBQ-style ribs, spicy sauces, or even a BBQ-style chicken. This wine will continue to develop in the bottle for 2-3 years.

name: Doubier Coutier Macryen 1997
description: The grapes are hand-harvested, sorted, destemmed, and gently pressed. The juice is then run off to oak barrels (30% new) where it matures for nine months. After the barrels have been selected, the wine is fined with egg whites, filtered and bottled.

name: Domaines Mouilli 2004
origin: from Cotes de Castillon, Bordeaux, France
description: The Mouilli marries elegance and power with a fine tannic structure and a long finish.  The color is deep garnet with flashes of violet.  The nose is intense and aromatic, with notes of black fruit, spices, and wood.  The palate is harmonious, with good balance between tannic structure, acidity and fruit.  The Mouilli marries elegance and power with finesse, with aromas of cloves and vanilla.  The finish is long and spicy, with hints of pepper.

name: Chateau d'Atauete 2010
description: The 2010 vintage is a fine, full-bodied wine with intense color and a bouquet of red fruits. On the palate, it is soft and easy to drink. The soft tannic structure of this wine, with its beautiful balance, will allow this wine to mature gracefully over the next few years.

name: Rousster Galmol Dues-Pageu Rose 2017
description: A pale, salmon-pink color. Aromas of fresh berries, with notes of thyme and rosemary. Palate shows more red berry fruit and a slight creaminess. Great length and complexity with a long finish.

name: FontaiJston Fig Cakels Vineyard Cherino 2012
description: Aromas of black cherry, fig, and hints of toasted oak with hints of sweet, spicy oak. Flavors of dark chocolate, currants, and cherries are framed by velvety tannins and a long, lingering finish.

name: Soraha Scefwoma Soleca 2003
description: Impresssive aromas of blackberry and cassis. This wine has a velvety, long mouthfeel, with big, soft tannins.  Densely fruity with lots of flavor and complexity. Ready to drink now and over the next few years.  A blend of 60% Syrah, 40% Garnacha, and 10% Cabernet Sauvignon.

name: Cyalleca Charsonnay 2012
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 40% Grenache, 10% Merlot The Chardonnay grapes are sourced from a number of outstanding sites around the world. This bottling is a blend of select vineyards from the northernmost parts of our vineyards with some of the oldest Chardonnay plantings in the world.

name: Seajalbicto Ferrarcon 2010
description: Pale yellow color.  Intense and fruity on the nose, with notes of sage, jasmine and a hint of mint.  Dry, velvety and well-balanced with a long finish.

name: Neytan Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon 2011
description: The 2011 vintage is a rich, velvety wine that comes from the Napa Valley.   It has a dark garnet color and a nose of cherry liqueur, sweet cedar, and a hint of toast. The palate is a harmonious combination of fruit, tannin and the French oak that can be the main component of this wine.

name: Dunley Rieyling Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of theDunley Rieyling Cabernet Sauvignon continues the appeal of this wine. The aromas of dark cherry, cassis, and a hint of toasty oak are balanced with the soft, smooth tannins and bright acidity of this Cabernet Sauvignon. The wine is medium to full bodied with layers of concentrated flavors that include cherry, blackberry, and hints of spice. The wine finishes with a hint of toasty oak and a touch of earthiness. The balanced acidity and tannin structure of this wine will allow it to develop additional complexity with bottle age.

name: Rosel Bartans Blockes Rouge Reserve Sanzeres Sauvignon Blanc 2012
description: This wine shows an attractive straw colour. On the nose, there are aromas of peach and nectarine with a hint of boxwood. The palate is fresh and vibrant with intense flavours of ripe peach and fresh herbs. There is an underlying sweetness from the ripening on skins and a rich richness from the time spent on lees. The wine has a well balanced acidity which will support further development if cellared well in the medium to long future.

name: Banonda Syrah Unterusza IS Pinot Grigio 2015
description: Deep, dark, purple-black color. On the nose, intense, concentrated aromas of blackberries, black cherries, plums, and licorice, with spicy, vanilla, and mineral notes. The wine has great volume, and is soft, with great balance and a lingering finish.

name: Hoira Casavignel Cifilca Rossa (OU 1157 Livalcalc-Labberte 2008
description: The wine is made from old-vine Garnacha, with a small amount of Cabernet Sauvignon, Syrah, and Merlot.

name: Nepuese Habve Franch Barut 2015
description: Intense garnet red color. Aromas of fresh fruit with a hint of spiciness. This is a full-bodied wine with good balance, structure and a long finish. This wine is ideal to accompany barbeque, roasts, or mature cheeses.

name: Hewsone Gilly-Mentelowttty Zinfontel 1997
description: A perfect balance between ripe, luscious fruit and structure.  This wine is very fruit forward in style with soft, round tannins.  It is rich and spicy in the mouth with jammy, blackberry and cedar.  Some raisins and chocolate lingers in the finish.  A great everyday wine that can be enjoyed by itself or with any meal.

name: Sancha  Ramon Cabernet Sauvignon 1998
description: This wine is a blend of the top 100 best lots from the region of the valley.  It is a rich and complex wine with full flavors of black cherry, blackberry and spice.  This is a perfect accompaniment to grilled meats, salmon, duck, lamb, beef, pasta, risotto, pizza, and spicy Thai dishes.  The wine is ready for immediate consumption, but will continue to improve for up to 10 years.

name: Bockellane Abbablita Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2007
description: A ruby-violet color. Aromas of wild blackberries, currants, and ripe cherries with a hint of spice. On the palate, intense flavors of dark berries, currants, and cherries are complemented by notes of cinnamon, earth, and a touch of toast. The wine has a rich and round mouthfeel with polished tannins and a long finish. This Cabernet Sauvignon will continue to improve with age for the next 3-5 years.

name: Ingeiset Stra 1998
description: A dark purple colour in the glass with a bouquet of red berry fruit with a hint of coffee. The palate is full and rich, with excellent fruit concentration and soft tannins. A wine of great structure and balance, which will reward careful cellaring.

name: Moustal Mielanso Rodage Austierin 2005
description: The Mâconnais region of Spain is the prefect wine for the roasted meats of the region, especially with dark, in-line stews and roasts. This traditional combination of the two noble varieties in the blend creates a wine of great structure and great ageing potential.

name: Pognion 14 Charbaine Merlolly-Faciel 2018
description: The color of this medium-depth purple wine is deep and intense. The nose is elegant and fruity, with scents of plums, blackberries, cassis and spices. It is a medium-bodied wine with a rounded tannic structure and a long finish.

name: Vorath Chardonnay 2003
description: This rich, creamy Chardonnay exhibits lush fruit aromas with hints of pear, apple, and butterscotch. A soft and supple mouthfeel is balanced with a rich lingering finish. Lemelson Chardonnay 2000 [response] [category_1] White Wine [category_2] Other White Blends [category_2] Other White Blends [origin]  from Willamette Valley, Oregon

name: Bonama Charsina-Roads Sancereyae Pinnot Noir 1995
description: This wine has a deep garnet color.  The nose shows aromas of ripe cherries and plums, with hints of toasted oak.  The palate is long and lush, with flavors reminiscent of red cherries, and plums, and a touch of toasty oak.  This wine has the structure and acidity to age gracefully for many years to come.

name: Elk Floles Winey Reserve Sauvignon Blanco 2009
description: The wine shows a brilliant pale straw color in the glass with aromas of lemongrass, lime peel and orange blossom.  The palate is refreshing with ripe honeydew and lemon zest.  This wine has a crisp and clean finish with a hint of minerality.  The natural acidity of the Sauvignon Blanc fruit is balanced by the subtle oak influence.  Enjoy this wine as an aperitif, or with your favorite summertime cuisine.

name: Mrack Y Valpinet Sauvonna-Sauvignon Blanc 2014
description: Blend: 90% Sauvignon Blanc, 10% Semillon Displays a lovely nose of fresh cut grass, ripe melon and figs, with a hint of lychee nut. The palate is fresh and lively with mouth filling fruit and excellent balance, a lovely mineral finish and excellent value for money. A great wine for current drinking but can be enjoyed with food too.

name: De Carna Cuvee Blanc 2004
description: The nose is fresh, with floral notes and a hint of citrus fruit. In the mouth, the wine is fresh, with a hint of sweetness and a long finish. It is a well balanced wine, that will be a pleasant companion to all kinds of fish, rice and seafood dishes.

name: Barfin Cueak Valley Malb Countes 2000
description: Deep, dark, cherry color.  Intense, complex, intense fruit aromas.  Elegant, with a good structure, well-balanced, with soft tannins.  A wine of great personality, easy to drink, with a unique aftertaste.  Best pairings include cold cuts, pasta, poultry, grilled meat, sausage, mushroom, stewed meat, semi-cured cheese, stuffed pasta or dry fruits.

name: Domua Passies & Fils Venatte 2012
description: The wine has a brilliant straw color. The nose is intense, with tropical fruit aromas. The palate is soft, with a great balance between acidity and sugar. The finish is long and fruity, with a great freshness.

name: Graciiville Auglail Serio Cordesnondes 2018
description: This is a rich, velvety wine with aromas of blackberries, blueberries and a hint of coffee. On the palate, it is full-bodied, with a long finish.

name: Mulding Sauvigon Blanc 2014
origin: from Margaret River, Western Australia, Australia
description: Pale straw in color with a green tinge. Lifted aromas of gooseberry, nectarine, grapefruit, and passionfruit leap from the glass. The palate is vibrant and lively with layers of citrus, gooseberry and nectarine leading to a long, dry, refreshing finish. Made with 100% Sauvignon Blanc.

name: Roobonte Rose 2000
description: , Lots of strawberry and rose petal on the nose. Full-bodied and soft on the palate, with lots of fruit and good acidity. Nice, long finish. This is a wine for the ages. Drink now through 2006. 10,000 cases made.-Wine Spectator

name: Pivottica Chianti Pricari 1997
description: An elegant, full-bodied Chianti, this wine is well balanced with supple tannins.  Velvety with hints of violets and berries.  Recommended with grilled steak, braised veal shank, and Tuscan herbs.

name: Rossila Chianti Valbialieriuell Barbera 2007
description: This is a full-bodied Barbera with loads of dark cherry, raspberry and spice. The acidity in the wine gives the wine excellent balance, and the tannin structure gives the wine great complexity and an incredibly long finish.

name: Willolbasier Estate Syrah 1998
description: A full bodied wine with smoked meats and smoky tones.  Blackberry and cherry flavors dominate, accented by a touch of black pepper.  It is nicely balanced and shows a soft, round mouthfeel.  The mouthfeel is soft and smooth.  It is long on the palate, with a hint of pepper.  This Syrah will continue to improve with further bottle age for the next 3-5 years.

name: Donaini Valley Bins Cabernet Sauvignon 2000
description: The color of the wine is dark purple with flashes of light. The nose is filled with aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and subtle hints of mint and herbs. The flavors are full and rich, with great balance between fruit and tannin, with a long finish that is reminiscent of berries and spice. This is a concentrated, well-structured Cabernet Sauvignon that can be enjoyed by itself or with any meal.

name: Crostes Ridge Cabernet Sauvignon 2015
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: Blend: 81% Cabernet Sauvignon, 10% Petit Verdot, 7% Merlot  Here’s a brief chance to drink a truly exceptional Cabernet Sauvignon from one of the best estates in the world for the price. You’ll find this outstanding Cabernet Sauvignon, the best values and easy-to-enjoy wines to drink now and over [prompt]

name: Peapass Bogumee 2000
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Medium ruby color with a nose of red fruits. On the palate, the wine is smooth and harmonious with a well-balanced structure. Very easy to drink. A perfect wine for aperitivo and for the entire meal.

name: Mestrer Potte Scatoc 2015
description: The classicest traditional Scatoc, the wine has a dark ruby red color. On the nose, there are aromas of black cherry, blackberry, licorice, and spice. The wine is juicy on the palate with a great body and structure. It has a beautiful balance between fruit and acidity. The fruit component continues through on the palate, with notes of chocolate and vanilla. The finish is long and persistent.

name: Prabasno sieno ValpGlila Rieslina Bourgano 2014
description: Pairs well with grilled chicken, pork chops, and beef tenderloin. A good match with game birds and turkey. A great companion to any kind of cheese or dried fruits.

name: Crhono Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon (OU Kosher) 2015
description: This wine is perfect for everyday enjoyment. It has vibrant flavors of ripe blackberry and cherry with notes of spice. This wine has smooth tannins that make it enjoyable to drink on its own or to enjoy with your favorite cuisine.

name: Ednola Vinams Ruonen Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2010
description: Vibrant straw color. On the nose, aromas of honeysuckle, mango and passion fruit intertwine with the citrusy lemon, green fig and fresh ginger. The palate is balanced, with flavors of green apple and citrus that are balanced by a bright, fresh acidity and a long finish.

name: Burnbaed Wines Suthilla Cola Cuvee Syrah 2015
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: , one of the most exciting wines from the Santa Barbara County appellation.  Suthilla Cola is a blend of Syrah, Grenache, Petite Syrah, and Mourvedre grapes.  While this wine is already drinking well, it is full-bodied, with loads of black cherry and spice.  There is also a bit more body and richness on the palate, and a rich, velvety texture.  It's an incredible wine to drink now, but will continue to develop for 10-12 years.

name: Styopramil Cabernet Sauvignon 2016
description: A great match for grilled meats, tomato-based pasta dishes, pizza or beef stew.  Toasty oak-coffee & cinnamon/liquorice with a creamy texture. Pairs well with pizza, pasta, BBQ & grilled chicken/grilled pork.

name: Vauda Croboiun Joset Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: A complex, full-bodied wine with deep color. Intense, almost black cherry color. Ripe fruit aromas combined with chocolate and cedar notes from the oak. The palate is full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a long, long finish. A rich, concentrated wine with a great structure. The varietal aromas of plums and cherries dominate, with sweet oak hints. Very elegant and harmonious wine.

name: Baron Mountain Merlot 2000
description: This Merlot has a bright garnet color. The nose is elegant with aromas of red berry fruit, spice and toasted oak. The wine has a soft, round mouthfeel with flavors of ripe plums, berry fruit and a light earthiness. This Merlot has a great structure, and will continue to improve with further bottle age.

name: Ririso Zinantolla 2015
description: The wine shows a deep violet color with a nose of ripe dark cherries, blackberries, and wild strawberries. This Zinantolla shows great balance on the palate with concentrated flavors of ripe dark cherries, plums, and ripe blackberries. It is supported by soft tannins and a pleasant, toasty finish.

name: Bodegas Bonquilko Doses 2011
description: Blend: 70% Monastrell, 30% Tempranillo Pineapple, grapefruit, honeydew, and lemon peel. On the palate, fresh acidity and a medium body. It has a light, refreshing, dry finish. It is a great wine to drink by itself or to enjoy with simple, classic foods.

name: Gragelli Lan Vineyards Bedof Valley-Pinot Noir 2015
origin: from Dundee Hills, Willamette Valley, Oregon
description: The 2016 Bedof Central Coast Pinot Noir jumps out of the glass with aromas of black cherries, fresh raspberries, and hints of rosemary. Flavors of pomegranate, fresh cherries, wild raspberries, rosemary, and hints of brown sugar coat the palate and are nicely framed by firm tannins. The wine is drinking well now, but will continue to improve with 4-6 years of aging.

name: Thine Rutth Sauvignon Blanc 2013
description: Pale straw color with a tinge of green. Intense and complex with lifted aromas of passionfruit, gooseberry and citrus. A refreshing crisp dry palate with notes of gooseberry and citrus zest. The palate has a full, round and creamy mid-palate with a crisp mineral finish.

name: Grormardan Rusmilla Coaste dal Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignognage (haonf-bottle) 2001
description: The 2001 Rusmilla Coaste is full-bodied, with a supple, rich and elegant wine. Its bouquet is filled with scents of raspberries, cherries, spice, cedar, and mint. On the palate the wine shows ripe plums, berries, and spice. This is a well-balanced wine with an elegant structure and a long finish. The wine's deep color indicates the level of concentration this wine has to give. It has the potential to improve in the bottle. It should continue to improve in the bottle for the next 5-7 years.

name: PaldEs Buthel's Bluz 2014
description: This rich, silky wine has a medium yellow color with a nose of honeysuckle, apricot and pineapple. On the palate, pineapple and mango are evident, with a hint of spice and tropical fruit. Medium bodied, this wine has a bright finish with a smooth, creamy texture.

name: Rose Nido Tleakol Petitoma Rotere Syrah 2015
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: Blend: 92% Syrah, 8% Grenache  Pairs well with grilled meats, wild game or a good steak.  and a good attitude to the wines of this region are what sets it apart. We were surprised by how successful our blend of Syrah and Cabernet Sauvignon grapes came together in 2016. The 2016 vintage was a winemakers dream come true in our cellar. The blend is rich, with aromas and flavors of plum, black cherry, blueberry, and cassis. We are proud to present the wines of the region and to make them from the best of the best of the best regions in the region.

name: Berwombe Winery Senbart Estate Silgkare Charronnas (375ML Hagl-botte 2017
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: and what a full-bodied wine this vintage has. It has a sweet, dark, opulent mouthfeel with a tannin-rich mid-palate. On the palate, it is soft, supple, smooth and dry. It is very deep purple in color. Aromas of spice and blackberries, with a touch of smoke, cedar and caramel.  A wine that is not over-oaked, it is rich, long and deep in the mouth. The finish is long and complex with a wonderful finesse. A wine that is still easy to drink.

name: Santa yrion Scogack Galisse 2017
description: The color of this dry white is a pale yellow with light green hues. The nose is expressive and fruity, with notes of green apples and citrus. In the mouth, the structure and balance of the wine is refreshing and dry. The final is long and persistent.

name: S. Mochatess Romiers Garlas Cabernet Sauvignon 2013
description: The 2013 vintage of this Cabernet Sauvignon is a dark ruby color. It has a rich nose of blueberry and cassis with hints of sweet tobacco. On the palate, it is bold, with blueberry and blackberry fruit. It is balanced and elegant, with soft tannins on the finish.

name: Haybenginumt Dilel Vineyard Pinot-Naillay Pinot Noir
description: Pinot-Neillah is produced from vines grown at high elevation (udal) on the Dilettante Estate, one of the oldest estates in the Valley. It is situated on the south side of the valley at the foot of a ridge in the northernmost part of the appellation. The vineyard was planted in 1967 in a very warm climate with an early Spring budbreak. This particular weather conditions at harvest allowed the grapes to achieve full ripeness while maintaining balance and acidity. Hand-picked and hand-harvested, the fruit was hand-sorted, crushed and fermented in stainless steel tanks before being aged in French and American oak barrels for 14 months.

name: Losso 2015
description: It is ideal to accompany grilled or roasted red meat, game, semi-cured cheese, stuffed pasta or stuffed pasta or dry pasta with spicy sauces.

name: J.J. RO Maryer Calraeult Vineyard Grend Conta Caberneta 2017
description: The 2016 J.J.RO Maryer shows the elegant side of Calistoga Cabernet Franc. On the nose, aromas of black cherry, dark chocolate, tobacco, and toasted oak. On the palate, the flavors of dark berries, cassis, herbs, licorice, and roasted espresso bean. The wine’s soft tannins, and balanced acidity make it an excellent pairing with anything off the

name: Sebosta Risa Cabarnoak Pinotage 2014
description: The 2014 vintage is a deep garnet red with purple reflections. It has a floral nose of rosehip and spice, red fruit jam, dark cherries and raspberries. On the palate, it has good structure and balance with flavors of cherry, plums, blackberry and truffle. This is a well-structured, balanced wine with a smooth, velvety tannin finish.

name: HeXK Franca Hancies Pinot Grigio 2014
description: Delicious on its own as an aperitif or pair with a variety of lighter cuisine. Excellent with pasta dishes, fried or grilled meats, seafood, poultry, risotto and vegetarian fare.

name: Pinryshurg Sprsono Hiscollo Rederve/Merlac 2011
description: Blend: 45% Petite Sirah, 35% Merlot, 15% Cabernet Sauvignon Domaine Du Castel Ring of the Moon 2012 [response] [category_1] Red Wine [category_2] Other Red Blends [category_2] Other Red Blends [origin]  from the Maipo River, the indigenous Rhône varietal of the north-east facing slopes of the Montagne de Reims district are the backbone of our blend.  Our winemaking team believes that blending grapes from different vineyards to produce a wine with a good balance between fruit, tannin, and oak flavors will result in a wine that is medium bodied, dry and refreshing. It has soft and rounded tannins, making it enjoyable to drink now or cellar it for future enjoyment.

name: Mall Tison Saintann Padita Trandan Montega 2016
description: Deep ruby red color, intense, fruity and floral nose. On the palate it is supple, fresh and fruity, with notes of plums, berry fruit and sweet spices.

name: Bock-Soascodire Pinot Noir 2010
description: The 2010 vintage shows aromas of dark cherry and blueberry fruit with a touch of black pepper. On the palate, the wine shows good structure with well-integrated tannins and a long, silky finish.

name: Cont Redronba Coastra Coastit Blockino 2008
description: Blend: 44% Syrah, 20% Merlot, 16% Cabernet Sauvignon, 7% Petite Verdot, oldest formulce winery in Spain. After being bankrupted in 2009, the family who produced this wine has turned out a very good opportunity to make a very good wine. The wine shows intense, deep color with some shades of purple. The nose is very intense and complex, with notes of licorice, black fruit and a hint of spice. The wine has a round, rich and smooth tannic structure. This is a wine that can be enjoyed by itself as an aperitif, but also goes well with red meat and pasta dishes.

name: Henzelry Riserva Tharzharino Riserva 2015
description: The most important wine of the estate is theHenzelry. It is a wine of great power, elegance and finesse, a great wine for the entire estate, a great wine for the ages.

name: Poreli Clei Bernamay Malbec 2000
description: This is a wine with a deep, dense violet color. It has an intense, complex nose of cherries, strawberries, and berries with light spicy tones. In the mouth, it is austere, with light tannins and a pleasant acidity that keeps the wine's structure and depth balanced. It has a long, complex finish.

name: Tami Cannares 1194 Wakes Ory Theef The La Cabernet Sauvignon 2002
description: Langmeil Valley Cabernet Sauvignon is deep garnet in color with a wonderful perfume of black cherry, currant, spice and sandalwood. On the palate, the wine is full and warm in the mouth with loads of rich, concentrated fruit. The palate is smooth and round with a long silky finish. This wine is a great example of the Barossa Valley Cabernet.

name: Janbert Imank bondtage Vinatal Noirga Classica Verdan 2013
origin: from Paso Robles, Central Coast, California
description: The 2013 vintage was a great year in the U.S.A cold winter was followed by a long growing season which produced fruit with incredible concentration. Once again, warm spring temperatures and even bud break were balanced by cool weather. The weather was perfect in many areas of the U.S.A. the high quality grapes that came in from the mountains and hills of the Russian River Valley combined with great structure, the result of which is a wine with more power than the regular cuvée. The color is deep purple and the nose is of spice, black pepper and berries. The wine is well balanced with a deep core of fruit, the finish is long and balanced.

name: Balls Dena Vonneyard Grosse 2007
origin: from Yakima Valley, Columbia Valley, Washington
description: The wine shows a dark garnet color. On the nose, aromas of cinnamon, clove, cedar and raspberry are evident, along with some earthy tones. The wine is full-bodied, with sweet tannins, and a long finish. It is a full-bodied wine with structure and structure, but is also a beautiful wine to enjoy by itself as an aperitif or paired with anything with a bit of heat. The wine is a blend of four red varieties, selected from the finest blocks on our home ranch.

name: Two Napa Valley Vineyard Malbectucot Rossanes 2002
description: The 2004 Malbec has a deep purple color. The wine is full-bodied, with loads of spice and pepper. It has a lush, velvety texture, loads of sweet fruit, and a beautiful texture. It is a terrific example of this delicious vintage of Malbec from the Napa Valley. It is another in a string of superbly crafted Malbecs from the region. It is a blockbuster effort. It is a blend of 65% Malbec from the lower mountains of the Pomerol and 35% Cabernet Sauvignon from the upper hills of the Napa Valley. The wine was aged in small French oak barrels for 14 months. The wine is a blend of 65% Malbec from the lower slopes of the hills and 35% Cabernet Sauvignon from the upper hills. The wine was aged for 14 months in 30% new French and American oak barrels.

name: Black antwand Sirguebah Zinfandel 1999
description: The 2000 vintage was an excellent year.  Black Antwand's high elevation vines and unique soil composition in the Napa Valley are the primary reasons why Black Antwand's wines are among the most unique and rewarding in the world.

name: Rimoeho Ordingino 2010
description: A great match for the most elegant of dishes, from pizza to pasta or risotto. , our family of wines are based in the region of Barcelona which lies at the foot of the Montserrat mountain range, where the days long in the sun, with some of the best days in the region well-made wine producing a wine of great charm.

name: Axpomurdadion Favmaleif 2016
description: A deep garnet red in color, it has ripe blackberry fruit and a spicy, smoky edge. Medium-bodied, with soft, round tannins, it has a long finish.  Pairs well with smoked chicken, pasta with meat sauce, pizza and grilled pork.

name: Vilts Geaures Black Deyeurt Rumbboues Gearesonno 2012
description: The wine is a cherry red color. It has a complex nose of fresh fruit, spices and hints of oak. In the mouth it is soft and fresh with a good tannic structure and a long finish.

name: Pa am Santerre Coteaun-Mercionto de Camtare 2009
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Intense dark red color with purplish shades. Aromas of black fruit (blackberry, blackcurrant) and licorice. Smooth on the palate with smooth tannins. A harmonious wine, with a long finish.

name: Eldibels Sauvignon Blanc 2018
origin: from El Dorado, Sierra Foothills, California
description: The bright fruit flavors of the 2017 Sauvignon Blanc echo the aromas of grapefruit, citrus, and honeydew melon. On the palate, the wine offers a crisp and bright impression with flavors of grapefruit, honeydew, and lemongrass. The finish is smooth, and the wine’s natural acidity and mineral elements will allow the wine to age gracefully for many years to come.

name: Caronsa Carnaria Casnomaine Pinoto Gresaite Lagha 2014
origin: from Santa Barbara, Central Coast, California
description: This is a deep ruby wine with a nose of raspberries and cherries. On the palate the wine is medium bodied with bright fruit, spice and balanced tannins. It is very drinkable now and will continue to develop in the bottle.

name: Monta di Barino Terre Sigrasela 2011
description: Terre Sigrasèle is the first of the three reserves that Monta di Barino produces. The label depicts the shape of a volcanic hillside with a southeastern exposure; this is a terraced hillside which leads to the sea in Monta. This results in a wine with structure, concentration and fruit.

name: Domaine Omaux Sano Red 2010
origin: from Languedoc, South of France, France
description: Blend: 40% Syrah, 40% Grenache, 20% Mourvèdre Serve with grilled steak, beef empanadas, lamb chops, lamb chops, and cheeses such as Parmigiano Reggiano, aged gouda or cheddar cheese.

name: Patic de la Valley Calbere 2011
description: Blend: 54% Garnacha, 26% Syrah, 7% Cabernet Sauvignon ,Neyers Amezto 2008 is the first release of the wine from this blend of Syrah, Garnacha, Merlot, and Cabernet Franc grapes.  The color is deep purple and the wine has a nose of spices and flowers. The palate is elegant, with ripe fruit and some herb and spice flavors.  The tannins are soft and the wine is very smooth.   A very well balanced and elegant wine.

name: Pramberg Zinfande) 2004
description: The nose is inviting and aromatic, with notes of blueberry, strawberry, cherry, and black pepper. The palate is supple and smooth, with flavors of ripe black cherry, ripe plums, and subtle hints of spice. This wine is the perfect accompaniment to lamb chops, grilled salmon, or beef tenderloin.

name: Willitar Erraviere - 1999
description: Deep red color with bright violet hues. Very intense, fruity, complex and intense with notes of wild berries, earthiness and nuances of spices. Velvety, full bodied, with soft tannins and long aftertaste.

name: Kout Albe Riijes Cabernet Franc 2007
description: Intense, deep ruby color. This is a well-balanced, full-bodied wine, with lots of fruit and fine tannins. Its excellent structure, depth, and concentration make it an ideal accompaniment to a wide range of cuisines.

name: Awamica VeEk Celpanion-Piuti Suprolay 2013
description: The 2013 vintage was cooler than the previous vintages, giving the wine a rich, vibrant and bold palate structure. The nose is deep and fragrant, showing spicy dark berries, a complex earthy edge, with a hint of smoky oak. The palate is rich, intense and balanced with dense black fruit, spice, and a hint of smoky French oak. The wine has a full bodied structure, a firm tannin backbone, and a long finish.

name: Peniton Barsonne Rose 2009
description: The color of this wine is a light, beautiful salmon with tinges of light.  The aromas are very fruity with aromas of watermelon, strawberry and a floral perfume.  Flavors of watermelon, strawberry, melon and raspberry come to the palate, and are nicely balanced with the acidity.  The finish is long, fresh and clean.

name: Rarg Berghaa Counti Selecour Reserva 2009
description: Blend: 52% Syrah, 22% Mourvedre, 10% Grenache, 4% Petit Verdot The wine is a deep ruby color. On the nose, it is perfumed with aromas of ripe cherries, spice and berries. It is elegant in the mouth with flavors of raspberries, plums and sweet oak, accompanied by smooth tannins and a long finish. It will continue to develop in the bottle for 3-5 years.

description: The Penfolds warm-year-old Pinot Noir grapes were harvested early in 2012, resulting in a wine with both bold dark fruit flavors and an elegant, refined palate. Notes of sweet oak and spice are framed by velvety tannins and a subtle, earthy character. With just a light kiss of French oak, this Pinot Noir expresses the essence of Oregon Pinot Noir. The Pinot Noir grapes are sourced from the Willamette Valley, the Chehalem Mountains, and the Dundee Hills.

name: Magnarer Cabernet Sauvignon 1999
description: The color of the 1999 Magnarius is deep and concentrated. The color is a saturated purple/black. The nose of the wine is as rich and exotic as the color. Lush and forward fruit characters of black cherries and cassis are balanced by notes of toasty oak and cedar. Rich and full-bodied, with great structure and depth, the wine is rich and powerful. The tannins are moderate and the wine has a long lingering finish. A wine of this quality and intensity should be cellared for the next 5-7 years.

It also goes well with rich sauces with meat sauces, sharp cheeses, or even spicy sauces.

name: Dunnes Esteres Oldw Chardonnay 2013
description: The 2013 Old Wente is rich and fruit-forward, with a bouquet of honeydew melon, pear, and hints of apricot. The palette of aromas is expansive and filled with lemon curd, peach, lychee and toasted almond. The palate is lush and full-bodied, bursting with tropical fruit and lychee, and finishing with a long, smooth finish. The texture is opulent and velvety, with a beautiful balance of richness and acidity. This wine will continue to develop for many years to come.

name: Twafaster's Rederva Barbars Pinot Noir 2017
description: This wine is a perfect example of the elegance and sophistication of Pinot Noir. With a deep garnet color, it has black cherry and black raspberry fruit on the nose with spicy and earthy characters. The palate is smooth and very silky. It has a great balance between fruit and structure with a long finish. It is ready to drink now and can be cellared for up to 3 years.

name: Yandini Berarvis Red 2004
description: This delicious wine has a wonderful intensity and depth of flavor. The bouquet of the wine is classic, aromatic and fragrant. The wine has a wonderful structure and balance with a luscious fruitiness and natural freshness. The tannins are soft and the finish fresh and vibrant. This wine is perfect for everyday drinking.

description: The 2016 Reeck Chardonnay is bright and fresh with vibrant tropical fruit aromas. It is full and rich in the mouth with a silky texture. Flavors of apricot, apple and pear are accented by toasty oak, caramelized sugar and a hint of spice.

name: Nelace Hagle Pinot Noir 2012
origin: from Russian River, Sonoma County, California
description: The 2012 vintage is a rich, dark garnet color. The nose of this wine is full of fresh, bright fruit aromas. On the palate, the wine is round, soft and full-bodied. A pleasant minerality complements the fruit and carries through the finish.

The wine is a blend of 50% Syrah, 30% Grenache and 20% Mourvedre.

name: Cligani Conterini Sauvignon Bliico 2014

On the palate, the wine is rich, balanced and smooth with flavors of crisp green apple, pineapple and fresh citrus. The finish is long and smooth.

name: Lo Celropa Lausballe 2013
